attr.title: -SPROUT-
attr.desc: -SPROUT- is a mini precision-platformer built for speed-running. Run, jump and dash your way through 100 levels across five unique lands, and restore your world to its former glory.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Download the game and place the game files in sprout/assets.

attr.desc: The 2048 puzzle game
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: A Key(s) Path
attr.desc: Build your way with your own keys. Your three movement keys (Left, Right, Jump) are available at the bottom of the screen; you can drag them in the world to use as platforms. But don't use too many, or you could run out of movement options!
attr.inst: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, Geegaz! https://geegaz.itch.io/out-of-controls
attr.inst_md: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, [Geegaz](https://geegaz.itch.io/out-of-controls)!

attr.title: A Meta Data Game
attr.desc: Embark on a short yet captivating journey of self-discovery. Solve intricate puzzles and uncover the hidden truths that await you.
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to Ansimuz for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.
attr.inst_md: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Ansimuz](https://ansimuz.itch.io) for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.

attr.title: A Pond Beyond
attr.desc:
A short puzzle platformer where you play as a tiny frog who must make their way to a pond beyond and avoid many dangers along the way.
There are many flies to eat during your adventure, pause the game at any time to view how many you've got.
attr.inst: Download A Pond Beyond.zip (August 16, 2024) from https://npjarcade.itch.io/a-pond-beyond. Copy the data.win from the zip over to apondbeyond/assets.

attr.title: A Story About Birds
attr.desc:
The birds are coming back! So, gather some wood, some bird food, and build some amazing shelters. 
Explore Plumage Farm on a relaxing day, collect branches and seeds in form of a minigame that requires skill and get to know its inhabitants and regulars. 
How will you use the day?
attr.inst: Install port files. Buy game in Itch. Download "asab-linux-v1.0.5.zip" then extract file "a-story-about-birds.arm64" into "ports\astoryaboutbirds" folder

attr.title: A Tower in the Forest
attr.desc: "Today is the day"- to finally climb the tower in the forest. Turn windmills to activate platforms, open doors or create shortcuts and make your way to the top in this short, atmospheric platformer about reaching your goals.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: A7Xpg
attr.desc: The goal of the game is to collect all the gold bullions found in each level and avoid crashing into any of the enemies. As you progress through the levels you will encounter harder enemies, and you can gain a short period of invincibility if you gather gold at high speeds.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Abe's Amazing Adventure
attr.desc: A scrolling, platform-jumping, key-collecting, ancient pyramid exploring game, vaguely in the style of similar games for the Commodore+4.  Abe's Adventure files are already included and ready to go.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Abombniball
attr.desc:
The objective of Abombniball is to defuse all the explosives on each level.
As a ball, this would normally be a simple task,
however each level is filled with traps and devious puzzles.
attr.inst: You defuse bombs by landing on the bombs square, however you can only defuse the bomb thats currently counting down. Trying to defuse any other bomb will cause it to explode.

attr.title: Absolute Reflex
attr.desc: Absolute Reflex is a Classic Bullet Hell showdown, but you can STOP TIME at any point and TELEPORT to safety! Though if you want to try for the score, refrain yourself.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://jukio.itch.io/absolute-reflex and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Abu Simbel Profanation Deluxe
attr.desc: An open-source, freeware remake of the Spanish platform game from 1985 replaces the graphics and sounds with new enhanced assets, while maintaining the same unforgiving gameplay of the original.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Abuse
attr.desc: A fork of the original Abuse SDL port from http://abuse.zoy.org/.  An intense 2D shooter.  Plays best on dual analog stick devices.  Just download and play.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Aerofoil
attr.desc: Aerofoil is a port of John Calhoun's Glider PRO, the classic paper airplane game for Apple Macintosh computers released in 1994.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Aestheta
attr.desc: A roguelike royalelike about warriors from across space and time, fighting to claim a wish from the Star of Aestheta. Strategize your tactics, enhance your troops, and outwit your opponents to rise to the top!
attr.inst:
Install port. 
Purchase the game on Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/3730600/Aestheta/) or Itch (https://aplovestudio.itch.io/aestheta). 
Copy all game files into the ports/aestheta/assets folder.
attr.inst_md:
Install port. 
Download game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3730600/Aestheta/) or [Itch](https://aplovestudio.itch.io/aestheta). 
Copy all game files into the `ports/aestheta/assets` folder.

attr.title: Afternoon Stalker
attr.desc: Afternoon Stalker, a robot-killing video game. It is a clone of the 1982 Night Stalker video game for the Intellivision, from Mattel Electronics.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Air
attr.desc: 'AIR' follows Yukito Kunisaki, a traveling puppeteer searching for a winged girl from a childhood legend, who arrives in a small seaside town. There, he meets various girls, each with their own unique stories and supernatural abilities. As Yukito unravels their pasts and the town's mysteries, he discovers connections that transcend time and space, leading to poignant revelations about love, loss, and the human spirit.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/air/gamedata`.

attr.title: Alchemy Quest
attr.desc: Alchemy Quest is a simple puzzle game where players combine alchemic elements to create exotic combinations and score points. A launcher for Open Alchemist is included.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon 1
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon 1 first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon 2
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon 2 first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Aleph-One Marathon Infinity
attr.desc: An open source version of Bungie's Marathon Infinity first person shooter.
attr.inst: All files have been included.

attr.title: Alice In Clicheland
attr.desc: Alice in Clicheland is a game developed for Digital Games Development course, taken during their Computer Science grad school at UFMG. It is an action RPG game, where the action takes place in real time. With its 2D graphics and aerial view, Alice in Clicheland recalls SNES RPG games, like Final Fantasy and Zelda.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Alien Blaster
attr.desc: Alien Blaster is a classic 2D shoot 'em up featuring lots of different weapons, special items, aliens to blast and a big bad boss. Your mission is simple: Stop the invasion of the aliens and blast them!
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Alien Death Mob
attr.desc: Aliens have invaded Earth! Towns, cities, deserts, they're everywhere! Take on the role of Earth's last super soldier and confront the alien menace in this intense twin stick shooter!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Steam.
Download the latest version of the game and place the game files in ports/alientdeathmob/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1567490/Alien_Death_Mob/).
Download the latest version of the game and place the game files in ports/alientdeathmob/assets

attr.title: Alien Pogs From Outer Space
attr.desc: This Bullet Heaven Survival game was made for GBJam11 from Sept 15-25 2023 .
attr.inst: Download the game from itch , extract zip file and copy .rpg file into the alienpogs port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download any version of the game from  Itch.io , extract the zip file and copy the .rpg file into the alienpogs port folder

attr.title: Alien Squatter
attr.desc: You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.
attr.desc_md:
You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.

Key Features:

- Choose from 3 alien species. All of them are weird aliens with cool abilities.
- Romance and befriend over 20 characters including a gangster, a breakdancer, a priest, a giant ooze, and a robot serial killer.
- Gain one of 5 pets, each with different abilities and unique personalities.
- Grow your physical, mental, and social stats, and use them to overcome obstacles.
- Do what it takes to survive. Forage, fight, fish, steal, salvage, sneak, shop, beg, get a job, sell your organs, party, get high, gamble, mutate, use psychic powers. - There are many paths to success.
- Be a good person or a scoundrel. The karma system tracks it all.
- Dozens of endings and achievements.
- Evocative descriptions bring the dystopian world to life. It's a really terrible place!
attr.inst: Download any version of the game from Steam or [Itch.io](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/alien-squatter), extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download any version of the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1131750/Alien_Squatter/) or itch.io, extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.

attr.title: Aliens versus Predator
attr.desc: The three most ferocious species in the universe in a bloodthirsty battle for the ultimate prize: survival. Take your pick: be a Colonial Marine, a Predator or an Alien. Fight through suspense-filled environments: from starships and space stations to colonial bases and eerie planetscapes. One wrong move turns you from hunter to prey.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the 1999 PC release copied to the ports/avp folder.
attr.inst_md: You will need the original files of the 1999 PC release copied to the `ports/avp` folder.

attr.title: AlllCALL
attr.desc: This is a mini shmup. The boss appears when 8 large numbered enemies are defeated. The stage is cleared when the boss is defeated.
attr.inst: Download free at itch.io https://nizakashii.itch.io/alllcall and copy the data.win file into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://nizakashii.itch.io/alllcall) and copy the data.win file into the assets folder.

attr.title: Alphaman
attr.desc: Alphaman is an action platformer with classic, run, jump, dash, and shoot combat about an android taking down some bots gone bad.  The group of hackers known as the Red Bombers have unleashed a virus infecting every day robots.  Even more dangerous are the bots who were formerly modified by their previous owners to enter into android fighting tournaments.  It's up to Alpha to stop the bad bots and take down the Red Bombers!
attr.inst: Buy the game from here "https://yomic.itch.io/alphaman" and download the Alphaman Steamless Windows 'PortMaster' version. Unzip the file once downloaded and place 'Alphaman.pck' into ports/alphaman/gamedata

attr.title: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists
attr.desc: Welcome to a compact, tightly packed Metroidvania, where the Square Aspect Ratio and Single Screen Level Design allows every one of the 200+ rooms to slot into the larger puzzle-box of the world; where secrets, exploits and sequence-breaking are built into the very foundation of the game; and where the overarching story doesn’t care too much which path you happen to take through the game.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy game files into the assets folder.

attr.title: Always Surrender
attr.desc: Always Surrender is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up score attack, with an emphasis on pushing your luck as far as you can. Last as long as possible against an endless horde of enemies and then surrender in order to bank the bonus. Giving up has never been so rewarding. Battle a never ending swarm of enemies, but be sure to surrender before you die...
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1434200/Always_Surrender/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Ambidextro
attr.desc: Ambidextro is a multiplayer for a single player. Learn to control two characters at the same time, one with each hand. Develop your ambidexterity and rescue both the prince and the princess simultaneously.
attr.inst: Copy the file Ambidextro.pck into the folder:  /roms/ports/ambidextro/

attr.title: Anarch
attr.desc: Anarch is extremely small, completely public domain, no-dependency, no-file, portable suckless anarcho-pacifist from-scratch 90s-style Doom clone that runs everywhere, made for the benefit of all living beings
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Angband
attr.desc:
Angband is a free, single-player dungeon exploration game.
You play an adventurer seeking riches, fighting monsters, and preparing for a final battle with Morgoth, the Lord of Darkness.
attr.inst: Game files are already included. Controls are rather complex, make sure to read the control sheet on our website carefully.

attr.title: Annalynn
attr.desc:
Annalynn is a 2D platformer made in the style of arcade games from the early '80s. Play as Annalynn, the eponymous heroine who has to run, jump, and climb to outwit the four snakes: Randy, Handy, Candy, and Mike. Collect the coins, grab the bonus foods, and turn the tables with blinding rubies! Think you've got what it takes to go for the high score?

Note: This is version 1.3 of the steam version. Other versions are not compatible with this portmaster package!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1508460/Annalynn/
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the 1.3 version by typing: download_depot 1508460 1508461 5365853075598347936 in the console. When the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder, copy all files to /ports/annalynn/assets

attr.title: Annulus
attr.desc:
Afraid of the dark? Turning the lights on just might be more dangerous...

You have arrived on the the Annulus, a space station here to reap all of your home world's power. You can channel this power freely through you, but strange and twisted machines are here to take it. Navigate the dark corridors and Fight against the darkness in this epic descent into the Annulus and control the vessel from within.  Reroute power to light the way and  solve puzzles. Pick up abilities along the way and become strong enough to traverse the deepest parts of the ship. Can you uncover the true purpose of the Annulus?
attr.inst: Download Annulus 2.31.exe from here - https://toq-games.itch.io/annulus - rename exe to zip and extract contents to ports/annulus/assets folder. Launch the game and Enjoy!

attr.title: Anodyne
attr.desc: In this unique Zelda-lite game, explore and fight your way through surreal and creepy, nature, urban and abstract themed areas in the human Young's subconscious, evoked by a 16-bit-era visual style and a moody, dream-like soundtrack.
attr.inst: Copy all the files contained in the game's `Remake` folder to `anodyne/gamedata`.

attr.title: Antonball Classic
attr.desc:
After a long night on the town, Anton's struggling to find his way back home. You'll have to help Anton out by using your balls to break the bricks!

You'll also run into pesky Ballbusters during your adventure together. Get rid of them by smacking them with your balls, or hitting them from behind!
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io https://summitsphere.itch.io/antonball and unzip all game data to antonballclassic/assets.

attr.title: Apoc Runner
attr.desc: As the world burns, as the streets crumble, you cling to one thing: Survival. An unstoppable alien blight has taken hold of the earth, and there's no fighting it. Escape is the only option. Run, jump, and slide your way through urban destruction in this intense runner!
attr.desc_md: As the world burns, as the streets crumble, you cling to one thing: **Survival.** An unstoppable alien blight has taken hold of the earth, and there's no fighting it. **Escape** is the **only option**. Run, jump, and slide your way through urban destruction in this intense runner!
attr.inst: Thanks to Omnitron Studios, there is no need to download the game from itch.io to obtain the game files. This port is 'Ready to Run' as soon as it's been installed on your device.
attr.inst_md: Thanks to [**Omnitron Studios**](https://omnitron-studios.itch.io), there is no need to download the game from [itch.io](https://omnitron-studios.itch.io/apoc-runner) to obtain the game files. This port is now *Ready to Run* as soon as it's been installed on your device.

attr.title: Apotris
attr.desc: Apotris is a block stacking game in the style of Tetris!  It features satisfying graphics, responsive controls and a large amount of customization so that you can tailor the game to your preferences! There are 11 game-modes to explore, with various options to keep yourself entertained (or challenged).
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Apricots
attr.desc:
Apricots has nothing to do with apricots. It's a game where you fly a little plane around the screen and shoot things and drop bombs on enemy targets, and it's meant to be quick and fun.

Big thanks to [Moggers87](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots) for producing this game. 

The [source](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots)
attr.inst:
At present there is no option screen. Options can be changed by editing the configuration file apricots.cfg. This is first searched for in ~/.config/apricots/, then the system configuration directory (usually /usr/local/etc or /etc) and finally the default configuration in the data directory.

The number and type of planes can be varied, along with the airbases, as can 1/2 player game be chosen. The number of anti aircraft guns and scenery can be selected. Draks can be turned on or off, and a different condition for winning the game can be chosen.

attr.title: Aquaria
attr.desc: A massive ocean world, teeming with life and filled with ancient secrets. Join Naija, a lone underwater dweller in search of her family, as she explores the depths of Aquaria. She'll travel from hidden caves, shrouded in darkness, to beautiful, sunlit oases, all lovingly handcrafted by its two creators.
attr.desc_md: A massive ocean world, teeming with life and filled with ancient secrets. Join Naija, a lone underwater dweller in search of her family, as she explores the depths of [Aquaria](https://www.bit-blot.com/aquaria/). She'll travel from hidden caves, shrouded in darkness, to beautiful, sunlit oases, all lovingly handcrafted by its two creators.
attr.inst: Install the port. Buy the game on Steam or GoG and copy the game files (data/ and surrounding files) into your ports/aquaria folder.
attr.inst_md: Install the port. Buy the game on Steam or GoG and copy the game files (`data/` and surrounding files) into your `ports/aquaria` folder.

attr.title: AREA2048
attr.desc: Fast-paced omni-directional arena shooter.
attr.inst:
Clear a scene by destroying all the enemies that are in the scene.
If you touch an enemy body or enemy bullet, you loose a life.
When you clear 10 scenes, you proceed to the next area.
The game is complete when five areas are cleared.
If all areas can't be cleared in the time limit, it's game over.

attr.title: Arengius
attr.desc: The whole galactic federation is under attack by the gigantic organism known only as Arengius! With the federation army under attack on all fronts, only you have a chance to stop Arengius and save the galaxy! The game offers 13 stages full of unique hazards and powerful bosses.
attr.inst: Download the game (both Lite and Full version works) from https://yaru.itch.io/arengius and place the zip file into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (both `Lite` and `Full` version works) from [Itch.io](https://yaru.itch.io/arengius) and place the zip file into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Arkovs Tower
attr.desc: This roguelike puts you in the shoes of an unnamed adventurer who just woke up on the top level of Arkov's Tower. Try to fight your way down and escape it - or die trying. Move your player trough numerous procedural generated levels. Fight numerous enemies including some unique bosses. The turn based combat system allows you to take your time and plan every move carefully. Upgrade your character with all sorts of items found in chests or dropped by enemies. This game is highly customizable for people with pixel art and/or programming experience.
attr.inst: Includes the Arkovs Tower Prologue version.  If you enjoy the game, please consider adding the full version to your steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2876720/Descent_from_Arkovs_Tower/
attr.inst_md: Includes the [Arkovs Tower Prologue](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2688600/Descent_from_Arkovs_tower_Prologue/) version.  If you enjoy the game, please consider adding the [full version](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2876720/Descent_from_Arkovs_Tower/) to your steam wishlist

attr.title: Armagetron Advanced
attr.desc: 3D Tron-like high speed game
attr.inst: Ready to run! Control Player 1 via DPAD and Player 2 via ABY

attr.title: Arx
attr.desc:
The world of Arx is wrought with turmoil, brought to the brink of destruction by a violent war.  It is set on a world whose sun has failed, forcing the above-ground creatures to take refuge in caverns. Arx Fatalis is an innovative first-person role-playing game, featuring crafting, combat and spell-casting using mouse gestures.

Arx Libertatis is an improved, cross-platform and open source engine for Arx Fatalis.
attr.desc_md:
The world of Arx is wrought with turmoil, brought to the brink of destruction by a violent war.  It is set on a world whose sun has failed, forcing the above-ground creatures to take refuge in caverns. Arx Fatalis is an innovative first-person role-playing game featuring crafting, combat and spell-casting using mouse gestures.

[Arx Libertatis](https://arx-libertatis.org) is an improved, cross-platform and open source engine for Arx Fatalis.
attr.inst: Purchase the game and copy the GoG offline installer (2 files, setup_arx...exe and setup_arx...bin) to arx/gamedata. They will be extracted on first run. Alternatively, copy Steam or Windows CD-ROM files so that copy them so that data.pak and surrounding files and folders are in arx/gamedata.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game and copy the GoG offline installer (2 files, `setup_arx...exe` and `setup_arx...bin`) to arx/gamedata. They will be extracted on first run. Alternatively, copy Steam or Windows CD-ROM files so that copy them so that `data.pak` and surrounding files and folders are in `arx/gamedata`.

attr.title: ASSAULT SHELL
attr.desc: Engage in an action packed shoot em' up adventure! Choose from 4 powerful fighters and fight through 5 intense stages!
attr.inst: Purchase from itch.io https://overloadedstudios.itch.io/assault-shell or Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432970/ASSAULT_SHELL/ and place data.win, each audiogroup.dat file, and each .csv file into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase from [itch.io](https://overloadedstudios.itch.io/assault-shell) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432970/ASSAULT_SHELL/) and place data.win, each audiogroup.dat file, and each .csv file into gamedata folder.

attr.title: Asylum
attr.desc: Young Sigmund has a few problems. To help him resolve his mental instability you must enter the surreal world of his inner mind and shut down the malfunctioning brain cells. Guide Sigmund through the Ego, Psyche and Id zones - each one 300 times the size of the screen - to locate the eight renegade neurons, entering them one by one to find and trigger their self-destruct system.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Atomic Automaton
attr.desc: The player must face endless waves of enemies, as long as possible in a challenging, action-packed environment.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Attack of the PETSCII Robots (OpenMSX)
attr.desc: Attack of the Petscii Robots is a top-down action-puzzle game. This free version was developed by Robosoft for the MSX1. It is inspired by oblique top-down projection games like Ultima, but takes much of the gameplay concepts from first-person shooters. The object is to destroy all of the robots. To do this, you have to search objects in the game for weapons and other items to help you along the way. Many scenarios require complex thinking and problem solving, rather than just action shooting.
attr.inst:
Place the following BIOS files in the 'petsciirobotsmsx/share/systemroms' directory:
fs-a1gt_firmware.rom, 
fs-a1gt_kanjifont.rom, 
yrw801.rom
attr.inst_md:
**Place the following BIOS files in the 'petsciirobotsmsx/share/systemroms' directory:**
fs-a1gt_firmware.rom, 
fs-a1gt_kanjifont.rom, 
yrw801.rom

**The game is already included and was acquired from** [MSXdev.org](https://www.msxdev.org/2023/09/19/msxdev23-18-attack-of-the-petscii-robots/)

attr.title: Augustus
attr.desc: A reimplemntation of the Caeser 3 engine.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release copied to the ports/augustus/data folder.

attr.title: Aurascope Demo
attr.desc: Aurascope is a 2D action-adventure collectathon platformer with light puzzle and RPG elements. Join our friends Trace and Aurora to uncover the secrets surrounding the Aurascope, a mysterious drive from beyond the stars!
attr.inst:
This is a port for the DEMO!! Download the DEMO at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1547880/Aurascope/ or https://nick64.itch.io/aurascope and add all the data to `ports/aurascope/assets`.

If you enjoy the demo, visit the [Kickstarter Page](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/aurascope/aurascope) to follow the game and back the developer!

attr.title: Axe Cop
attr.desc: Fight all of the bad guys! Axe Cop and his team of colorful characters must go on an epic adventure, that covers his ten-year comic book history, to rid the world of all bad guys once and for all in this epic turn-based RPG!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://redtrianglegames.itch.io/axecop or https://store.steampowered.com/app/1193300/Axe_Cop and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). Copy the file named axecop.rpg to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page).
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [itch.io](https://redtrianglegames.itch.io/axecop) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1193300/Axe_Cop) and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). Copy the file named *axecop.rpg* to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page).

attr.title: Axiom Verge
attr.desc: A port of Axiom Verge, an awesome metroidvania 2D platformer.
attr.inst: You will need to add your own files to the ports/axiom-verge/gamedata folder. YOU HAVE TO USE THE DRM FREE EPIC GAMES VERSION. file in your Portmaster/libs folder. All intructions are in the ports/axiom-verge/gamedata folder

attr.title: Balatro
attr.desc: Balatro is a poker-inspired roguelike deck builder all about creating powerful synergies and winning big.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379780/Balatro/. On macOS, grab this Balatro.love file (~/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/common/Balatro/Balatro.app/Contents/Resources/Balatro.love) and put into the balatro folder. On Windows, simply copy Balatro.exe to the balatro folder.

attr.title: Banana Duck
attr.desc: Experience the sweet taste of pursuing bananas and avoiding all the evil vegetables and saw blades that are there for absolutely no reason. Also, you're a duck that can't swim and dies when it touches the water.
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Bananaguy 2
attr.desc: Bananaguy 2 is about exploring strange and playful worlds collecting "Power Coins" along the way which are used to travel to the next world. Each coin features its own wacky little adventure.
attr.inst: This game is ready to run.

attr.title: Bananaguy Classic
attr.desc: Bananaguy wakes up and sees his banana is missing! Make your way through a colorful world filled with hard but fun challenges. Unlock new power ups to make Bananaguys moveset grow! Retrieve your lost banana and consume it in the comfort of your home :D
attr.inst: This game is ready to run.

attr.title: Barbarian
attr.desc: Barbarian is a fighting game that gives players control over sword-wielding barbarians.
attr.inst: Go to https://www.tdbsoft.com/html/projects/barbarian.html, download the linux version and extract the files to the barbarian gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Go to [Barbarian Website](https://www.tdbsoft.com/html/projects/barbarian.html), download the linux version and extract the files to the barbarian gamedata folder.

attr.title: Battalion
attr.desc:
Your lands have been invaded by General Mustache and his infamous armored division!
Nothing seems to stop him, except perhaps for Commander Joe and his old companion "G-080 Justice" tank destroyer.
Engage in 8 exciting battles through the liberation campaign.
Fight in cities, forests, riverbanks, military bases and more...
Collect the powerup to experience ultimate defense and crush obstacles on the way.
attr.inst: READY to RUN

attr.title: Battle for Wesnoth
attr.desc:
Explore the world of Wesnoth and take part in its many adventures! Embark on a desperate quest to reclaim your rightful throne... Flee the Lich Lords to a new home across the sea... Delve into the darkest depths of the earth to craft a jewel of fire itself... Defend your kingdom against the ravaging hordes of a foul necromancer... Or lead a straggly band of survivors across the blazing sands to confront an unseen evil.

The Battle for Wesnoth is an open source, turn-based strategy game with a high fantasy theme. It features both singleplayer and online/hotseat multiplayer combat.
attr.desc_md:
Explore the world of [Wesnoth](https://www.wesnoth.org) and take part in its many adventures! Embark on a desperate quest to reclaim your rightful throne... Flee the Lich Lords to a new home across the sea... Delve into the darkest depths of the earth to craft a jewel of fire itself... Defend your kingdom against the ravaging hordes of a foul necromancer... Or lead a straggly band of survivors across the blazing sands to confront an unseen evil.

The Battle for Wesnoth is an open source, turn-based strategy game with a high fantasy theme. It features both singleplayer and online/hotseat multiplayer combat.
attr.inst: Ready to run! Note that the port is about 670MB in size, but will consume over 1.5GB of space on non-ext4 volumes.

attr.title: Beard Blade
attr.desc: Run and jump through tropical 16-bit locales as you fend off foes with the power of Branson's shapeshifting beard. Visit the barber to toughen your scruff with new abilities and confront the thieving Smuglins.
attr.inst: Purchase and install Beard Blade on Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546940/Beard_Blade/) and copy the data.win file (and possibly the options.ini file) into ports/beardblade/gamedata.

attr.title: Beat of The PixelHeat
attr.desc: Beat of The Pixel Heat is a rhythm game in which you must control HEAT, an artificial intelligence responsible for defending cyberspace from a wave of viral elements that have invaded your home!
attr.inst: Run PixelHeat.sh

attr.title: Beat2x
attr.desc: Beat2x is DDR-style rythm game where the goal is to time the button presses to line up with the music beat.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Beatblock
attr.desc: SPIN TO WIN: Move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat! Taps and different block types- like mines and sides- keep things fresh.
attr.inst: Download the Linux version of the game from https://bubbletabby.itch.io/beatblock and place Beatblock-linux.zip into the beatblock/gamedata/ directory on your device

attr.title: Beemis: The Curse of God
attr.desc: Become a real-life bee and also fight God himself. Take on many bosses and wacky levels as a young bee whose life has been drastically changed by a curse maniacally concocted by God.
attr.inst: Download the game (for free) here: https://blebgo.itch.io/beemis-the-curse-of-god -- extract and copy the data.win file to the port gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (for free) here: [https://blebgo.itch.io/beemis-the-curse-of-god](https://blebgo.itch.io/beemis-the-curse-of-god) -- extract and copy the *data.win* file to the port *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Bella Wants Blood
attr.desc: Entertain the god-like Bella’s thirst for blood in this absurd bite-sized roguelike terror defense game.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam, download the Windows version and copy the BellaWantsBlood.pck into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3007660/Bella_Wants_Blood/), download the `Windows` version and copy the `BellaWantsBlood.pck` into the `gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Belle Boomerang
attr.desc: A fast-action platformer packed with beautiful pixel art and exciting variation in every level!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game and copy the files to /ports/belleboomerang/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1632170/Belle_Boomerang/

Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/belleboomerang/gamedata.

attr.title: Ben Was Assimilated
attr.desc: Ben Was Assimilated is a hack n slash style roguelike game where things only move when you do.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Benbo Quest
attr.desc: 🔥THE GATES OF HELL🔥 have opened, the Infinite Skeleton Hell Army from Hell has began the Ultimate InvasionWorld leaders come together to combat the Skeleton Menacehot new indie retro anime pixel platformer that all the cool kids are talking about. Smash your way through a handful of levels and defeat all of the bad dudes, THE GAME SUPER BENBO QUEST TURBO DELUX/SUPER BENBO QUERST CLASSIC
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: BEOWULF CLASSIC
attr.desc: Made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 4.Embark on an adaption that mixes retro platforming and combat while you explore the old Beowulf Poem.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Bermuda Syndrome
attr.desc: A reimplemntation of the Berumuda Syndrome engine.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC release or PC demo copied to the ports/bermuda/DATA folder.

attr.title: Beyond a Total Loss
attr.desc: A Dark and Comedic adventure that combines gameplay elements from Lisa and Resident Evil. You play as John Harry after he drives his car off the edge of a cliff. He's now stranded in an old podunk town filled with weirdos. Help John escape the town and best a series of strange ordeals. Thank You Pseudobug for creating this amazing adventure!
attr.inst:
1) Open the Steam Console
2) Open Download.txt
3) Copy the text from Download.txt into the Steam Console and press ENTER
4) Patiently wait for the game to Download
5) Open Game Location (You can Copy and Paste the file location from the Steam Console after the game is successfully downloaded)
6) Copy and Paste files into the gamedata folder
7) Enjoy the Game!

attr.title: Billy Frontier
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software's Billy Frontier updated to run on modern operating systems. Use the touchscreen to navigate the UI and gameplay.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Binarystar Infinity
attr.desc: Binarystar Infinity is a 1-Bit Shoot ‘Em Up with a challenging experience reminding of the traditional Arcade Shmup classics, that can be experienced alone or with a friend, and with the particularity of being playable in vertical or horizontal scrolling mode.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Download the game and copy over the game files into ports/binarystarinfinity/gamedata/
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491040/Binarystar_Infinity/)
Download the game and copy over the game files into ports/binarystarinfinity/gamedata/

attr.title: Biolab Disaster
attr.desc: A jump'n'gun platformer, displaying many of high_impacts capabilities.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Biomass: Growth
attr.desc: BIOMASS: Growth is a scifi horror metroidvania platformer developed by BRAINOS. You wake in a deserted lab with no idea who, what, where or why you are. You have only your senses and the logbooks of deceased crew members to guide you. As you search for ways to expand your arsenal and access to the station, the titular BIOMASS will spread throughout, growing stronger, more aggressive, in a desperate arms race against you. Find out who, what, where and why you are, and uncover the fate of the crew in this doomed lab. Find a way to destroy the BIOMASS and save humanity from certain death.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: BIT.TRIP Presents... Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien
attr.desc: 'Bit.Trip Runner2', also known as 'Runner2: Future Legend of Rhythm Alien', is a rhythm-based platformer video game developed by Gaijin Games. Released in 2013, it is the sequel to the original Bit.Trip Runner. The game features CommanderVideo, the main character, navigating through various levels filled with obstacles and challenges, all synchronized to an engaging electronic soundtrack. Players must execute precise jumps, slides, and kicks to the beat of the music, creating a dynamic and rhythmic gameplay experience. With its vibrant visuals, catchy music, and addictive gameplay, Bit.Trip Runner2 offers a unique and entertaining take on the platformer genre.
attr.inst: Copy your Linux Game files (runner2, Runner2.png, package.toc and the other 9 folders) to the runner2 folder.

attr.title: Bitsybox
attr.desc:
~ a little engine for little games, worlds, and stories ~
It comes with two demos: a night train to the forest zone and mossland
If you like this game please support the author https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsybox
attr.inst:
Ready to play !
Add your bitsy game files in bitsybox/games

attr.title: Blackout
attr.desc: A witch on the roof of a scary old house. Black cats, cobwebs, and a crescent moon -- all too creepy! In this point-and-click adventure, your task is to guide the main character, Marilyn, as she ventures deeper and deeper into a mysterious house in the middle of the night.
attr.inst: Download the Blackout-1.0.2-win.zip version for free at itch.io (https://freshgames.itch.io/blackout). Extract the .zip, and copy the .exe file to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *Blackout-1.0.2-win.zip* version for free at [itch.io](https://freshgames.itch.io/blackout). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the *.exe* file to the port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Blake Stone - Aliens of Gold
attr.desc: The unofficial source port for Blake Stone Aliens of Gold.
attr.inst: Includes the shareware files.  You can also add your own full version Blake Stone - Aliens of Gold (*.BS6) files to the 'ports/bstone-aog/gamedata/aliens_of_gold' folder.  The Steam version of these files can be found by browsing local files and entering the 'Blake Stone - Aliens of Gold' directory.

attr.title: Blake Stone - Planet Strike
attr.desc: The unofficial source port for Blake Stone Planet Strike.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version Blake Stone Planet Strike (*.VSI) files to the 'ports/bstone-ps/gamedata/planet_strike' folder.  The Steam version of these files can be found by browsing local files and entering the 'Blake Stone - Planet Strike' directory.

attr.title: Blarglike
attr.desc: Blarglike is a small dungeon-crawling roguelike where you play as a tiny robot on a mission to restore life to a dying ecosystem. Venture deep into procedurally generated dungeons, plant flowers, and guide nutrients to help the environment thrive. Each day offers a fresh challenge with new dungeon layouts!.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Blastius
attr.desc: Blastius is a simple old-school space shooter with a twist: your ship's piloting system has been heavily damaged during a battle and now you can only move by boosting and drifting around. The result of this is a dash that can be both an offensive and a defensive manoeuvre.
attr.inst: Download game from https://stedl89.itch.io/blastius-gamejam2020, rename exe to zip, extract. Copy data.win and all .mp3 files to /ports/blastius/gamedata

attr.title: Blazing Beaks
attr.desc: Roguelite - where too much greediness can be fatal. A colorful world with armed birds blazing their way through piles of mutants, monsters and creepy creatures. Lots of mysteries to unravel, secrets to discover and levels to explore. Requires Twin sticks!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from GOG. Download Version 1.2.0.3. Copy over all the game file to ports/blazingbeaks/assets
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/blazing_beaks). Download Version 1.2.0.3. Do this by going to More > Manage Installation > Configure > Uncheck auto-updates > Show more versions > Select Version 1.2.0.3. Copy over all the game file to ports/blazingbeaks/assets

attr.title: Bleed
attr.desc: Wryn is a girl with a big arsenal and big dreams -- she wants to be the ultimate videogame hero! Help her take down the Greatest Heroes of All Time in an action-packed bid to claim the title for herself and show the world what a true hero looks like!
attr.inst: Copy the retail game's assets into 'bleed/gamedata'.

attr.title: Bleed 2
attr.desc: Bleed 2 is a relentless arcade action game featuring air-dodging, bullet-reflecting, and tons of bosses. Now with randomly-generated levels and daily challenges, too!
attr.inst: Copy the retail game's assets into 'bleed2/gamedata'.

attr.title: Blob Wars: Metal Blob Solid
attr.desc: Metal Blob Solid is the first game in the Blob Wars series made by Parallel Realities. It is a 2D platform game, where you control Bob in an effort to save his world from an invasion of alien Blobs.
attr.inst: Blobwars files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Blobby Volley 2
attr.desc: A head-to-head multiplayer ball game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Bloboats
attr.desc: Bloboats is an arcade-like boat racing game in the hybrid spirit of Mario-like platform jumpers and elasto mania / xmoto.
attr.inst: Ready to run! To Start Text-Input mode press Start + Down!

attr.title: Block Attack
attr.desc: A Tetris Attack Clone.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Blockamok Remix
attr.desc: Fly through a 3D world of never-ending blocks and survive for as long as you can! Includes customization options for both gameplay and visuals, along with five music tracks.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Blockdude Playdate
attr.desc: Blokdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game is based on the Playdate which in itself was based on the GP2X port of blockdude.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: BlockOut II
attr.desc: BlockOut II is a free adaptation of the original BlockOut DOS game. BlockOut II has the same features than the original game with few graphic improvements.
attr.inst: BlockOut II files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Blood
attr.desc: Blood port based on EDuke32.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version Blood 1.21 files to the ports/Blood folder.

attr.title: Blood X Thirsty
attr.desc: Serve drinks, enhance your brew, and fight off unruly customers in this fast-paced bartending sim!
attr.inst: Ready To Run!

attr.title: Blossom Tales II
attr.desc:
The Minotaur King has returned...and it's all your fault! Lily's back for a new "classic" action-adventure set hundreds of years after The Sleeping King!

Grandpa's latest tale takes you on a journey through haunted forests, pirate shores, and other mysterious lands across a vast open-world! Charming towns, terrible enemies, tricky puzzles, and powerful weapons await you.

Will you help Lily defeat the Minotaur King and save her brother?
attr.inst: Drop all the assets from the game inside of the gamedata folder. Windows and Linux versions both work!

attr.title: BLOWFLY2:OVERLIMIT
attr.desc: "BLOWFLY2:OVERLIMIT" is a superhero-style platform action game. Use the protagonist's unique abilities to explore and collect pink POOBABYs in the map. This time, you will go deep into the enemy's lair and challenge more powerful levels and enemies! Blowfly! Flight! Dash!
attr.inst:
Download the game from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2831590/BLOWFLY2OVERLIMIT/
and copy all game files to the 'assets' folder. Patching will take place on first run.

attr.title: BLUE REVOLVER
attr.desc: BLUE REVOLVER is a fresh new shoot-em-up built for newcomers and psychos alike. An adaptive difficulty system tailors the game to your skill level as you fight and flourish to evade the maniac environmental force, Blue Revolver!
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/439490/BLUE_REVOLVER/ and copy the .exe or .love file into the port (bluerevolver) folder. Switch to the [1.12 - Old pre-DA version] in steam betas, as that is the only version supported for now. First run will take a few minutes to patch the game. Also you will need to have around 1.5 gb of free space for patching (additional space is needed only for patching on first run).

attr.title: Blues Brothers
attr.desc: A rewrite of the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files.  You can add your own full game Amiga or Dos files to the ports/bluesbrothers/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Blues Brothers: Jukebox Adventure
attr.desc: A rewrite of the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files.  You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/bbda/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Bombastic
attr.desc: Play as Splodey, a bomb with an explosive spring in his step! Use his exploding jump to traverse rooms and solve puzzles. Destroy all of the orange blocks and TNT to progress through the levels!
attr.inst: Download the game free at itch.io (https://jamierowan.itch.io/bombastic). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the bombastic/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game free at [itch.io](https://jamierowan.itch.io/bombastic). Download, extract, and copy the game files to the `bombastic/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: BomberPibe
attr.desc: A 2D platformer with a unique double jump mechanic using your own exploding head.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Boneraiser Minions
attr.desc:
Amass an army of undead to fight endless waves of heroes intent to end your boneraising ways! In this gothic auto-battler rogue-lite Survivor-like, use the bones of slain heroes to raise your minions, collect relics and spells, and unlock meta upgrades, all to survive King Gigald's crusade! 
This has been updated to work with the latest version (v36.14)
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game and transfer all the game files to ports/boneraiserminions/assets.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1944570/Boneraiser_Minions/). Open steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the latest version by typing: `download_depot 1944570 1944571 7846858657771989862` in the console. When the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder. Transfer all the game files to ports/boneraiserminions/assets.

attr.title: Bones in the Boneyard
attr.desc: There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them, and line up complete skeletons to set them free.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/bones-in-the-boneyard). Extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://jdmgames.itch.io/bones-in-the-boneyard). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Boni+
attr.desc: Boni the skeleton is traveling across the Mexican 'Dia de Muertos', however, he needs to cross the spooky Iztepetl Cemetery. Help him get his skeletal body to the other side!
attr.inst:
You can download Boni+ for free at: https://pistachoduck.itch.io/boniboni 

Download the Boni_Linux64.zip version and extract it, and place the Boni_Linux.pck file in the gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md:
You can download Boni+ for free at: https://pistachoduck.itch.io/boniboni 

Download the *Boni\_Linux64.zip* version and extract it, and place the *Boni\_Linux.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Bootleg Box
attr.desc:
BOOTLEG BOX is a retro pastiche of bootleg NES/Famicom multicarts and unlicensed games - featuring:

ULTRA PADDLES
CYBER ATTACK
CHOMP'S PUZZLE
NUCLEAR CODES
EGGSELENT

These small games are designed to feel retro-yet-smooth, with streamlined controls, and colourful, sometimes toy-like art. Difficulty ramps up over time. Best suited to killing time during lunch breaks or something, idk.

Everything should be pretty well optimised, and each game responds to the same control scheme as outlined in the main menu.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Bos Wars
attr.desc: Bos Wars is a futuristic real time strategy game (RTS). In a RTS game, the player has to combat his enemies while developing his war economy. Everything runs in real-time, as opposed to turn-based games where the player always has to wait for his turn. The trick is to balance the effort put into building his economy and building an army to defend and attack the enemies.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Bot Vice
attr.desc: Show off your skills and reflexes in this frantic gallery shooter arcade action title - Filled with bullets, bots, and explosions! You play as Erin Saver, who carries out a personal vendetta against the criminal gang the Wildbots while bringing them to justice
attr.inst:
Purchase the game either from itch.io or steam.
Download the linux version of the game and copy all the game files to /ports/botvice/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game either from [itch.io](https://dyagames.itch.io/bot-vice) OR [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/491040/Bot_Vice/)

For itch: Download Bot Vice (Linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS) version, copy all files from /assets to /ports/botvice/assets

For steam: Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 491040 491042 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder, copy all files from /assets to /ports/botvice/assets

attr.title: Botbreak
attr.desc: BOT-BREAK! is a Paddle Pinball arcade-y experience, made for MechJam III, and designed to somewhat resemble a physical electromechanical game - complete with a cute little dot matrix display. Destroy the enemy Giant Robot one part at a time, dodge Missiles, get a Shield, launch your MechBall from the Railgun, and activate Hyper Mode to button-mash to victory!
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Bouncing Hero
attr.desc: Bouncing Hero is an extreme auto-jump platformer. Use your skills to control the knight on his pogo stick and avoid the sophisticated traps to conquer the castle!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and place all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/999990/Bouncing_Hero/) and place all game files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Bowling Cross
attr.desc: BOWLING CROSS: DARK LEGACY OF THE DEVIL BOWLER (FINAL FRAME) is the complete version of BOWLING CROSS, a weird GBC-style Battle-Bowling Action RPG - play as a roaming adventurer, using Custom Battle-Bowling Balls to knock down your enemies!
attr.inst: All game files are included. Thanks to Harley Wilson at https://hwilson.itch.io/bowling-cross-final-frame for creating the game and allowing us to distribute.

attr.title: BOX: Space Station
attr.desc: BOX: Space Station is a challenging puzzle game where your objective is to escape, but the more than one hundred levels will make your objective more difficult. Developed and published by plaYnice!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1613150/BOX_Space_Station/ and copy data.win, audiogroup1.dat and _223235__dambient__8_bit_loop.ogg into the port folder.

attr.title: Braid
attr.desc: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess. In each world, you have a different power to affect the way time behaves, and it is time's strangeness that creates the puzzles.
attr.desc_md: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess. In each world, you have a different power to affect the way time behaves, and it is time's strangeness that creates the puzzles.
attr.inst: Purchase the original linux version of the game from GoG or Humble Bundle. Note that this port does not work with the newer Anniversary Edition. Put the installer file (ending in .sh) in ports/braid/gamedata.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the original linux version of the game from [GoG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/braid) or [Humble Bundle](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/braid). Note that this port does not work with the newer Anniversary Edition. Put the installer file (ending in `.sh`) in `ports/braid/gamedata`.

attr.title: Brave Dogs Road
attr.desc: Brave Dog's Road is a short platformer about a dog who dreams of adventure.
attr.inst: Download game from https://puppiesandanime.itch.io/brave-dogs-road , place data.win in /ports/bravedogsroad/gamedata.

attr.title: Breaker
attr.desc: a blend of BREAKOUT, SPACE INVADERS and IKARUGA
attr.inst: Download BREAKER.exe from https://managore.itch.io/breaker and place it in the /ports/breaker/gamedata

attr.title: Brittle Blade
attr.desc: In this game, you've lost your sword, and have to make do with the stalactites that fall from the ceiling. Each stalactite is brittle, so it has only one use. After that, it breaks, and you are missing a weapon until another one falls. Developed by FartFish for the Godot Wild Jam 31.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Brogue
attr.desc: Brogue is a single-player strategy game set in the halls of a mysterious and randomly-generated dungeon. The objective is simple enough -- retrieve the fabled Amulet of Yendor from the 26th level -- but the dungeon is riddled with danger.
attr.inst: Game files are already included. Controls are rather complex, make sure to read the control sheet carefully.

attr.title: Broken Pipes
attr.desc: Broken Pipes is a game created by cocawsugar during and for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The jam's theme is out-of-control, so this game is a platformer where the flow of water is out-of-control and the water level increases and decreases constantly.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://cocawsugar-gj2020.itch.io/broken-pipes and extract the data.win file into the game folder.

attr.title: Brotato
attr.desc: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play as a potato wielding up to six weapons to fend off alien hordes. Customize traits and items to survive until help arrives.
attr.inst:
Buy and download the game of Epic https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/brotato-ed4097
Copy the brotato.pck to brotato/gamedata folder

attr.title: Brother Brother
attr.desc: You awake in a small world, in the small house that you share with your brother. His bed is cold and empty, and there’s no sign of his whereabouts. Something doesn’t feel right. Explore the land and gear up, finding your brother is going to be no walk in the park.
attr.inst:
Download the game from steam for FREE here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147850/Brother_Brother/
Once Dowloaded and Installed, In your Library, Right click on it and choose "Manage-Browse Local Files". Copy everything to assets folder.

attr.title: Bugdom
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software's Bugdom updated to run on modern operating systems. Use the touchscreen to navigate the UI.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Bugscraper
attr.desc: Rise to the top of a bug-infested tower by fighting on an elevator. On each floor, waves of enemies will come for your skin (or rather, exoskeleton). With your trusty pea gun, eliminate them and prepare for the next floor!
attr.inst: This game is ready to run.

attr.title: Bumpers & Broadswords
attr.desc: BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS GAIDEN is a Strategy RPG in a world of discs - with every disc (Bumper) possessing HP, ATK, SPD, and a special Ability! In other words, it's a bit Fire Emblem, a bit Lunar Pool, and a bit Yu-Gi-Oh!
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Bumpers & Broadswords Maximum
attr.desc:
BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: MAXIMUM is a tower-scaling, BUMPER-collecting RPG, set in a universe where Yu-Gi-Oh! and Beyblade had a wonderful baby and everyone is obsessed with it.

Ascend BUMPERCORP's TRIAL TOWER, crushing your foes to win their BUMPERS, and win the TOURNAMENT to discover what waits for you at the very top...
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Bumpers & Broadswords Tournament
attr.desc:
BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: TOURNAMENT is a Yu-Gi-Oh!-style tournament-based RPG - explore the open-world-ish city, collect roughly 60 different types of Warriors/Magicians/Beasts/Machines/Etc... to slam against each other and win the Championship!

Each Bumper has its own special effect, so choosing 4 that have a powerful synergy is vital.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Bunny's Flowers
attr.desc: Bunny’s Flowers is a cute, wholesome puzzle game about taking a trip to your grandma's house. Overcome box-pushing challenges using your mysterious magical power.
attr.inst: Copy data.win, audiogroup1.dat and audiogroup2.dat into /ports/bunnysflowers/gamedata from the Steam version of Bunny's Flowers: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1375480

attr.title: Burger Space
attr.desc: Burgertime  is an arcade game where the player is a cook trying to make his 4 hamburgers by stomping on their ingredients (buns, lettuce, ground meat) to knock them down, while avoiding his pursuers - the condiments (eggs, sausage, peppers), who are trying to catch him, but whom he can nonetheless temporarily immobilize with his pepperpot or eliminate by crushing them with one of the ingredients.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Burst
attr.desc: Your aura switches between red and blue every few seconds; hit balls the same color as your aura to gain points. The more balls there are on the screen, the more points you get.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Butterfly Soup
attr.desc: A visual novel about gay asian girls playing baseball and falling in love.
attr.inst: Get the game from itch.io here; https://brianna-lei.itch.io/butterfly-soup (Please consider buying!). Put the contents of the `game` directory into the gamefiles directory in the port.
attr.inst_md: Get the game from [Brianna Lei's itch.io](https://brianna-lei.itch.io/butterfly-soup). Place the contents of the `game/` directory into the `port/butterflysoup/gamefiles/` directory.

attr.title: BYTEPATH
attr.desc: BYTEPATH is a retro-inspired arcade game that combines fast-paced action with strategic skill-building. Players navigate through procedurally generated levels, battling waves of enemies while upgrading their ship and unlocking powerful abilities. With its pixel art aesthetics and challenging gameplay, BYTEPATH offers a nostalgic yet fresh experience for fans of classic arcade shooters.
attr.inst: All files are included. If you like the game, consider supporting the developer by purchasing it from https://store.steampowered.com/app/760330/BYTEPATH.

attr.title: BZFlag
attr.desc:
BZFlag is a 3D multi-player tank battle game that allows users to play against each  other
in  a  networked  environment.   There are five teams:  red, green, blue, purple and rogue
(rogue tanks are black).  Destroying a player on another team scores a  win,  while  being
destroyed  or  destroying  a  teammate  scores a loss.  Rogues have no teammates (not even
other rogues), so they cannot shoot teammates and they do not have a team score.
attr.inst:
All games files are included.
To enter your name START+D-PAD DOWN to enter Input mode UP / Down to enter your name and START to exit the Input mode.

attr.title: C-Dogs
attr.desc: C-Dogs is a classic overhead run-and-gun game
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Caiden's Quest
attr.desc: Caiden's Quest features hand-crafted levels and intense, skill-based gameplay with over 100 handmade levels featuring puzzles, platforming, and secrets to discover. Help Caiden unravel the mystery at Bumblestich. Why are the dead rising from their graves? You'll need to use magic--and your wits-- to defeat the powerful minions of darkness and save the humble villagers.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Cairn
attr.desc: In Cairn, you play as Daisy, an intrepid adventurer bound for the top of a seemingly endless tower. Along the way, you're aided by mysterious wildlife that allow you to shift parts of the ground, writing your name into the path before you. Will you create advantages for yourself to reach the Heaven?
attr.inst:
Download cairn_win_1_1_2.zip file for free from Itch, extract it and in folder 220912win_1_1_2_shiny find cairn.pck file.
Place cairn.pck file into cairn/gamedata folder in your ports.

attr.title: Call to Power 2
attr.desc: Call to Power II is a 4X turn-based strategy game where players guide a civilization from ancient times through to the far future, building cities, researching technologies, and competing with rival nations
attr.inst: You need to copy the "ctp2_data", "ctp2_program", and "Scenarios" folders from either your original Call to Power 2 installation directory or extract them from the GoG version's setup file (setup_call_to_power2_2.0.0.13.exe) using innoextract. You can purchase Call to Power 2 from GOG at https://www.gog.com/en/game/call_to_power_2

attr.title: Cally's Caves 3
attr.desc: Cally's parents have been abducted, as her arch-enemy Herbert has taken control of the Caves to perform his evil experiments. Join Cally and her friends in this action-packed run and gun platformer, conquering insane bosses, exploring to find secrets, and levelling up EVERYTHING.
attr.inst: Download at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/418120/Callys_Caves_3/ and copy data.win and .ogg files into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/418120/Callys_Caves_3/) and copy data.win and .ogg files into assets folder.

attr.title: Cally's Caves 4
attr.desc: Cally’s Caves 4 is a run-and-gun action game, with tons of powerups, weapons, and levels. When your friend needs your help, there’s only one thing to do: LEVEL UP EVERYTHING!
attr.inst: Purchase on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/642580/Callys_Caves_4/ and copy data.win and all .ogg files to assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/642580/Callys_Caves_4/) and copy data.win and all .ogg files to assets folder.

attr.title: Cally's Trials
attr.desc: Cally's Trials is a roguelike action-platformer with a weapon-levelling system that lets you evolve weapons as you use them. Cally must save her parents from the maniacal Herbert, who has laid waste to the Caves and built a massive new base.
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/476510/Callys_Trials/ and place data.win and .ogg's into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/476510/Callys_Trials/) and place data.win and .ogg's into gamedata folder.

attr.title: Canabalt-hf
attr.desc: Escape the destruction of your city with just one button! Canabalt-hf is a HaxeFlixel port of the game that popularized the infinite runner genre.
attr.inst: If your device has an internet connection, assets will be downloaded automatically. If not, download https://github.com/ninjamuffin99/canabalt-assets/archive/refs/heads/main.zip and put it in ports/canabalt/gamedata/.
attr.inst_md: If your device has an internet connection, assets will be downloaded automatically. If not, download [main.zip](https://github.com/ninjamuffin99/canabalt-assets/archive/refs/heads/main.zip) and put it in `ports/canabalt/gamedata/`.

attr.title: Candle Prick
attr.desc: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles. Simple mechanics will give way to complicated scenarios as you discover different ways to interact with the environment.
attr.inst:
The demo is included and ready to run. It's a fun preview — but buy the FULL GAME for the real challenge at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920700/Candle_Prick/

Once it's in your Steam library: Right-click the game, then 'Manage', 'Browse Local Files' and Copy `Candle Prick.pck` into the gamedata folder. Delete the existing `Candle Prick Patched.pck` demo file — otherwise, the full game won't load properly. If not fullscreen? From the in-game starting menu, go to: Options > Options > Video > Fullscreen

attr.title: Candy Bag
attr.desc: You have until midnight to gather as much candy as you can. Maximize flavor in order to get the highest score! Some candies are better at giving you energy, others taste great but take up lots of space!
attr.inst: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks Jon Topielski who created this (https://jontopielski.itch.io)
attr.inst_md: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks [Jon Topielski](https://jontopielski.itch.io/cats-on-mars) who created this!

attr.title: Cannonball
attr.desc: This is the libretro port of the OutRun game engine recreation written by Chris White in 2014.
attr.inst: Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Cannonball Standalone
attr.desc: CannonBall is an souped up game engine for the OutRun arcade game. The original 68000 and Z80 assembler code has been rewritten in C++. This makes it possible to make improvements suitable for modern platforms, including a higher frame-rate and widescreen support. It requires the original ROMs, as these contain elements including the graphics and audio data.
attr.inst:
Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/roms folder.
Support for console tracks and newer features

attr.title: Canto I
attr.desc: Face the Dark Forest of the Divine Comedy in this action platformer inspired by the Sommo Poeta’s masterpiece! Help Dante avoid pitfalls, spikes & specters using double jumps, magical attacks and dashes. Find the scrolls containing the triplets of the Canto exploring this gloomy, pixelart forest!
attr.inst: This game is Ready To Run! Thank You LudosGD!!!

attr.title: Cards with Personalities
attr.desc: Single-player deck-building game full of charm! This deck-building game is trying to be accessible for both newcomers and veterans to the genre, with simple controls and clear rules. Still, each turn needs to be thought-out to beat the charming bosses!
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147020/Cards_with_Personalities/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Carmageddon
attr.desc: Carmageddon is the original freeform driving sensation, where pedestrians (and cows!) equal points, and your opponents are a bunch of crazies in a twisted mix of automotive killing machines.
attr.inst: You need to copy the original game files to ports/carmageddon folder.

attr.title: Carni-Forest
attr.desc: A turn-based, strategy RPG with puzzle blocks!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Carpet Gallery
attr.desc: An endless walker with procedural scenery and objects. Please remove footwear upon entry.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Carries' Order Up
attr.desc:
Carrie's Order Up! is a challenging arcade game inspired by the likes of Pac-Man and Game & Watch. As Carrie, a crab waitress in a port town's restaurant, you have to serve spaghetti, pancakes, and burgers to all kinds of sea creatures without bumping into them!

Mechanics may be simple, but a level of depth to the mechanics exist, with tons of achievements to reward those that learn to master being a crab waitress! If you're looking for a cute and challenging game that lifts inspiration from arcade titles, you'll find hours of entertainment in Carrie's Order Up!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/522490/Carries_Order_Up/ OR https://inkdragonworks.itch.io/carries-order-up 

From Itch:
Download CarriesOrderUp.zip from and unzip the contents to /ports/cariesorderup/gamedata

For Steam:
Download the game and copy the contents from /Carrie's Order Up! to /ports/cariesorderup/gamedata

attr.title: Castlevania 2 Simon's Quest Revamped
attr.desc: A wonderful fanmade revamp of the classic NES title, Castlevania 2 Simon's Quest.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Cat Tactics
attr.desc: Assume the role of Sprinkles and Spyro, cats out for revenge in this Tactical Turn-Based Mini-RPG in 64x64! Jump fences, climb trees and scale rooftops as you adventure through the neighbourhood.
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Cat Warrior
attr.desc: Cat Warrior is an action-platformer of retro and cute style about a cat knight on his way to recapture his stolen treasure. Deep into the dangerous fantasy world,defeat the challenging big boss with your slash, dash, jump, walljump and other skills to find the treasure back!
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy game on Steam and download windows (and/or linux) version. Copy all files from the "catwarrior" folder to "gamedata" folder.

attr.title: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
attr.desc: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a turn-based survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Struggle to survive in a harsh, persistent, procedurally generated world. Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a wide variety of powerful monstrosities, from zombies to giant insects to killer robots and things far stranger and deadlier, and against the others like yourself, that want what you have…
attr.inst: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead has a very complex control scheme. Make sure to read the control section either on the Wiki or in the README file inside cataclysm-dda folder.

attr.title: Catacomb (1989)
attr.desc: Catacomb (1989-1990 DOS) contains 10 levels in this first release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offered to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
attr.inst: Copy your *.CAT files into ports/catacomb89/ and filenames should be uppercase.  If game files are lowercase, the launcher will attempt to convert them to uppercase automatically.  Both the floppy disk and GOG versions are compatible.

attr.title: Catacomb 3D
attr.desc: You are a mage descending into the dungeons of Grelminar the Lich, in order to kill him and save one guy named Nemesis.
attr.inst: Purchase from gog.com at https://www.gog.com/en/game/catacombs_pack and copy the Abyss, Apocalypse, Armageddon, and Cat3D directories into the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase from [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/catacombs_pack) and copy the Abyss, Apocalypse, Armageddon, and Cat3D directories into the port folder.

attr.title: Catacomb II
attr.desc: Catacomb II (Renamed to The Catacomb in 1991) contains 30 new levels and a few new monsters in this follow-up to the 1989-1990 release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offerd to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
attr.inst: Copy your *.CA2 files into ports/catacomb/ and filenames should be uppercase.  If game files are lowercase, the launcher will attempt to convert them to uppercase automatically.  Both the floppy disk and GOG versions are compatible.

attr.title: Cats on Mars
attr.desc: Play a dancing space cat in this pixel rhythm RPG!
attr.inst: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks Jon Topielski and the team who created this https://jontopielski.itch.io
attr.inst_md: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks [Jon Topielski](https://jontopielski.itch.io/cats-on-mars) and the team who created this!

attr.title: Cattails - Become a Cat!
attr.desc: Become a cat! Cattails is a unique animal simulation RPG. Hunt for food, fight invading cats, explore to gather herbs, and socialize with other cats in an expansive open world. Get married and raise a family of kittens, befriend your neighbors, and learn to live in the dangerous wilderness!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/634160/Cattails__Become_a_Cat/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Cave Buster
attr.desc: Play as a little alien guy who crash landed into the core of a dangerous planet.  Make your way through fiery caverns and alien fauna.  Find the super duper Burger and eat it!
attr.inst:
1.Download 1 of the zip files from https://jontopielski.itch.io/cave-buster
2. Copy the "**.pck" file from your downloaded zip into the gamedata folder of the cavebuster folder in your ports. Then rename it to "cavebuster.pck".

attr.title: Cave Crawler
attr.desc: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.
attr.inst:
Ready to Run! 
Special thanks to evan12811 for allowing PortMaster to distribute the game.

attr.title: Cave Crawler 2
attr.desc: Cave Crawler 2 is a retro-inspired 2D side-scroller. Escape a series of winding caves full of strange creatures and treacherous platforming challenges.
attr.inst: Ready To Run!!!

attr.title: Cave Express
attr.desc:
CaveExpress is a classic 2D platformer with physics-based gameplay and dozens of levels. Master your pedal-powered flying machine to pick up packages from your cave-dwelling clients and drop them off at the collection point.

But beware! Mighty mastodons, terrifying pterodactyls and others would rather see you extinct.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Cave Legend Of The Forge
attr.desc: Exploration craft'em-up. Uncover the mysteries of a mountain and forge powerful tools!
attr.inst: Go to https://bitbrain.itch.io/cave/devlog/302573/legend-of-the-forge-update-v01 and download 'cave.exe' from the list of downloads. Put 'cave.exe' into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Cave Packer
attr.desc: CavePacker is a sokoban game. It is a puzzle game where you have to move the packages onto their targets without getting stuck. The lesser steps you made for solving a level, the better. You may only push but not pull packages.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Cave Story (Evo)
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Nxengine-evo engine from https://github.com/nxengine/nxengine-evo
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cave Story lr
attr.desc: Cave Story using the Libretro Retroarch Nxengine core.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Celeste
attr.desc: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight, hand-crafted platformer from the creators of multiplayer classic TowerFall.
attr.inst:
- Install the port via PortMaster.
- Download the DRM-Free version of the game:
  - https://maddymakesgamesinc.itch.io/celeste (linux)
  - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/celeste (windows)
- Copy the game's data into "celeste/gamedata".
- Run the port, the first time setup will take a few minutes.
- Enjoy!
attr.inst_md:
- Install the port via PortMaster.
- Download the DRM-Free version of the game:
  - [Itch.io Store: Celeste](https://maddymakesgamesinc.itch.io/celeste) (linux)
  - [EGS Store: Celeste](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/celeste) (windows)
- Copy the Celeste Linux files into `celeste/gamedata`.
- Run the port, the first time setup will take a few minutes.
- Enjoy!

attr.title: Celeste Classic
attr.desc: Celeste Classic is a C source port of the original celeste (Celeste classic).
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Charge Kid
attr.desc: Charge Kid is a game where each jump is a puzzle. You can compare it to Portal, where you have to find clever uses of the mechanics and physics to "solve" each location by reaching the desired location. You have limited resources to make each jump, comparable to Celeste. But instead of focusing on precision-platforming, the game focuses on the puzzle aspect. Unlike Celeste, the hard part is figuring out how to use your resources to make each jump instead of the execution. But don't get fooled; the execution is also hard, which means finding each solution is even harder!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!
attr.inst_md:
If you liked the game, kindly consider supporting the devs at the following:
Itch.io: [https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid](https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid)
Steam: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/)
Nintendo Switch eshop: [https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/charge-kid-switch/](https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/charge-kid-switch/)

attr.title: Chasm
attr.desc: Explore the depths below a remote mountain town in this procedurally-generated Adventure Platformer. Taking inspiration from hack 'n slash dungeon crawlers and Metroidvania-style platformers, Chasm will immerse you in a fantasy world full of exciting treasure, deadly enemies, and abundant secrets.
attr.inst: Copy the game's assets to the 'chasm/gamedata/' folder.

attr.title: Chasmal
attr.desc: Chasmal is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Descend into a ruined machine using powerful items to overcome foes and reach the bottom of the depths.
attr.inst: Download the game on Steam and copy the Chasmal.x86_64 into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Chess is Stupid
attr.desc: A small, weird Smash TV style shooter made by a painfully mediocre chess player who wanted to shoot the pieces after badly losing.
