Features all types of official chess piece, plus some made-up ones, funny stage names, tile breaking, like Battle Network, cutscenes, references to chess culture, if anyone cares, and UFO 50 palette
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Chicory: A Colorful Tale
attr.desc: Chicory: A Colorful Tale is a top-down adventure game in a coloring book world where you can draw on anything. Use your painting powers to explore new places, solve puzzles, help your friends, and change the world!
attr.desc_md:
Chicory: A Colorful Tale is a top-down adventure game in a coloring book world where you can draw on anything. Use your painting powers to explore new places, solve puzzles, help your friends, and change the world!

**Note: Only Steam version works with the port!
 Patching time is 30 to 60 minutes and uses a swap file (which may reduce the lifespan of your microSD card) for 1GB devices!
 For MuOS pixie: Go to General Settings > Advanced Settings > Set VRAM to 256 and SWAP to 512 for patching. Disable this after patching is done!
 This game has been tested for AmberELEC, ArkOS, MuOS and ROCKNIX firmwares ONLY.
 This port package does not work on the TrimUI Smart Pro/Brick Crossmix or Knulli.
 Requires a device with 2 analog sticks.**
attr.inst:
Purchase your game from Steam. 
Download version Mac 1.0.0.66 by using the Steam console: download_depot 1123450 1123452 2137359438458453377
After the download is complete, place the depot_1123452/ folder into ports/chicoryact.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game from Steam. 
Download the correct version using the Steam console: download_depot 1123450 1123452 2137359438458453377
After the download is complete, place the depot_1123452/ folder into ports/chicoryact.

attr.title: Chip n Dale Rescue Rangers: Remastered
attr.desc: Nutcase was kidnapped by the cat Fatso, and Chip and Dale went to save her. As they begin the operation, they discover that the enemy has plotted more serious difficulties for the entire world. Not only will you need to help Gaika, but also destroy the antagonist's further plans. In the remaster, the developer completely changed the textures and character animations
attr.inst: Ready to run, launch CHIPNDALE.sh

attr.title: Chroma
attr.desc: Chroma is an abstract puzzle game. A variety of colourful shapes are arranged in a series of increasingly complex patterns, forming fiendish traps that must be disarmed and mysterious puzzles that must be manipulated in order to give up their subtle secrets. Initially so straightforward that anyone can pick it up and begin to play, yet gradually becoming difficult enough to tax even the brightest of minds.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Chromavescence
attr.desc: Chromavescence is a retro puzzle platformer where you need to swap between 2 intertwined worlds to get past obstacles on your way. Created  by Barnes for the Kenney Game Jam.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Chromium BSU
attr.desc: fast paced, arcade-style, top-scrolling space shooter
attr.inst: The game is ready to play. The resolution is set to 640x480 by default, and can be adjusted in-game or by editing chromium-bsu.conf.

attr.title: Circa Infinity
attr.desc: Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/390610/Circa_Infinity/ and place the CircaInfinity.exe into the gamedata folder.
It is also available on Itch.io https://kennysun.itch.io/circa-infinity and it comes with a Steam key.
You can also use the free demo, download it from  https://kennysun.itch.io/circa-infinity-demo and place the CircaInfinityDemo.exe into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Circle Breaker Madness
attr.desc:
Circle Breaker Madness is a brick destroying game. Use balls to destroy the bricks but watch out in this circular playing field, as the ball is always on its way out!
Catch it and send it back into the center on its mission to destroy the bricks.
Simple graphics, catchy music and captivating gameplay with arcade and retro feeling.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Itch.io and copy the place Circle Breaker Madness 1.0.1.exe here.txt into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Itch.io](https://goldenforestgames.itch.io/circle-breaker-madness) and copy the place `Circle Breaker Madness 1.0.1.exe` into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: cityglitch
attr.desc: Cityglitch is an indie puzzle game where you play as a sorcerer saving a glitching city. Navigate fragmented urban landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and use magic to restore harmony. With a minimalist art style and soothing soundtrack, Cityglitch offers a captivating and thought-provoking experience.
attr.inst: Download the game from steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/756790/cityglitch/ or from itch https://mindfungus.itch.io/cityglitch and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Clannad
attr.desc: The story follows the life of Tomoya Okazaki, a high school delinquent who meets many people in his last year at school, including five girls, and helps resolve their individual problems. Follows a branching plot line which offers pre-determined scenarios with courses of interaction, and focuses on the appeal of the five female main characters by the player character.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/clannad/gamedata`.

attr.title: Clannad: Tomoyo After - It's A Wonderful Life
attr.desc: Tomoyo After continues the story of Tomoyo Sakagami after the events of Clannad, focusing on her relationship with Tomoya Okazaki and the challenges they face together. It explores themes of love, loss, and redemption against a backdrop of personal growth and emotional healing.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/tomoyo_after/gamedata`.

attr.title: Clash Mastery
attr.desc: This boss fight is too hard. You'll need some practice. Master each attack pattern, one-by-one. Practice makes you tough!
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks to Abhi Sundu (https://abhimonk.itch.io/) for creating this great game and kindly granting PortMaster permission to distribute the game files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks to [Abhi Sundu](https://abhimonk.itch.io/) for creating this great game and kindly granting PortMaster permission to distribute the game files.

attr.title: ClassiCube
attr.desc: ClassiCube is a custom Minecraft Classic compatible client written in C from scratch.
attr.inst: Download and run. If your device doesn't have wifi, install ClassiCube on your PC and copy the "audio" and "texpacks" folders to the port directory.

attr.title: Cleaving Caliber
attr.desc: A Brick-Beaking, Rail-Shooting game trying to be a mixture of Silent Scope and Arkanoid. Get Powerups and use your best mental trigonometry to land Critical Shots!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Cliff Hanger
attr.desc:

attr.title: Commander Genius
attr.desc:
Commander Genius is an open-source clone of Commander Keen, originally developed by Id Software.

Play as Billy Blaze, an eight-year-old genius who becomes Commander Keen to save the galaxy! Grab your pogo stick, neural stunner, and blast off in your homemade Megarocket to stop deadly foes and dodge cosmic dangers—or risk becoming space toast!

Includes episodes 1, 4, 6, and Keen Dreams. Supports additional official/community-made content.
attr.desc_md:
[**Commander Genius**](https://gitlab.com/Dringgstein/Commander-Genius) is an open-source clone of [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen), originally developed by [**Id Software**](https://idsoftware.com).

*You are eight-year-old Billy Blaze, boy genius to your neighborhood. Commander Keen to the rest of the universe. It's time to grab your trusty pogo stick and neural stunner, climb into the cockpit of your homemade Megarocket and blast off for adventure. To prevent the obliteration of life as we know it, you'll have to battle your way past deadly hazards and devious creatures, or end up as space toast.*

Supports addition of [official](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen#Titles)/[community-made](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Main_Page) content
attr.inst:
Includes all of the officially released free content for the Commander Keen series, such as, the shareware episodes (1,4), demo episode (6), and the lost episode: Keen Dreams.

You can add additional content to this port manually or, if you have an internet connected device, through the launcher. Please the Portmaster website for more detailed instructions.
attr.inst_md:
Includes all of the **officially released** free content for the [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen) series, such as, the **shareware episodes** ([1](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_1:_Marooned_on_Mars), [4](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_4:_Secret_of_the_Oracle)), the **demo episode** ([6](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_6:_Aliens_Ate_My_Baby_Sitter!)), and the **lost episode**: [Keen Dreams](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_Dreams).

You can add additional content to this port manually (check `gamedata/instructions.txt`) or, if you have an internet connected device, directly through the launcher itself (button is bottom-left).

attr.title: Crop and Claw
attr.desc:
Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG all about dragons. Delve into swamps, temples, and ruins and fend off flora, fauna, and unsavory dragonfolk.

If you'd like to buy the game and support Dinoleaf, you can purchase it on either Steam and itch.io. The full game is provided by Dinoleaf for Portmaster's distribution free of charge.

The plantlife has gone awry, bringing an era of struggle across the realm. One dragon sets out on adventure, for reasons only known to themselves, to see if the Garden could be restored.
attr.desc_md:
[Crop and Claw](https://dinoleaf.com/presskit/cropandclaw/) is a classic-style JRPG all about dragons. Delve into swamps, temples, and ruins and fend off flora, fauna, and unsavory dragonfolk.

### Support

If you'd like to buy the game and support Dinoleaf, you can purchase it on either [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760970/Crop_and_Claw) and [itch.io](https://dinoleaf.itch.io/crop-and-claw). The full game is provided by Dinoleaf for Portmaster's distribution free of charge.

* [Dinoleaf's RSS Feed](https://dinoleaf.com/feed.xml)
* [Dinoleaf's Discord](https://discord.gg/D3ttpCkmyk)
* [Follow on Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/dinoleaf.com)

### Features

* Multiple dragon types to take the role of, each with their own unique specialties.
* A continent stuffed with dungeons focused on resource management.
* Replayability. Different classes, equipment, and time tracking for speedruns for various playthroughs.
* Supports pixel perfect framing render, a larger black-bar render, and stretched screen raw render for 4:3 fullscreen CRT monitors.
* Dragons, dragons, dragons!

### Summary

Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG centered around dragons in a lush realm known as the "Garden". The plantlife has gone awry, bringing an era of struggle across the realm. One dragon sets out on adventure, for reasons only known to themselves, to see if the Garden could be restored.

The western continent of Garden is vast, hiding plenty of secrets to find. You'll be asked to think and interact with the world around you to find hints to helpful boons, treasures, and leads on your quest to stamp out problems happening across the realm.

Throughout the journey, You'll be encountering a wide variety of antagonistic dragons, floral beasts, and even a few haunting spectres. Combat is simple, with a single player against a single enemy at a moment. There are plenty of techniques to learn and equipment to find, to handle the quirky obstacles in your way.
attr.inst: Crop and Claw ships as a full, self contained game on Portmaster.
attr.inst_md:
Crop and Claw uses the non-Steam PCK to run, and ships with the full game on Portmaster. It should run out of the box on most systems.

### Classic Mode Color Accuracy

Due to performance issues on lower end hardware, the Classic mode color accuracy shader has been disabled. This can be re-enabled by removing `--disable-nes-colors` from `Crop and Claw.sh`, but is only worth doing on stronger devices that should run the game in Classic mode.

attr.title: Crystals of Amalgam

But be aware that time is your enemy. Don't let the orb wall reach the limit range or your ship will be destroyed.

attr.title: Cute Fame: Halloween Bash

3 Endings. 3 Outcomes. 3 People.

(This. The game that is being played. It is a night of deaths. Deaths that may end with you dying. Be careful, As one wrong choice can lead to your death! But, Time to explain this game, I will call it a party, Since that was the location it had happened. An Halloween party)

This game is a visual novel! Most events in this story were meant to be fiction. Although no research has concluded certain events like this never happened to anyone ever. It is also similarly based off the current "Cute Fame" universe, With changes that make some things feel fresh.
attr.desc_md:
Spooktober game jam! 2023

3 Endings. 3 Outcomes. 3 People.

(This. The game that is being played. It is a night of deaths. Deaths that may end with you dying. Be careful, As one wrong choice can lead to your death! But, Time to explain this game, I will call it a party, Since that was the location it had happened. An Halloween party)

This game is a visual novel! Most events in this story were meant to be fiction. Although no research has concluded certain events like this never happened to anyone ever. It is also similarly based off the current "Cute Fame" universe, With changes that make some things feel fresh.

attr.title: Deirdre
attr.desc:
Deirdre is an Action Roguelike game where you fight a looping Gauntlet of Bosses.

One day, a group of tormented prisoners with weapons formed together to get their revenge on the Goddess of Time and her Angels. Over time, they have discovered the magical attributes of Torque. The essence of spin would fuel Deirdre’s Domain the same way Time fuels ours. The heroes would enchant their arsenal with Torque, allowing stronger methods to torment their enemies back.
Will they be able to break Deirdre’s curse? Or are they truly hopeless against Time…
attr.inst: Ready to Run! Thanks to MegaStrimp for giving us permissions to distribute game files!

attr.title: Deltarune
attr.desc: Dive into the parallel story to UNDERTALE! Fight or spare your way through action-packed battles as you explore a mysterious world alongside an endearing cast of new and familiar characters. Chapters 1-4 will be available on launch, with more planned as free updates!
attr.inst: Choose where to download the game from and add all files to `ports/deltarune/assets/install`.

attr.title: Demolition Dome
attr.desc: DEMOLITION DOME is basically 1-v-1 volleyball. Except if the ball smacks you on the back of the head too much, you die. And tanks can shoot at you. And the field has human-sized pinball machine parts. Developed by Harley Wilson aka CURSED BOOTLEG INC.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Demon Keep
attr.desc: Demon Keep is a minimalistic, classic roguelike with a dice rolling twist that is a kin to a mix between Porklike and Dicey Dungeons.
attr.inst: Download the game https://youdoyoubuddy.itch.io/demon-keep and copy the exe or love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Demon of Sakura Pass
attr.desc: A brutal single-player racing game with simplified driving mechanics that reward a good racing line and savagely punish bad technique. Focus on learning each track's unique challenges to overcome each racer and move on to the next. Unwrap the mystery haunting Sakura Pass in a 7-stage campaign.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://brainos.itch.io/touge), download the The Demon of Sakura Pass.exe version and copy it to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://brainos.itch.io/touge), download the *The Demon of Sakura Pass.exe* version and copy it to the port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Demon Slayer
attr.desc: A tough as nails game in the spirit of such titles like Castlevania or Faxanadu. Demon Slayer is an     action packed retro pixel art platformer adventure game, with elements of survival strategy, problem solving,      and resource management.
attr.inst: Purchase at itch.io https://zenteku.itch.io/demon-slayer  Place data.win into assets folder
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [itch.io](https://zenteku.itch.io/demon-slayer)  Place data.win into assets folder

attr.title: Demonizer
attr.desc: The fantasy bullet battle to end monstergirl genocide! Turn hateful humans into lovable demons in this 90s arcade style shooter, inspired by Raiden Fighters, Strikers 1945, and Battle Garegga.
attr.inst: You need to copy the game file (demonizer-demo.love or demonizer-full.love or demonizer demo.exe or ...) in gamedata directory and named it demonizer.love.

attr.title: Demonstone64
attr.desc: A one hit strategy game where you must move through each room, timing your attacks and dodging guards. Can you conquer Castle Demonstone?
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Depths of Limbo
attr.desc: Depths of Limbo is a action roguelike with a dark theme. The fast-paced combat is spiced up with a variety of unique items and weapons found throughout the procedurally generated world. It has elements of the Binding of Isaac's room by room then floor by floor style, and with Nuclear Throne's twin stick controls and focus on weapons and ammo.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/568400/Depths_of_Limbo/ and copy the .exe or .love file into the port folder.

attr.title: Der Clou!
attr.desc: A burglary simulation game originally created by neo Software Produktions GmbH.
attr.inst: Der Clou!'s files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Derelict
attr.desc: The Derelict is a scifi platformer developed by Programmancer for the GBJam5. Navigate the abandoned derelict spacecraft to restore power and stop the evil robot AI, the Master Circuit!
attr.inst: Download the game on https://programancer.itch.io/derelict and place the Derelict.zip to the port's gamedata folder.

attr.title: Descent
attr.desc:
Play as a mercenary sent into planetary mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent/data.

attr.title: Descent II
attr.desc:
Return as a mercenary sent into deep space mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent2/data. Fully compatible with Descent 2: Vertigo and Descent Maximum levels!

attr.title: Descent III
attr.desc: Play the exciting final installment in the Descent trilogy! Saved by amateur do-gooders, the Material Defender sets out to stop the robot virus and Dravis' evil plans once and for all! Pilot through 3D space, navigating through familiar indoor mines and outdoor open space terrain. It's a big universe, but fortunately they threw in a guidebot.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game from GOG or Steam, or use CD game data patched to v1.4. Then, add data files to `descent3/gamedata`. See the readme for specific files needed.

attr.title: Destructivator
attr.desc:
Destructivator is a retro styled platform shooter for the gamer that enjoys a challenge - 20 levels of fast and furious arcade action. Blast your way to Zallagor's lair to rid the world of this evil monster, blah blah blah etc...

Basically just shoot all the bad guys.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://pugfuglygames.itch.io/destructivator and place the contents of the zip into the /gamedata folder

attr.title: Destructivator 2
attr.desc: A platform shooter that brings 90's gaming smashing into your face! Blast and insta-melee your way through hordes of alien soldiers, robots, bosses and loads more. Fight on foot, in a fighter or in a bomber. Take on bosses and ensure that the alien menace won't threaten Earth ever again!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1124990/Destructivator_2/
Download the game and from your Steam library, right click on Destructivator 2>  Manage > Browse local files. Copy the data.win to /ports/destructivator2/gamedata

attr.title: Detective Case and Clown Bot in: Murder in the Hotel Lisbon
attr.desc: Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.
attr.desc_md:
### Description:
Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.

### Game Details:
* Genre: Comedy / Detective / Point-and-Click Adventure
* Languages: Portuguese & English
* Platforms: PC and Consoles
* Developer: Nerd Monkeys
* Inspired by classic adventure games, this title combines witty dialogue, intriguing puzzles, and a distinctive visual style to deliver a unique storytelling experience.

### About Nerd Monkeys:
Founded in April 2013, [Nerd Monkeys](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nerd-monkeys) is a Portuguese game development and publishing studio passionate about captivating storytelling, unique visuals, and meaningful gameplay.
attr.inst: Buy the game and download the Windows version. Copy files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md:
* Buy the game and download the Windows version from [itch.io](https://nerdmonkeys.itch.io/detective-case-and-clown-bot-in-murder-in-the-hotel-lisbon) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/297290/Detective_Case_and_Clown_Bot_in_Murder_in_the_Hotel_Lisbon)
* Copy the game files into assets folder

attr.title: Devil Spire
attr.desc: Devil Spire is a hardcore first-person pseudo-3D roguelite action RPG dungeon crawler stylized after retro PC games, developed by a guy and his bros while locked in quarantine. Inspired by classics like King's Field and Heretic.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo version.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](store.steampowered.com/app/1861290/Devil_Spire/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo version.

attr.title: DevilutionX
attr.desc: DevilutionX is a source port of Diablo from https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX.
attr.inst: Includes the Diablo shareware version.  You can add your own full version DIABDAT.MPQ file to the ports/devilution folder.  To run the Diablo: Hellfire expansion you will need to also copy hellfire.mpq, hfmonk.mpq, hfmusic.mpq, hfvoice.mpq. See wiki if you experience issues with version upgrades or configuration changes.

attr.title: DEVOLVER Bootleg
attr.desc: Devolver Bootleg contains 8 original rip offs of Devolver games.
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1066260/Devolver_Bootleg/ Locate the data.win, MAP File, DUNGEON File, 2 folders and copy them into `ports/devbootleg/assets/`.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1066260/Devolver_Bootleg/) Locate the data.win, MAP File, DUNGEON File, 2 folders and copy them into `ports/devbootleg/assets/`.

attr.title: Diceheck
attr.desc:
TIME TO GO TO DICEHECK
WHO KNOWS WHAT YOU'LL ROLL
attr.inst: Download Dicehckwin.zip from https://sirmilkman.itch.io/diceheck and put the game files in ports/diceheck/assets
attr.inst_md: Download Dicehckwin.zip from [itch.io](https://sirmilkman.itch.io/diceheck) and put the game files in ports/diceheck/assets

attr.title: Dicey Dungeons
attr.desc:
Become a giant walking dice and battle to the end of an ever-changing dungeon! Can you escape the cruel whims of Lady Luck?

In this fast-paced deckbuilding roguelike from Terry Cavanagh, Chipzel, and Marlowe Dobbe, you'll fight monsters, find better loot, and level up your heroes as you work together to take down the Goddess of Fortune, Lady Luck herself. Balance your carefully planned strategies against the unknown of a dice roll.
attr.desc_md:
Become a giant walking dice and battle to the end of an ever-changing dungeon! Can you escape the cruel whims of Lady Luck?

In this fast-paced deckbuilding roguelike from Terry Cavanagh, Chipzel, and Marlowe Dobbe, you'll fight monsters, find better loot, and level up your heroes as you work together to take down the Goddess of Fortune, Lady Luck herself. Balance your carefully planned strategies against the unknown of a dice roll.
attr.inst: Purchase the game and download the linux version. For GOG, place dicey_....sh in ports/diceydungeons/gamedata. For Steam/itch, place game files in ports/diceydungeons/gamedata.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game and download the linux version. For GOG, place `dicey_....sh` in `ports/diceydungeons/gamedata`. For Steam/itch, place game files in `ports/diceydungeons/gamedata`.

attr.title: Digger
attr.desc: Digger port based on the DOS version (remastered)
attr.inst:
Ready to run.
Source: https://github.com/sobomax/digger

attr.title: DigitalTamers Reborn
attr.desc: Train, fight, evolve! Digital Tamers: ReBorn is a casual fighting game for all Digimon fans. Your mission is to take care of your partner, keep it strong, healthy in order to evolve and win battles and several prizes! Excel and win the 12 Championships that will take place throughout the year in order to become a true Digimon Tamer! Live this experience and welcome, to the Digital World!
attr.inst: Download the Windows executable from https://dragonrod342.itch.io/digital-tamers-reborn and put in the `ports/digitamersreborn/assets` folder..

attr.title: Dimension Tripper Neptune TOP NEP
attr.desc: Guide Older Neptune as she takes to the skies with the help of her state-of-the-art Generator Unit! Combat through five unique stages and bosses based on the Gamindustri Nations. Blast through fast-moving obstacles and even fight some familiar Neptunia enemies and bosses! And if you gather enough coins on each stage, a friend will assist you on attacks. Challenge yourself and see what your highest score can be! Now, put on your gaming goggles, Maverick, and ready up for the wildest Neptunia ride of your life!
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the game and copy over the game files to ports/topnep/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1798780/Dimension_Tripper_Neptune_TOP_NEP/)
From your Steam Library, Dimension Tripper Neptune: TOP NEP> Manage > Browse local files
Copy the files into ports/topnep/gamedata. The game will patch on first startup.

attr.title: Dinothawr
attr.desc: Dinothawr is a block pushing puzzle game on slippery surfaces.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Disc Room
attr.desc:
Are you ready to get sliced in half? The year is 2089 and a giant disc has appeared in orbit of Jupiter. Step into the oversized space suit of a brave scientist and explore this sprawling intergalactic slaughterhouse.
Explore the expansive orbiting disc ship, moving room to room surviving and completing increasingly complex goals set forth. Use unlocked abilities to outmaneuver dozens of different disc types while solving mysterious puzzles.
And remember: what kills you only makes you stronger.
attr.desc_md:
Are you ready to get sliced in half? The year is 2089 and a giant disc has appeared in orbit of Jupiter. Step into the oversized space suit of a brave scientist and explore this sprawling intergalactic slaughterhouse.
Explore the expansive orbiting disc ship, moving room to room surviving and completing increasingly complex goals set forth. Use unlocked abilities to outmaneuver dozens of different disc types while solving mysterious puzzles.
And remember: what kills you only makes you stronger.

**Note: Currently only works with the Steam/GOG Version of the game!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam or gog.
Download the game and add the game data to discroom/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1229580/Disc_Room/) or [gog](https://www.gog.com/en/game/disc_room).
Download the windows version of the game and add the game data to discroom/gamedata.

attr.title: Diver Down
attr.desc: Diver Down is a stealth-platformer. Avoid the lights on 20 different stages using your mysterious Diver Down ability, that allows you to dive onto solids! .
attr.inst: Ready to run.

donottakethiscathome.zip.name: donottakethiscathome.zip
items: Do Not Take This Cat Home.sh

attr.title: Do NOT Take This Cat Home
attr.desc:
WARNING: This game is not suitable for children or the easily disturbed. It includes depictions of horror elements, human/animal violence and death, abuse/abusive relationship(s), disturbing images, loud noises, flashing images/lights and more. 


Imagine it’s your day off, and the dreary weather only adds to your gloom. Your curiosity gets the better of you as you follow a mysterious, distant call to a dark and lonely alley. There, in a cardboard box, sits an irresistibly cute cat. What will you do next?
attr.inst: Download the DoNOTTakeThisCatHome-1.0-pc.zip from https://pixeliminal.itch.io/do-not-take-this-cat-home and extract it. Then copy its game folder in the ports/donottakethiscathome/ folder

attr.title: Dodd Goes to the Museum
attr.desc: Explore Dodd's local museum in this short, casual and relaxing adventure! Visit various exhibits within the museum's four wings and talk to various characters along the way!
attr.inst: Ready to run!
attr.inst_md: Ready to run!

attr.title: Dodgin Diamonds 2D
attr.desc: This is a little shoot’em up arcade game for one or two players. It aims to be an ‘old school’ arcade game with low resolution graphics, top-down scroll action, energy based gameplay and different weapons with several levels of power.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Dokimon: Quest
attr.desc: Dokimon: Quest is a game where you capture monsters to battle alongside and push through the dangerous open world. In advances to uncover the the mystery about your missing friend, you must become stronger, allowing you to venture on into increasingly dangerous areas. Battle against fellow Dokimon battlers who are also on the quest to get stronger, and take down evil corporations that stand in your way and disrupt the peace.
attr.inst: Includes the demo! To use the full game, buy it on Steam or Itch.io and copy all the data to `ports/dokimon/assets`. The patcher will run whenever it finds new files in the assets folder.

attr.title: Dome Romantik
attr.desc: Dig your way through to the core of the planet. Mine minerals, bring them back to your dome and install upgrades just in time to defend from hostile lifeforms.
attr.inst: Launch DomeRomantik.sh

attr.title: Don Ceferino Hazaña
attr.desc: A game similar to the classic Super Pang. Don Ceferino Hazaña is a gaucho from Argentina who must rescue his cow from the aliens. In the best Super Pang style, in this game the most important thing is the skill of the player.
attr.inst: Ready to run! Main Menu is a tad slow but ingame it works great!

attr.title: Don't Hide
attr.desc: Trapped in a maze with a beast, you must find five keys and their door to escape. The monster can only smell and hear you, but as long as it hasn't fully caught your scent, you can move freely.
attr.inst:
Download the game For Free from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2131620/Dont_Hide/
Or
From Itch.io:
https://sulfic-games.itch.io/dont-hide
and Copy the DontHideGame.pck file into the gamedata folder

attr.title: Donut Dodo
attr.desc: If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo -- a classic 2D platformer from the golden era, tough as nails and challenging for the whole family! Ready to top the high score table?
attr.inst: You can purchase Donut Dodo at: https://zapposh.itch.io/donut-dodo-retropie-edition. Download and extract it, and place the DonutDodo.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with DonutDodo_1_39.zip
attr.inst_md:
You can purchase Donut Dodo at: https://zapposh.itch.io/donut-dodo-retropie-edition

Download and extract it, and place the DonutDodo.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with DonutDodo\_1\_39.zip

attr.title: Doom 2D
attr.desc: Doom 2D is a fan-made DOS-based freeware side-scrolling video game released by Prikol Software in August 1996. It is based upon Doom, similar to Doom 2D - Knee deep in the dead. Doom 2D is essentially the original Doom translated into a two-dimensional arcade or console-like shooter, comparable to the original Duke Nukem. The player resumes their role as Doomguy, who must do battle with various hell-spawn.
attr.inst: Ready to Run.

attr.title: Doom 3
attr.desc: Doom 3 is a 2004 survival horror first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by Activision.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/doom3/base folder.

attr.title: Doom Engines
attr.desc:
Doom engines! A Love2D launcher makes selecting games and mods easy. See the readme for instructions and details.

Includes shareware demo files and freedoom.
attr.inst: Comes with shareware files for Doom and freedoom bundle for mod use. Add your full game files to their respective folders to play.

attr.title: Doom II RPG
attr.desc: DOOM II RPG is a follow-up in the style of the Wolfenstein RPG, chronologically set before the events in DOOM RPG. Thanks to secret experiments, the various UAC Bases on Mars, the Moon, Earth and wherever else the cooperation has set foot have experienced incidents involving demons. A team of soldiers including a scientist are sent to Tycho Station on the Moon to investigate.
attr.inst: Search for "Doom 2 RPG.ipa" on archive.org to get the original mobile game assets file: and copy the "Doom 2 RPG.ipa" file into the doom2rpg folder.

attr.title: Doom RPG
attr.desc: Doom RPG is a mobile phone game developed by Fountainhead Entertainment . It combines the Doom first-person shooter franchise with role-playing video game elements. The storyline incorporates many similar events of Doom 3, but involves different characters than those in the third game.
attr.inst: Search for Doom RPG BREW on archive.org to get the original mobile game assets file: doomrpg.bar (CRC32: d7cf11c5) and copy the doomrpg.bar file into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: DoomRL
attr.desc: DRL (D**m, the Roguelike) is a fast and furious coffee-break Roguelike game, that is heavily inspired by the popular FPS game Doom by ID Software.
attr.inst: Game files are already included. Controls are rather complex, make sure to read the control sheet carefully.

attr.title: Doukutsu-rs
attr.desc:
Arguably the most well-known indie game of all time, Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari) features a completely original storyline wrapped with personality, mystery and hours of fast-paced fun.

This port is a build of doukutsu-rs, a fully playable re-implementation of the Cave Story engine written in Rust. You can play the original freeware game (bundled with the port), or Cave Story+ which has enhanced graphics, sound, challenges and co-op play.
attr.desc_md:
Arguably the most well-known indie game of all time, Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari) features a completely original storyline wrapped with personality, mystery and hours of fast-paced fun.

This port is a build of [doukutsu-rs](https://github.com/doukutsu-rs/doukutsu-rs), a fully playable re-implementation of the Cave Story engine written in Rust. You can play the original freeware game (bundled with the port), or Cave Story+ which has enhanced graphics, sound, challenges and co-op play.
attr.inst: The original freeware game is included, and will be used automatically if you don't provide any files. You can download one of the translations from https://www.cavestory.org/download/cave-story.php , or buy Cave Story+ on Steam or elsewhere. Put the files from either version (`data` and surrounding files) in ports/doukutsu-rs.
attr.inst_md: The original freeware game is included, and will be used automatically if you don't provide any files. You can download one of the translations from [here](https://www.cavestory.org/download/cave-story.php), or buy Cave Story+ on Steam or elsewhere. Put the files from either version (`data` and surrounding files) in `ports/doukutsu-rs`.

attr.title: Downwell
attr.desc: Downwell is a curious game about a young person venturing down a well in search of untold treasures with only his Gunboots for protection. Make your way further and further down into the darkness filled with nasty creatures and mysterious secrets to collect the spectacular red gems scattered about the rocks. Step into precariously placed shops and buy some helpful items or level up between levels to battle well-dwelling monsters and uncover hidden caves filled with riches and relics. No two trips down the well are ever the same!
attr.inst:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/360740/Downwell/ OR  https://www.gog.com/en/game/downwell.
Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/downwell/assets. Alternatively place the gog installer (.exe) in /ports/downwell/assets.

attr.title: Dr. Bloodshot
attr.desc: Dr. Bloodshot is a short survival horror game. It's set in an old mansion filled with monsters that the player has to avoid (either by running away or by hiding in cabinets). The objective is to reach the well secured laboratory of Dr. Bloodshot, which can be done by sabotaging various power stations across the mansion.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Dracula's Tower
attr.desc:
Dracula is back from the dead again, and this time he brought a really tall tower!

Jump over rolling skulls, whip candles and throw axes through 6 levels of extremely brutal platforming as you climb both ladders and the highscore table.
attr.inst: Download the DRACULAS_TOWER_V2_itchio.zip from Itch.io, and place it into assets folder.

attr.title: Dragon vs Hunters
attr.desc:
Defend your nest, burn your enemies, and rule the skies!
Dragon vs Hunters is a fast-paced, retro-style action game where you play as a mighty dragon trying to protect its precious eggs from waves of relentless hunters.
attr.desc_md:
**Defend your nest, burn your enemies, and rule the skies!**
*Dragon vs Hunters* is a fast-paced, retro-style action game where you play as a mighty dragon trying to protect its precious eggs from waves of relentless hunters.
attr.inst: Buy the game on https://coolgeek.itch.io/dragon-vs-hunters , download dragonvshunters-v1.0-pyxapp.zip and unzip it in the dragonvshunters/gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md: Buy the game on [itch.io](https://coolgeek.itch.io/dragon-vs-hunters), download `dragonvshunters-v1.0-pyxapp.zip` and unzip it in the `dragonvshunters/gamedata` directory.

attr.title: dRally
attr.desc: Death Rally is a vehicular combat racing video game developed by Remedy Entertainment, published by Apogee Software and distributed by GT Interactive.

Instructions: Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2598080/Drift_Survivor/). Download the game.

attr.title: Drilbert II Diggeredoo
attr.desc: Drilbert the Drill Boy is back! Help Drilbert fulfill his dream of drilling as deep as he can! A little puzzle game where you dig + push. Dig Deep; collect loot; get out.

attr.title: Drink'n'Drive
attr.desc: A vertical arcade racing game where your vehicle is out of control. You must refrain from crashing into oncoming cars and see how many you can dodge.
attr.inst: Download the .exe and place it into the gamedata folder

attr.title: DROID7
attr.desc: Jump your way up on a generated tower while a laser beam chases you from below. The higher you go, the faster it gets, and it isn't long before disappearing (and reappearing) platforms and spikes are introduced to make your life harder.
attr.inst:
You can purchase DROID7 at: https://juancolacelli.itch.io/droid7

Download any Windows or Linux version and extract it, and place the DROID7.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with Windows 64-bit, Dec 30 2022 release

attr.title: Ducklings Maze
attr.desc: Embark on a feathered adventure in Ducklings Maze, where you play as a courageous duck on a mission to rescue your adorable ducklings and lead them safely back home through a challenging maze. Inspired by the fairy tale "Den grimme aelling" by Hans Christian Andersen, the game is a medium/high difficulty maze with all the elements that an 80s arcade game requires.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball
attr.desc: A video game that crosses the tried-and-true gameplay of Pong with the competitive frenzy of foosball. Billed as the world's first 'sportslike', tongue firmly planted in cheek.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings -- download the Android version, place the apk in dudelingsarcadesportsball/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings](https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings) -- download the Android version, place the apk in `dudelingsarcadesportsball/gamedata`

attr.title: Dueling Dragons
attr.desc:
In its search for power, humanity dug too deep. Cracking open the earth above an ancient nuclear waste tomb, radiation spread throughout the world, warped by centuries of rotting. Sorcerers and dragons were created by the radiation's twisted power, and soon dragon riders took to the skies and began terrorizing the planet.

You are an errant dragon rider on a quest to find and defeat the legendary Dragon Lord. Time your attacks well, gather new spells, and soar through the skies atop your dragon.
attr.inst: Ready to Run.

attr.title: Duke Nukem 3D
attr.desc: Duke Nukem 3D using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version duke3d.grp and duke.rts Duke Nukem 3D Atomic files to the ports/rednukem/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Duke Nukem 3D - Alien World Order
attr.desc: Duke Nukem 3D - Alien World Order is the fifth episode of Duke Nukem 3D. The fifth episode was added to the game as part of the 20th Anniversary Edition and contains eight levels, including one secret level. Levels in this episode are based in cities from around the world, including Amsterdam, Moscow, London, Giza, Paris, San Francisco, Hollywood, and Rome. The final boss is the Cycloid Incinerator.
attr.inst: Obtain game files from your Steam copy of Alien World Tour.  See 'ports/duke3dawo/Place Duke3D AWT files here.txt'  for instructions to place your Alien World Tour contents into the duke3dawo directory.

attr.title: Dumbass Smartass
attr.desc: Dumbass/smartass is a short pixel-art point & click adventure made for the $108 Adventure Game Challenge. It's a surreal, somewhat existential story about language barriers, holograms, and cognitive bias.
attr.desc_md: **Dumbass/smartass** is a short pixel-art point & click adventure made for the $108 Adventure Game Challenge. It's a surreal, somewhat existential story about language barriers, holograms, and cognitive bias.
attr.inst: This port is Ready To Run!

attr.title: Dumpy & Bumpy
attr.desc: Experience a clever take on retro Japanese puzzle games. Bite, blow up, and break through 80 charming but challenging levels. Crack each level's code and crush the evil Ghostlord. Be sure to make haste, though, or the Ghost minions will make waste ... of you!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://programancer.itch.io/dumpy) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631500/Dumpy_and_Bumpy). First, extract the .zip (if itch.io version), then copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://programancer.itch.io/dumpy) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631500/Dumpy_and_Bumpy). First, extract the *.zip* (if itch.io version), then copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Dune Legacy
attr.desc: Dune II: The Building of a Dynasty (aka Dune II: Battle for Arrakis) is the first-ever real-time strategy game. The player takes the role of the commander of one of the three interplanetary houses, the Atreides, the Harkonnen or the Ordos, with the objective of wresting control of Arrakis from the other two houses. This port is a build of Dune Legacy, which is an effort by a handful of developers to revitalize the game. It is as similar as possible to the original gameplay but integrates modern UI features like selecting multiple units.
attr.desc_md: Dune II: The Building of a Dynasty (aka Dune II: Battle for Arrakis) is the first-ever real-time strategy game. The player takes the role of the commander of one of the three interplanetary houses, the Atreides, the Harkonnen or the Ordos, with the objective of wresting control of Arrakis from the other two houses. This port is a build of [Dune Legacy](https://dunelegacy.sourceforge.net/website/), which is an effort by a handful of developers to revitalize the game. It is as similar as possible to the original gameplay but integrates modern UI features like selecting multiple units.
attr.inst: You need to copy the original game's .PAK files (e.g. from the PC release) to ports/dunelegacy/.
attr.inst_md: You need to copy the original game's `.PAK` files (e.g. from the PC release) to `ports/dunelegacy/`.

attr.title: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup
attr.desc: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup is a game of dungeon exploration, combat and magic, involving characters of diverse skills, worshipping deities of great power and caprice. To win, you'll need to be a master of tactics and strategy, and prevail against overwhelming odds.
attr.inst: Game files are already included. Controls are rather complex, make sure to read the control sheet carefully.

attr.title: Dungeon Souls
attr.desc: Dungeon Souls is an action-adventure roguelike dungeon crawler which draws heavy inspiration from Nuclear Throne, Risk of Rain, and Overture. Explore vast procedurally generated dungeons, collect loot, and slay hordes of challenging enemies!
attr.inst: Download game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/383230/Dungeon_Souls/ or Humble, GOG files do not work at this time. Rename DungeonSouls.exe to DungeonSouls.zip, extract. Copy data.win and all .ogg files to /ports/dungeonsouls/gamedata . If controls are incorrectly mapped, from the title screen select options, enable gamepad, then select back and quit from the main menu. Controls should be good to go on subsequent launches.

attr.title: DungeonRush
attr.desc: A opensource game inspired by Snake, written in pure C with SDL
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Dust - an Elysian Tail
attr.desc: Immerse yourself in a gorgeous hand-painted world on a search for your true identity. As the mysterious warrior, Dust, your action-packed journey will take you from peaceful glades to snowy mountaintops and beyond.
attr.inst: Purchase Dust: an Elysian Tail on Steam. Open the Steam Console with this Windows+R then paste this: "steam://open/console". Run this command to download the Linux version: download_depot 236090 236092 3643140810355546394. Copy all files to ports/dustaet/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
- Purchase Dust: an Elysian Tail on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/236090/Dust_An_Elysian_Tail/?curator_clanid=4777282).
- Open the Steam Console with this Windows+R then paste this: "steam://open/console".
- Run this command to download the Linux version: download_depot 236090 236092 3643140810355546394
-  Copy all files to ports/dustaet/gamedata
- Run Dust: An Elysian Tail.

attr.title: Dynamate Playdate
attr.desc: Dynamate is a puzzle game where the aim of the game, in any level, is to clear the level of the numbered / colored pieces. Pieces can be removed in a predefined way by moving another piece into them. There are also pieces affecting the currently moving piece. This is a port of the Playdate Version which was based on the gp2x version of the game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: E.Z
attr.desc: E.Z is a simple hardcore platformer game the goal being get across to the other side of each of the 100 levels while each death throws you back to the previous levels.
attr.desc_md:
E.Z is a simple hardcore platformer game the goal being get across to the other side of each of the 100 levels while each death throws you back to the previous levels.

With a semi-random level sequence, level variability and quick level swapping, E.Z is hard to get used to. It will bring a challenge to your skill, reaction, and adaptability.

Note: Text may be unreadable on smaller devices but this does not affect gameplay!
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game and from your Steam library and copy the data.win to /ports/ez/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/795040/EZ/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on E.Z > Manage > 
Browse local files. 
Copy the data.win from the assets folder to /ports/ez/gamedata

attr.title: Echo Chamber
attr.desc:
Wizard roguelike
Traverse a dungeon and add a new spell each time you clear a floor.

Your spells cycle in a loop.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Edna - Out of Sight
attr.desc: Play as Edna and make your way through a castle by possessing statues within your line of sight. Solve puzzles by manipulating doors, switches, and mirrors.
attr.inst: Download [windows] Edna - Out of sight, out of control.zip from https://kz.itch.io/edna and copy edna.pck to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Eity
attr.desc: Eity is a rhythm game with cool music.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Elec Dude
attr.desc:
"Dr. Darkglass" wants to Conquer the World, so he stole all the Energy supplies to create his Evil Robots. There is only one benign and that is "Elec Dude", he is the last Hope to save Mankind.
This Game is about collecting all the Energy per Level and there by getting to the next Level. But be careful not to collide with Enemy Robots.

Note: Only works with the steam version for now!
attr.inst:
Itch: Download ElecDude.zip from https://misteryjay.itch.io/elec-dude-full and unzip the contents to /ports/elecdude/gamedata

Steam: Claim the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907980/Elec_Dude/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Elec Dude>  Manage > Browse local files. Copy the all the game files from /Elec Dude to /ports/elecdude/gamedata

attr.title: ElecHead
attr.desc: In a world enshrouded by darkness, deep inside a factory, the light of hope still shines. ElecHead has you play as Elec, a small robot on a mission to bring light back to the world. When Elec touches walls, floors, platforms, switches, and more, he makes electricity run through them, activating them. He can also detach and throw his head to trigger things remotely, but be careful: if he doesn't get his head back within ten seconds, he will shut down. Elec will have to use his head, literally and figuratively, to find a way out of this trap-ridden facility.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://namatakahashi.itch.io/elechead or Steam or GOG.
Download the game and copy over the files to ports/elechead/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from https://namatakahashi.itch.io/elechead or Steam or GOG.
Download the game and copy over the files to ports/elechead/gamedata.

Tested with itch.io (ElecHead(Win1.0.5).zip,), Steam and GOG (GOG elechead 1.0.5.1)

attr.title: Elsewhere in the Night
attr.desc: A 2D psychic noir point-and-click adventure where you play as Lady Tick Tock, a detective who speaks to the dead to solve a string of murders in a dystopian city. With EGA-inspired pixel art and a narrative-focused design free of arcade sequences or dead ends, the game offers a gripping story you can explore at your own pace.
attr.inst: Download the Elsewhere in the Night.rar version for free at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/elsewhere-in-the-night). Extract the .rar, and copy the Elsewhere in the Night.pck file to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *Elsewhere in the Night.rar* version for free at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/elsewhere-in-the-night). Extract the *.rar*, and copy the *Elsewhere in the Night.pck* file to this port's *gamedata* folder.

Escape is a fun puzzle game in the tradition of Adventures of Lolo or Chip's Challenge 
Unlike either of those games, Escape doesn't rely at all on reflexes—it's all about your brain.

As part of an elite fighter group, you will be granted a huge variety of upgradeable weapons, which you can use to stop the invading Colonial forces. Destroy your enemies as fast as possible, collect points, and put your highscore on the online leaderboard.

This is the unofficial remake of Konami's F-1 SPIRIT which was originally

attr.title: Fables of Talumos

For `Steam` version, copy all game files into the `assets` folder. For `Itch` version, download the zip with the game and extract all files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: FAITH Demon Siege
attr.desc: Starting with nothing, you enter the grove and fend off demons. After each wave, a shop will open where you can upgrade your stats or buy items that modify your attacks and defense.

attr.title: FAITH: The Unholy Trinity
attr.desc: From the developer, Airdorf Games: "FAITH is a pixel horror game inspired by the era of classic 8-bit gaming and the Satan Scare of the 1980s. Use your holy crucifix to perform exorcisms, fight back against possessed cultists, and cleanse haunted objects. Discover a world of dread, isolation, and mystery as you explore haunted forests, abandoned churches, and the inner sanctums of a Satanic cult."
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or GOG and add the game data to 'ports/faiththeunholytrinity/assets', important files are data.win, audiogroup1.dat through audiogroup18.dat, and UTconfigs.cvs files.

attr.title: Fallen Leaf
attr.desc: Take control of Leaf, an eager treasure hunter tasked with putting a stop to a repressive, merciless ruler reawakened by his own hand! Aided by newfound magical gauntlets, and an ever-growing list of extended relatives, he'll venture high and low through dark caves, deep oceans, dense city skylines, and even the clouds just to find that one special item with the power to vanquish evil!
attr.inst: Copy game into the assets folder. The game is available on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1459010/Fallen_Leaf/

attr.title: Falling Time
attr.desc: Arcade game inspired by Fall Down.

attr.title: Farmner
attr.desc: *single stick command included in the directory, rename and boot* Your daughter has gone missing. You have followed footsteps next to a path to what seems to be an abandoned farmland. There are torches still glowing hot, where is everyone? Find your daughter, quickly!.

attr.title: Feather Park
attr.desc: Explore an autumn park and play minigames. Make friends and enter the barn.

attr.title: Fell
attr.desc:
Fell is a short precision platformer about a kid who Fell down a hole. Play through 30 one-screen levels to get to the crown and then try to beat it backward!

The game features a toggleable speedrun timer and death counter!
attr.inst: Install port. Then download Fell.zip file from Itch.io, extract it and place files into the ports/fell/assets folder.

attr.title: Fheroes 2
attr.desc: fheroes2 is a recreation of the Heroes of Might and Magic II game engine
attr.inst: Add your own data, maps, music, sound folders from HOMM2 GOG version to ports/fheroes2 folder. Folder names are case sensitive and should be lower case. Files inside folders should not be renamed.

attr.title: Fight or Perish
attr.desc: Fight or Perish is a dungeon crawling adventure for up to four players. Choose from four different characters. Pickup keys to unlock doors. Collect treasure to increase your score. Eat food to keep your health up. Use bombs to wipe of masses of enemies.

attr.title: Final Quest
attr.desc: Embark on an exciting journey in Final Quest: A Godot Research, a unique blend of a captivating 2D platform game and an in-depth research guide for the Godot game engine.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Finding Paradise
attr.desc: Finding Paradise is an adventure game developed and published by Freebird Games. Serving as a sequel to To the Moon and A Bird Story, the story continues with doctors Eva Rosalene and Neil Watts as they help to fulfill a wish for Colin Reeds, who is now a bedridden old man.
attr.inst: If using the GOG Version place the finding_paradise_*.sh installer to the root of the finding_paradise folder or extract the contents of the data/noarch/game/ folder into finding_paradise/gamedata/

attr.title: Fire and Fondness 2
attr.desc:
A puzzle game about rescuing your loved one from hazardous situations! Also, a send-up of daytime television.

Daytime television just got hot: in the hit gameshow, Fire & Fondness, 
young lovers put their relationships to the test in the ultimate courtship ritual:
 attempting to navigate a succession of convoluted, flamethrower-filled deathtraps.

It also has a dog.

attr.title: Fire Arrow Plus

attr.inst: Purchase from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/509780/Fire_Arrow_Plus/ and copy the FA1 and FAX folders into the port folder (/ports/firearrow/).  The itch.io version's two zip files can be copied directly into the port folder - v2.7.17 has been tested working.  Additionally, you can copy the data.win and all .ogg files from each of these folders into the respective gamedata folders (/ports/firearrow/firearrow/gamedata/ & /ports/firearrow/firearrowx/gamedata/).
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/509780/Fire_Arrow_Plus/) and copy the FA1 and FAX folders into the port folder (/ports/firearrow/).  The itch.io version's two zip files can be copied directly into the port folder - v2.7.17 has been tested working.  Additionally, you can copy the data.win and all .ogg files from each of these folders into the respective gamedata folders (/ports/firearrow/firearrow/gamedata/ & /ports/firearrow/firearrowx/gamedata/).

The whole game is accompanied by quiet, comforting music.

attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1645940/Flaskoman) and copy the game files to the port `gamedata` directory.

attr.title: Flip of Dark
attr.desc:
A small precision platformer where you can instantly flip onto the ceiling and walls. You lost your slice of fruit, and have to get it back.

attr.title: Flynn: Son of Crimson

attr.title: Flywrench

Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Flywrench >  Manage > Browse local files. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/flywrench/gamedata

attr.title: FNAF NES STYLED
attr.desc: In FNAF NES STYLED, you play as a night security guard at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. Your main goal is to survive five nights while being stalked by animatronic characters that come to life at night. You monitor security cameras to track their movements and use limited resources like door controls and lights to protect yourself from being caught. The game is a mix of strategy and horror, requiring you to manage your resources carefully and stay alert to avoid the animatronics.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://tai5-5.itch.io/fnafnes extract the downloaded zip. After that put the data.win into fnafnes/gamedata

attr.title: Fool's End
attr.desc:
Fool's End is a fast-paced single-player mining game. Dig and destroy everything in your path, outsmart monsters and mine your path to complete each level. There's always another way to escape...  
**Note:This port includes a demo. Purchase on Steam for the full game!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on steam.  
Open up the steam console by typing 'steam://open/console' into a web browser.  
 Enter the following command: `download_depot 2636260 2636261 548360717410745371`.  
 Place the contents of depot_2636261 folder into foolsend/assets.
attr.inst_md:
1. Purchase the game on [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2636260/Fools_End/).  
2. Open up the steam console by typing 'steam://open/console' into a web browser.  
3. Enter the following command: `download_depot 2636260 2636261 548360717410745371`.  
4. Place the contents of depot_2636261 folder into foolsend/assets.

attr.title: Frozen Bubble
attr.desc: Frozen Bubble is a free software clone of Puzzle Bobble. Frozen Bubble's protagonist is a penguin a la Tux, the mascot of Linux and popular feature in many free software/open-source games. In this game, Tux has to shoot colored frozen bubbles to form groups of the same color. Such groups disappear and the object is to clear the whole screen in this way before a bubble passes a line at the bottom. There is a single player mode and a multiplayer mode via Split screen, LAN and Internet. The game features 100 levels and includes a level editor. (source: wikipedia)
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Galaxy Forces 2
attr.desc:
A great multiplayer game brought to you by [Ronnie Hedlund](https://sourceforge.net/u/rh_galaxy/profile/). The source code is available [here.](https://sourceforge.net/p/galaxyv2/code/HEAD/tree/)

A 2D multiplayer space shooter, inspired by the Amiga classic Gravity Force. Play race, mission or dogfight. Single player, with friends or against AI. There are 50+ levels and a map-editor included.

Global hi-score and achievements with replays on the website.

Features

    Space shooter
    Multiplayer
    Online hiscore
    Replays
    Race
    Dogfight
    Mission
    AI
    Editor
    Cross platform
attr.inst:
Start the program

Multiple instances of the game may be started on the same machine for testing.
The server (Server.exe) need only be run if you want a stand alone server.
Firewall ports

TCP port 1999 needs to be forwarded in your firewall/router to be able to host games and have other players join you.
Login as member

To use achievements and hiscores you need to create a user here.
Then login as that user, or select cancel to just play directly.
Connect to server

Enter the IP address or host name of a server and click "connect".
You can enter 127.0.0.1 to connect to your own server.
All games on that server will be shown.
You can join green games.
You can't join red games, they are full or already started.
If no game is shown you have to create a new game.
Join existing game

Enter your name and choose a green game from the list.
Click "Join".
Create new game

Enter your name, and the name of the game.
Click "New".
Start game

The player that created the game should set the level to play and make other settings before starting the game. This player will be the master.
Others that have joined can only chat until the game starts.

The master can kick players by selecting a player and press delete.
If the master leaves the game, mastership is transferred to another player.

Guns, Guns, Guns!

360-degree gunboat shooter, Gunroar.

attr.title: Guns and Guns
attr.desc: "Guns and Guns" is a personal project that originated during the GMTK jam as "Overgun," albeit with a temporary title placeholder. Departing from traditional shooting mechanics, this platformer adventure focuses on puzzle-solving with three distinct guns, each presenting its own set of challenges. Players navigate through intricately designed puzzles, exploring innovative twists on the platformer genre.
attr.inst: This port is ready to run!

attr.title: Guns of Fury
attr.desc: Guns of Fury is a retro-inspired action platformer that combines the run & gun and Metroidvania genres. Explore a vast interconnected world, gain new abilities and weapons, battle epic bosses and stop the plans of an evil corporation before it’s too late!
attr.inst: Buy the game on Steam and add the data to gunsoffury/assets

attr.title: Gyro Boss DX
attr.desc: Your home planet is under siege from a band of intergalactic pirates led by the fiendish Gyro Boss! Dodge an endless assault of weapons as you orbit around the boss on a fixed circle, it's not as easy as it looks. Can you secure bragging rights as the best space pilot to bite the dust against the alien menace?
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and place all game files into the assets folder.

attr.title: Habroxia
attr.desc: Blast your way through a myriad of extra-terrestrial incursions in this arcade-style scrolling shooter! Pilot the ship Habroxia through 15 levels featuring intense boss fights, rescue missions, shifting perspectives, and untold surprises.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2290270/Habroxia/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Habroxia 2
attr.desc: Blast off for a sequel that pushes every facet of 2D shoot'em ups to escape velocity! Habroxia 2 is a non-linear, old-school space shooter with upgrades, boss fights, and even New Game+, all wrapped in a retro package combining pixel graphics, chiptunes, and stellar gameplay.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io. For the Steam version, copy all files into the assets folder. For Itch release, download the DRM-free version and extract all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1473550/Habroxia_2/) or [Itch.io](https://lillymogames.itch.io/habroxia-2). For the Steam version, copy all files into the `assets` folder. for Itch release, download the `DRM-free` version and extract all files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Hack Grid
attr.desc: Hack Grid is a hacking-themed puzzle game and love letter to the retro charm of DOS gaming, both in visuals and audio! Dive back into the 80's and become a hacker!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch and copy the HackGrid.pck into the gamedata folder. The DLC folder goes directly into the hackgrid folder.

attr.title: Hakopalace
attr.desc: A tight boss rush that's challenging without being too brutal. The graphics have a sleek minimalist style with tons of little visual flairs.
attr.inst: Download from https://nizakashii.itch.io/hakopalace extract and place data.win inside ports/hakopalace/gamedata

attr.title: Half-Life
attr.desc: Half-Life is Valve's debut title which blends blends action and adventure with award-winning technology to create a frighteningly realistic world where players must think to survive.
attr.inst: You need to have your own copy of the game. You need to copy the steam valve directory from your steam installation into ports/Half-Life/valve directory. You can also run Half-Life Blue Shift/Opposing Forces by copying the contents of the bshift/gearbox steam files into their respective ports/Half-Life/ directory.

attr.title: Hallow's Eve
attr.desc:
On Halloween, the barrier between human world and the spirit world thins. The spirits play tricks, the dead can be seen, and monsters can run their human world errands.

Set in the 90s, play as Ichabod, a pumpkin man who uses his chance to enter the human world to try and rent Jurassic Park from the video store. Unfortunately, the only copy has been rented by a teen who’s brought a witch’s curse upon the town.

Gameplay is inspired by the classics and the modern classics — a Zeldalike sense of exploration, with the tight, fast combat of Hyper Light Drifter. All soaked in a charming pixel art atmosphere and a dumb sense of humor. Playtime is around 1-2 hours.
attr.inst: Buy the game from https://maxatrillionator.itch.io/hallows-eve and place the .solarus file in the ports/hallowseve folder.

attr.title: Hallowe'en
attr.desc: The player controls a magician that must collect a number of green pumpkins from a series of platforms. The character can move left and right, and can jump over enemies. They are also able to shoot a magical bolt which can erode a hole in the platform's floor blocking enemies. The player must climb up a number of ladders, and must avoid enemies including: spiders, choppers, bolts, skulls, bolts, and duplicators.
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: Hallowed Candy
attr.desc: An old-school arcade one-screen point-em-up. Emphasis is on skill and beating your friend's high score within a cute seasonal Halloween setting.
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks to Project Level studios (https://projectlevel.itch.io) for creating this great game and kindly granting permission for PortMaster to distribute the game files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks to [Project Level studios](https://projectlevel.itch.io) for creating this great game and kindly granting permission for PortMaster to distribute the game files.

attr.title: Halloween Forever

attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://imaginarymonsters.itch.io/halloween-forever), download the Halloween Forever - Modern Edition (2021) version, extract it, and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.

attr.title: Hammerwatch

It’s got a classic retro vibe, with different character classes, co-op gameplay, and tons of secrets to uncover. Think Gauntlet-style action with modern polish!

This port is compatible with the 1.3 Steam release of the game.
Installing:

download_depot 239070 239071 6038447391393479561
 - Put the gamefiles (without any surrounding folders) into hammerwatch/gamefiles/

attr.title: Haque

attr.inst: Buy the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy all the data to `haque/assets`.

Race to destroy the guardians and escape as quickly as possible, or explore the maze to find new powers and challenge the greater guardians that are sealed deep within.

When the download is complete it will tell you the location of the game files.
Place all the game files in ports/hargrave/assets.

attr.title: Hojiya

Hojiya is a 2D adventure platformer in a coastal fantasy world, where the daylight will be crucial for our plant boy protagonist.
STORY:
Nogaru and Iara are two brave siblings, will explore forest, jungles, and deserts; by collecting artifacts, challenging cunning creatures, and defeating perilous villains, will find their origins, in this emotive adventure throughout marvelous lands, to uncover the fate of a lost culture.
Solve mysteries, help people to save their islands of the impending doom caused by the evil corporation Xiphos.
FEATURES:
A lot of Items to search,collect and trade!
Various creatures and enemies
and meet the people of this world

attr.title: Hyper Light Drifter
attr.desc:
Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16­bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale.

Note: Only the Steam version works! 1gb ram devices will crash occasionally due to running out of ram when transitioning between maps due to external textures!
attr.desc_md:
Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16 bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale.

**Note: Only the Steam version works!  
Videos have been patched out as they are currently not compatible with gmloader.next.  
1gb ram devices will crash occasionally due to running out of ram when transitioning between maps due to external textures!  
 Not recommended for 1gb ram devices with ArkOS as it will crash very frequently!**

attr.title: Hyper Princess Pitch
attr.desc:
The good Mecha Santa plans to spread happiness and cheer all over the world. Princess Pitch, previously just a sidekick in Garden Gnome Carnage, sets out to put an end to those silly plans.

Hyper Princess Pitch is sort of a remake of DOS Operation: Carnage, keeping the fast-paced arcade action, short completion time, high replay value and cheesy characters. Whether you tire of games with moral choices, or you've ever wanted to be made of equal halves explosions and piledrivers, this is the game for you

attr.title: Infra Arcana
attr.desc: Infra Arcana is a Roguelike set in the early 20th century. The goal is to explore the lair of a dreaded cult called The Church of Starry Wisdom. Buried deep beneath their hallowed grounds lies an artefact called The Shining Trapezohedron - a window to all secrets of the universe. Your ultimate goal is to unearth this artefact.
attr.inst:
All game files are included. 
The controls are rather complex, carefully study the instructions for the controls.

attr.title: Insert Three Coins
attr.desc:
Welcome, rookie. Get your three coins and try your best shot to beat all the arcade machines. This arcade have a single rule: You beat a machine, you get your coin back.

Do you have what it takes to be the arcade king?
attr.inst: Ready to play!

attr.title: Interstate Drifter 1999
attr.desc: Drift between the states, collect bits, beat rivals and get a high score.
attr.inst: Download the game for free on Steam or Itch. Right click game in steam library, browse local files. Copy "Interstate Drifter 1999.exe" or "Interstate Drifter 1999 itch.exe" to "roms/ports/interstatedrifter/assets"

- Download the game for free on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1383770/Interstate_Drifter_1999/) or [Itch](https://ultimogames.itch.io/id1999)
- Right click game in steam library, browse local files.
- Copy "Interstate Drifter 1999.exe" or "Interstate Drifter 1999 itch.exe" to `roms/ports/interstatedrifter/assets`

attr.title: Into the Deep Web
attr.desc: A short strategy game that mixes dice mechanics with auto-battler and deckbuilding elements, wrapped in retro-inspired art, and a playful Windows-93 vibe.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Invaders
attr.desc: A memory accurate reimplementation of Space Invaders by loadzero.
attr.inst: You'll need to provide your own invaders.e, invaders.f, invaders.g, and invaders.h files from a MAME_078 romset into the invaders/inv1 folder.

attr.title: Ion Fury
attr.desc: Ion Fury using the EDuke32 source port.  Ion Fury is a prequel to Bombshell. Shelly "Bombshell" Harrison, a bomb disposal expert working for the Global Defense Force (GDF), returns as the game's protagonist, fighting against the cybernetic forces of Dr. Jadus Heskel.
attr.desc_md: Ion Fury using the EDuke32 source port.  Ion Fury is a prequel to Bombshell. Shelly "Bombshell" Harrison, a bomb disposal expert working for the Global Defense Force (GDF), returns as the game's protagonist, fighting against the cybernetic forces of Dr. Jadus Heskel. **Note: This supports up to v1.10 of Ion Fury!**
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam or GOG.  See instructions for obtaining v1.10 or earlier of Ion Fury from Steam or GOG.  Place the v1.10 (or earlier) game files fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into the ports/ionfury directory.  Ion Fury also works on lower-end devices such as with an RK3326 CPU, but with reduced performance.
attr.inst_md: Requires early version of Ion Fury v1.10 or older. Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/562860/Ion_Fury/) OR [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/ion_fury) **Steam**: Download/Install the game using the Steam Console by typing download_depot 562860 562861 189007903929408028, copy fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into ports/ionfury **GOG**: Download Version 1.10. Do this by first installing Ion Fury using GOG Galaxy, then go to More > Manage Installation > Configure > Uncheck auto-updates > Show more versions > Select Version 1.10. Copy fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into ports/ionfury.  Ion Fury also works on lower-end devices such as with an RK3326 CPU, but with reduced performance.

attr.title: IRON FERRET
attr.desc: Iron Ferret Is a small game where you play as a ferret riding a tank. Ultimately it's one giant escort mission, but at least your escortee is much more tankier than you and can shoot bullets.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Isles of Sea and Sky
attr.desc: A fantastic, oceanic, open world puzzle adventure. Solve innovative block puzzles while unearthing a mystifying story and unlock powers that provide more options for how you choose to progress through the enigmatic Isles of Sea and Sky!
attr.inst: Copy the game data from your Steam or Itch.io installation to ports/iosas/assets

attr.title: It Came from the Forest
attr.desc: A 2D dungeon crawler inspired by old classics and made using similar techniques as back then. No 3D here, just simple 2D graphics painted back to front (Painter's Algorithm).
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: It's Lonely Out in Space
attr.desc: A challenging yet atmospheric game where you precisely control a spaceship in zero-gravity. Move carefully, explore the area, find upgrades, and escape!
