attr.title: ITTA
attr.desc: ITTA is a bullet-hell adventure set in a world filled with monstrous bosses. When Itta wakes up and finds herself surrounded by her dead family, her only guide is a strange spirit that takes the form of the family cat who gifts her a glowing revolver for protection.
attr.desc_md:
ITTA is a bullet-hell adventure set in a world filled with monstrous bosses. When Itta wakes up and finds herself surrounded by her dead family, her only guide is a strange spirit that takes the form of the family cat who gifts her a glowing revolver for protection.

Note: Slowdowns occur during bossfights when there are many particles on the screen! Requires Twin Sticks!
attr.inst:
Download the latest version of the game from Steam OR GOG
Copy all the game files over to ports/itta/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Download the latest version of the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/775580/ITTA/) OR [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/itta)
Copy all the game files over to ports/itta/gamedata

attr.title: Izel's Observatory
attr.desc:
You are Izel, and your passion is studying the stars. But your discoveries threaten the power of the high priests. They destroy your research and sentence you to execution.
Escape from jail and take up your spear -- fight your way through underwater caverns, coral reefs, a nest of electric eels, a sunken ship and more. Collect upgrades and abilities to open new paths and find your way home.
attr.inst: Ready To Run

attr.title: Jagged Alliance 2
attr.desc: Jagged Alliance 2 is strategy game where you lead a group of mercenaries on the island state of Arulco, against the army of the evil Queen Deirdranna.
attr.inst: You must have an updated copy of the original Jagged Alliance 2 game files. Copy the retail game's data into the `ports/jaggedalliance2/game` folder. The GOG version of the game is also supported. Download the installer from GOG (https://www.gog.com/en/game/jagged_alliance_2), place it into the `ports/jaggedalliance2` folder, and it will install the game files as required.

attr.title: Jazz2 Resurrection
attr.desc: Jazz2 Resurrection is a complete reimplementation of Jazz Jackrabbit 2, a superb 2D platformer, a sequel to Epic Megagames' earlier shareware classic Jazz Jackrabbit (also available in PortMaster).
attr.inst: Let the intro play the first time you start the game, so it creates cache files. Copy the original game files (The Secret Files and/or The Christmas Chronicles) to ports/jazz2/Source.

attr.title: Jester's Helper

attr.title: Jet Lancer
attr.desc: Jet Lancer is a high-velocity aerial combat shooter where you duel enemy aviators, hunt giant robots, and defy death at supersonic speeds as you evolve from an unknown rookie aviator into a once-in-a-generation ACE pilot. ArkOS 1gb devices may crash because of running out of ram!
attr.desc_md:
Jet Lancer is a high-velocity aerial combat shooter where you duel enemy aviators, hunt giant robots, and defy death at supersonic speeds as you evolve from an unknown rookie aviator into a once-in-a-generation ACE pilot.

**Note: This is version 1.0.17! ArkOS 1gb devices may crash because of running out of ram!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam or gog.
Head to https://portmaster.games/ on the specific game files to place in ports/jetlancer/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/913060/Jet_Lancer/) OR [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/jet_lancer). 
**Steam**: Download the latest version of the game or use steam console and type download_depot 913060 913061 5560224757383287130, copy over all the game file to ports/jetlancer/assets 
**GOG**: Download Version 1.0.17. Do this by going to More > Manage Installation > Configure > Uncheck auto-updates > Show more versions > Select Version 1.0.17. Copy over all the game file to ports/jetlancer/assets

attr.title: Jet Set Willy
attr.desc: Jet Set Willy is a flip-screen platform game in which the player moves the protagonist, Willy, from room to room in his mansion collecting objects. Unlike the screen-by-screen style of its prequel, the player can explore the mansion at will. Willy is controlled using only left, right and jump.

attr.title: Jump n Bump
attr.desc:
This is a game for the whole family. You play cute fluffy little bunnies and hop on each other's heads.

At the beginning you are in the menu, where you have to let each active player jump over the tree trunk to enter the play area, and then walk to the right. You will then enter the arena. The aim is to jump on the other bunnies' heads.

https://github.com/fabiangreffrath/jumpnbump
attr.inst:
Up to Jump and left and right.

Single player use D PAD and Sticks.

Network play see startup screen

attr.title: Jump Off The Bridge
attr.desc: Jump Off The Bridge is a platformer with an emphasis on difficulty and unique level design. Each level, the player is required to jump off the bridge, but dying in any other sense, is failure. You may encounter characters that require items, methodical puzzle levels, intensely difficult platforming, tough levels that test your reaction time, and even bosses. Jump Off The Bridge is a meticulously crafted world that avoids the overuse of previously introduced sprites and characters. Every level feels unique, and is memorable.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1057780/Jump_Off_The_Bridge/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Jump Off The Bridge >  Manage > Browse local files. Copy the data.win, audiogroup2.dat and audiogroup3.dat from the assets folder to /ports/jumpoffthebridge/gamedata

attr.title: Jump on Head

attr.title: Kanon
attr.desc: Kanon is a visual novel that follows Yuichi Aizawa's return to a town where he reconnects with childhood friends and encounters new ones, each with hidden pasts and supernatural ties. As Yuichi unravels their stories, themes of love, forgiveness, and second chances intertwine in this emotionally charged narrative.

attr.title: Kemono Rogue

Based on a Japanese Anime, KemonoRogue is a fun map adventure game! 

Move your character through each level of the map, attacking foes and collecting coins on the way.

attr.title: Ken's Labyrinth
attr.desc:
Ken's Labyrinth is a first-person shooter for MS-DOS published in 1993 by Epic MegaGames. It was programmed by Ken Silverman, who later designed the Build engine used for rendering in 3D Realms's Duke Nukem 3D (1996). 
 Ken's Labyrinth is about an ordinary man, heavily implied to be Ken Silverman himself, who wakes up one night to discover that his dog has been kidnapped by aliens. He tags along on their ship and ends up on their homeworld, where he must defeat the murderous creatures and rescue his beloved pet.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Kikai

attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Kobold Kastilla

attr.title: KOReader

attr.title: Kuklomenos
attr.desc: An abstract shoot-em-up. Minimalistic graphics, short game-length. Gameplay lies somewhere between Centipede and Starship Command. Very challenging at the higher difficulty levels. Can you make Elite?
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: L'Abbaye des Morts
attr.desc:
The plot is set in 13th century. The player takes a role of Jean Raymond – one of clerics who preached about the poverty of Christ and a life without material aspirations, and who were for this reason treated as heretics by the Catholic Church.

Jean is running away from crusaders who want him dead. He finds an old church and decides to hide there. He doesn't know what ancient evils hide in that place.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: La-Mulana
attr.desc: La-Mulana is an 'Archaeological Ruin Exploration Action Game' in the vein of classic MSX platformers. As a daring archaeologist you venture inside the ancient ruins of the Mayan city La-Mulana, seeking out the Secret Treasure of Life. Apart from the plethora of traps lying in wait to stop intruders, there are also monsters on the prowl, protecting the ruins. Head for the innermost depths of the ruins while solving a variety of mysteries, fending off monsters, and disarming traps.
attr.inst: Buy the game on gog.com, download the offline installer (gog_la_mulana_2.0.0.1.sh), and copy it to `ports/la-mulana/gamedata`. When you launch the game for the first time, there will be a short delay while the files are automatically extracted.
attr.inst_md: Buy the game on [gog.com](https://www.gog.com/en/game/la_mulana), download the offline Linux installer (`gog_la_mulana_2.0.0.1.sh`), and copy it to `ports/la-mulana/gamedata`. When you launch the game for the first time, there will be a short delay while the files are automatically extracted.

attr.title: Lab Remnants
attr.desc:
Lab Remnants is a monochromatic roguelike full of secrets and challenges. Play as an artificially made creature and make your way through your own creators to escape from their crazy experiments.
Explore dungeons, labs, forests, and many other locations to collect as many coins and power-ups as you can.
Unlock new characters and upgrade them to defeat even the strongest of bosses.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953020/Lab_Remnants/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Lab Remnants > Manage > Browse local files. Copy the LabRemnants.pck from the assets folder to /ports/labremnants/gamedata

attr.title: Labyrinth of Legendary Loot

attr.title: Laser Kombat
attr.desc: Laser Kombat is a classic puzzle game, now available for modern systems. Destroy all the tanks to beat the level. Stay out of line of sight, though, or you will get shot. Shoot your lasers at mirrors, blow up bomb or push your enemies into water with movable blocks to win.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: LISA: The Painful

Make sacrifices to keep your party members alive, whether it's taking a beating for them, losing limbs, or some other inhuman torture. In this world, you will learn that being selfish and heartless is the only way to survive...

download the game from Gamejolt(https://gamejolt.com/games/dreamsofstars/696084) or itch(https://redisco.itch.io/lisa-the-undone) for free tested with Windows version. Copy all contents of the UNDONE folder from the download to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.

attr.title: Little Busters!
attr.desc: 'Little Busters!' follows Riki Naoe and his group of childhood friends, the titular Little Busters, as they form a baseball team and navigate through various personal struggles and mysteries. As the story unfolds, Riki uncovers deeper secrets about his friends and the world around him, leading to poignant revelations and emotional growth for the characters.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/littlebusters/gamedata`.

attr.title: Little Frog Game
attr.desc: A little game, about a little frog! Jump around through three varied stages to collect flies and beetles, while avoiding enemies and hazards along the way!
attr.inst: You can download Little Frog Game for free at: https://jamphibious.itch.io/little-frog-game. Download the *Little Frog Game (Linux - FrogCon Update).zip* version and extract it, and place the *Little Frog Game.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Little Runmo
attr.desc:
Little Runmo - The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

The gameplay of Little Runmo - The Game, is based on the video but also takes inspiration from the Super Mario games. For fans that come from the animation, the game is not a 1 to 1 replica of the animated film. I am not trying to make this a hardcore Meatboy-type game, I want to introduce challenging moments but I will try to make the difficulty curve as smooth as possible.

The early game will be pretty chill, just imagine how the Mario games were designed, then newer harder mechanics get slowly introduced. Big inspirations again were Mario World and Super Mario Bros Wii and also a fan-game called Mario 63.
attr.inst: None

attr.title: LittleGPTracker
attr.desc: LittleGPTracker (a.k.a 'The piggy') is a music tracker optimised to run on portable game consoles.

The download constantly ticks trying to kill your drive; click on files to delete them, but watch out for bugs and errors which can stun you and make you loose precious time! You can collect power ups to click on and hack your way out.

On their way home, the child comes to learn that this Spirit World is the home of countless friendly monsters who have been waiting for a prophesized hero to come and rescue them from a mysterious curse.

attr.title: Lost Potato

attr.inst: Purchase the game either from itch OR steam. Download the game and copy over all the game data to ports/lostpotato/assets
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game either from [itch](https://blobfishdev.itch.io/lost-potato) OR [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1365010/Lost_Potato/). Download the game and copy over all the game data to ports/lostpotato/assets

attr.title: LOVE 3
attr.desc:
LOVE 3 is a precision platformer with minimalistic pixel graphics and tight controls. Face challenging obstacles, discover hidden secrets, and place custom checkpoints after you overcome each new danger.

3 Other games included for free:
Includes every level from LOVE, LOVE 2: kuso, and LOVE Remastered, in addition to the original 42 track soundtrack.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Itch. Fred Wood has kindly provided a PortMaster package, download it. This will replace the gamedata folder in your portfolder.

If you already own the game on Steam. You will need to download the Linux version. If you're running windows, use this command in the Steam Console: download_depot 1604300 1604302 2416319664696347085. Locate the gamefiles and copy over the assets to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: LOVE by Fred Wood
attr.desc:
LOVE is a short and addictively challenging platformer with a minimalist design. It has a custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track original soundtrack, competitive scoring, and multiple ways to play.
The difficult levels are balanced with the inclusion of a simple yet unique respawn system wherein the player can leave a checkpoint at any location at any point, as long as they are on solid ground.
Beyond the visual aesthetic, the challenging level design, and the abundance of features, there is the fantastic soundtrack composed by James Bennett, which brings rich life to the seemingly simple three-color atmosphere.
attr.inst:
Purchase and download LOVE (3.0.1, Linux) or (3.0.1, Windows) from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/love.
Copy the files (game.unx/data.win, icon.png, love_love.csv, options.ini) from /assets into the /gamedata folder

attr.title: LUCID
attr.desc: LUCID is a Point & Click / Top-down hybrid adventure about a young kid in a very bizarre world of odd characters and even weirder happenings.
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: Luck be a Landlord
attr.desc: A roguelike deck-builder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.
attr.inst:
You'll need to purchase the game from `https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404850/Luck_be_a_Landlord`. You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like DepotDownloader (https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader). There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like https://depotdownloader.00pium.net. The command may vary depending on your system, but the `-app`, `-depot`, and `manifest` digits must match those below:

`./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>`

Once you've grabbed this, locate the *Luck be a Landlord.pck* file and place this in the port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: LUFTRAUSERS

Select from over 125 combinations of weapons, bodies, and propulsion systems and take to the skies to battle enemy fighter planes, battleships, submarines, and rival aces for glory, honor, and high scores. Bravely volunteer for one of over 100 daring missions to unlock new Rauser combinations and vibrant color variations and become the most legendary Rauser pilot of all time!
attr.inst: Buy the game at HumbleBundle or GoG and place the linux installer / drm-free zip in `ports/luftrausers/gamedata/`.
attr.inst_md: Buy the game at [HumbleBundle](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/luftrausers) or [GoG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/luftrausers) and place the linux installer / drm-free zip in `ports/luftrausers/gamedata/`.

attr.title: Meander Land
attr.desc:
In a world torn by war, it's up to cartographer Corylus Flint to chart out what remains. When he crash lands on a mysterious island, however, he finds himself smack-dab in the middle of mafia territory! 
Along the way, Corylus meets a variety of strange characters, both friend and foe. Can he escape the island and continue his life's work?
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault
attr.desc:
Medal of Honor: Allied Assault War Chest is a treasure trove of historical battles presented as a gritty World War II action FPS. Call in artillery and air strikes against the opposing forces and keep your squad away from the jaws of defeat and despair. Drive various assault vehicles, always charging onwards to victory. Uncle Sam wants YOU!

OpenMoHAA is an open-source version of MoHAA that is fully compatible with both the original game and the Spearhead and Breakthrough expansions, which are all included in the War Chest release.
attr.desc_md:
Medal of Honor: Allied Assault War Chest is a treasure trove of historical battles presented as a gritty World War II action FPS. Call in artillery and air strikes against the opposing forces and keep your squad away from the jaws of defeat and despair. Drive various assault vehicles, always charging onwards to victory. Uncle Sam wants YOU!

[OpenMoHAA](https://github.com/openmoh/openmohaa) is an open-source version of MoHAA that is fully compatible with both the original game and the Spearhead and Breakthrough expansions, which are all included in the War Chest release.
attr.inst: Purchase the Medal of Honor: Allied Assault War Chest on gog.com. Download all three offline installer files (setup...exe, setup...1.bin, setup...2.bin) and put them in ports/openmohaa/. The first time you run the game, the patcher will be used to extract the game files.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the Medal of Honor: Allied Assault War Chest on [gog.com](https://www.gog.com/en/game/medal_of_honor_allied_assault_war_chest). Download all three offline installer files (`setup...exe`, `setup...1.bin`, `setup...2.bin`) and put them in `ports/openmohaa/`. The first time you run the game, the patcher will be used to extract the game files.

There are 2 playable characters - Megaman, a robot using mostly ranged weapons and a close combat fighter named Slizer who is learning various abilities. Also you can find a secret challenge on each level that rewards with some form of boost.

attr.inst_md: Download Free at [itch.io](https://slash7.itch.io/megaman-witters-domination) and place the Mega Man Witter Domination.zip into the assets folder.

attr.title: Megaball
attr.desc: The goal is to roll the ball over every flashing panel to complete the stage. For each stage you complete, you gain one extra life. If you need to, you can self-destruct (and lose a life) and shatter into ten pieces, killing any enemy which collides with these pieces; you'll then immediately re-spawn and the enemy will reappear in 5 seconds.
attr.inst: Ready to run! Thanks helpcomputer (https://helpcomputer.itch.io) for releasing this game under an MIT license.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run! Thanks [helpcomputer](https://helpcomputer.itch.io) for releasing this game under an MIT license.

attr.inst:
Run Megaman.sh
Suggested to play on device with 2 gb of ram to lower a lot the possibility of slowdowns, but is has been defined playable also on lower specs device.

attr.title: Megaman X8 16-bit
attr.desc: The Mega Man X8 16-Bit Demake is a fan-made project that reimagines the original Mega Man X8 in the style of the classic 16-bit era. This demake brings the modern aesthetics and mechanics of the original game into a retro environment reminiscent of the SNES era, particularly the earlier Mega Man X titles on that system.
attr.inst: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/mega-man-x8-16-bit.2184/?sfnsn=wa grab the zip from here, extract it and put the files in the megamanx816-bit/gamedata folder

attr.title: Megazeux
attr.desc: MegaZeux is a game engine that features hundreds of user-created games, mostly in a retro, tile-based style. The games cover various genres, including RPGs, platformers, puzzles ans shoot 'm ups. They often use the engine’s scripting system for unique mechanics and gameplay. With its simple graphics and creative possibilities, MegaZeux offers a wide variety of games to explore, all created by its community.
attr.inst: 1. Download over 500 games from DigitalMZX. 2. Place extracted game folders to roms/ports/megazeux/gamedata. 3. Run the games by selecting the mzx files in the built-in browser.
attr.inst_md:
- Install testing zip.
- Download over **500 games** from [DigitalMZX](https://www.digitalmzx.com/).
- Place extracted game folders to `roms/ports/megazeux/gamedata`.
- Run the games by selecting the mzx files in the built-in browser.

attr.inst_md:

attr.title: Mimi's Delivery Dash
attr.desc:
Originally created in 10 days for Movie Game Jam 2018 as a tribute to Kiki's Delivery Service.

Meet Mimi! A young witch in-training who has just recently decided what her special skill is: delivering mail - by broomstick!

The town is a bustling place so she'll need to be on the look out for potential customers, and they always tip well for a speedy delivery.

But watch out, Mimi! Angry crows are one thing, but flying a broom around town can be just as dangerous!
attr.inst: Download from https://caffinate.itch.io/mimis-delivery-dash and extract data.win and both .ogg files to /ports/mimisdeliverydash/gamedata/

attr.title: Mindustry
attr.desc: Mindustry is a open-source sandbox tower-defense game focused on resource management and automation. Players design factories, build supply chains, and defend against waves of enemies using strategic planning and custom defenses. attr.title: Minecraft - Java Edition
attr.desc:
Minecraft is a game where you can do pretty much whatever you want. Want to build a giant castle? Go for it. Feel like exploring caves and fighting skeletons? Totally an option. You start in a big, blocky world with nothing, and little by little, you gather, build, explore, and create your own adventures. Whether you're surviving the night or just chilling in Creative mode building dream houses, it’s a game about freedom, creativity, and having fun your own way.

Not all versions are Supported, currently only 1.7.10 (with Forge), 1.12 (with Forge) and 1.16.5 (Fabric only) are supported
attr.inst: Go on the PortMaster Website to see the instructions
attr.inst_md:
To play Minecraft on your device via PortMaster, you’ll need to copy over the necessary game files from your PC. Follow these steps carefully:
✅ Step 1: Prepare Minecraft on Your PC

    Install Minecraft on your PC via the official launcher.

    Launch the version you want to play at least once to make sure all files are generated.

    (Optional but important!)
    If you want to use a mod loader like Forge or Fabric, install it and launch that version once as well.

📂 Step 2: Find the Game Files

On your PC, Minecraft stores game files in this folder:

C:\Users\<YourUsername>\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions

To access that folder Press the Windows Key on your Keyboard and R
    Win + R
You should see a new Window called Run, in there write %appdata% and press Enter

Now you should see a .minecraft directory

📁 Step 3: Copy to Your PortMaster Device

    Connect your device to your PC or insert the SD card.

    On your device, go to:

    /ports/minecraftjava

    Now copy the earlier found .minecraft Directory from Step 2 into the /ports/minecraftjava folder
    If it asks to overwrite files press NO !!!

attr.title: Minetest
attr.desc: An open-source voxel sandbox game engine. Lots of free community-made games and mods to download straight from the client. Inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.
attr.inst:
Ready to run.

Some menus extend off-screen for some devices, however all configuration options can be adjusted at `/path/to/your/ports/minetest/minetest.conf`. Settings options are described here: http://doxy.minetest.net/settings.html

Single-player play requires >1 GB in order to run both the host and client instances. So 1 GB devices should stick to server play because RAM requirements are only ~700 MB. There are public servers available or you can host your own private server!

attr.title: Moonlight New
attr.desc: "Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for Sunshine and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely". Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.desc_md: *"Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine) and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely"* Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.inst: Install the latest version of Sunshine on your PC and use the launcher to pair to your pc. Full instructions are on the PortMaster site!
attr.inst_md:
- Install the latest version of [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine/releases) on your PC *(GFE is not updated anymore but may give good results for NVIDIA users)*
- This guide will use the windows installer version. 
- Run the installer, agree with the terms. Wait for it to finish.
- Open Sunshine for the first time. It will open up a window in your default browser.
- It may give a warning about your connection not being private. Click on advanced and continue to localhost.
- Here you will set the username and password for Sunshine, set it to something simple and memorable. It will ask for it every time.
- The page will reload and then you will log into Sunshine. 
- Now its time to open Moonlight on your handheld. 
- First head to the *"Settings Menu"* and set them how you would like. Preferably start off with a low bitrate and your devices native resolution and framerate. 
- Lets move to the *"Connect Menu"*. Here you will first set your host device IP-address. 
- You will be able to find this by going to your network settings, properties and under *"IPv4 address"*.
- Now its time to pair. Head to the *"Pin"* section on your host PC. 
- Click *"Pair"* in the Moonlight port. This will now show a pin. Fill this pin into Sunshine. Also fill in the device name, this can be named after your device such a *"RG35XX"*. 
- After sending the signal on you host PC, you will receive a message *"Succesfully paired"* in the moonlight app on your handheld. 
- Head over to the *"Reload Apps"* function on your handheld. Click on it and you will see the currently configured apps from Sunshine. Every time you update the Apps in Sunshine, use this function.
- Head to the *"Play Menu"* and select the app you want to stream, Steam for example. 
- The Moonlight app will close on your handheld and it will start streaming. Wait 5 seconds for the controls.
- Have fun!

## Recommendations: ##
- Moonlight requires a very good internet connection to get a decent experience. There are many factors at play such a the detail of the game your running. Simpler 2d games are easier to stream and require less power to decode on your handheld. You will have to try and find a balance of bitrate and framerate for your setup. 
- Experiencing input and/or audio delay? Lower the bitrate, resolution, or framerate. Reconnecting may help random desyncing issues.
- Moonlight will maintain aspect ratio of your host PC monitor. You can get a better picture by manually changing the resolution to your devices native resolution, such as 640x480. There are ways to automate this process, such as  [ResolutionAutomation](https://github.com/Nonary/ResolutionAutomation). Use these programs on your own risk.
- Inputs may be reversed. Mouse mode does not work on Moonlight-Embedded. Both can be resolved by using SteamInput.
- Its recommended to check your connection before streaming, use the pair function for this. Does it say *"Already paired"*, then youre good to go. It may also say something like *"App already opened"*, you need to use *"Force Close"* under the troubleshooting options in Sunshine.
- Most important of all, dont expect an amazing experience going in. These handhelds are not ideal for Streaming, even though they may seem like it.

attr.title: Morrowind
attr.desc: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind is an open-world fantasy role-playing game set in the richly detailed province of Morrowind, part of the Elder Scrolls universe. Originally released by Bethesda in 2002, it offers deep lore, open-ended gameplay, and a sprawling world filled with quests, factions, and exploration. This version runs on OpenMW, an open-source reimplementation of the Morrowind engine, offering improved stability and numerous enhancements while preserving the original gameplay experience.
attr.inst: Copy your installed game data files from the `Data Files` directory or the both the GoG installer files `setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582).exe` to the `openmw/data` directory
attr.inst_md:
Install **"Morrowind Game of the Year Edition"** from either **Steam** or **GoG** and copy the contents of `Data Files` into `ports/openmw/data/`.

Alternatively place the **GoG** offline installer files (`setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582).exe` and `setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582)-1.bin`) into `ports/openmw/data/` and it will be installed correctly by the port when launched.

Puzzle yourself through nature-filled islands to become the ultimate survival environment - as harsh as possible!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK-Jam 2023


Mechanic explanation (if you're confused):
The sound from different events (trees falling, fire spreading) alerts the player to run away
if it's on the same grid line horizontally or vertically, whether there's an obstacle in the way or not.
Another way to imagine it is a + shape.

attr.title: Nidhogg

Nidhogg is the epic award-winning fencing tug-of-war, full of graceful acrobatics and clumsy stabs. IRL yelling and excitement may occur, in this ultimate two-player showdown of fast-paced fencing and melee attacks.
The combat arena stretches in both directions, although besting an opponent only gains you ground. Matches aren’t won or lost with a single kill, but with a series of kills granting you right-of-way to run/fight/flee to your own goal-zone.
Each arena holds different strategic formations and chokepoints to use to your advantage. Until you reach your goal-zone, anything is possible. Only one thing is certain in Nidhogg… the only way to win is to outwit your opponent. En Garde!

Note: Only single player available for this port!

attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo from Itch.io, download it and extract all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3011030/NOSKIN/) or [Itch.io](https://noeye-soft.itch.io/no-skin) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo from Itch.io, download it and extract all files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Noiz2sa
attr.desc: Abstract shootem up game, 'Noiz2sa'.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Non-Stop Space Probe
attr.desc:
Take control of the Orblr-1 Space Probe and blast chaotically through the cosmos on your mission to collect precious minerals.

Fly through 40 levels avoiding dangerous space debris and collect the gems before heading to the goal. There's just one problem... once you've started you can't stop!
attr.inst: Download the game from https://ci.itch.io/non-stop-space-probe and place the contents of the zip into the nonstopspaceprobe/gamedata folder

attr.title: Nonny
attr.desc: Nonny is a simple nonogram game that lets you play and create nonogram puzzles!
attr.inst: All files are included and ready to play.

attr.title: Not Enough Time
attr.desc: Not enough time is a short pixel-art point & click adventure. It is a sequel to Uncle Lee strikes again and Once upon a Möbius strip, but it can be enjoyed as a standalone game as well. Our improved recipe features 500% more characters than the previous games!
attr.desc_md: **Not enough time** is a short pixel-art point & click adventure. It is a sequel to Uncle Lee strikes again and Once upon a Möbius strip, but it can be enjoyed as a standalone game as well. Our improved recipe features 500% more characters than the previous games!
attr.inst: This port is Ready To Run!

attr.title: NOT VERY PRO WRESTLING
attr.desc: Push the enemy off the island in a three-out-of-five series
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Nothing
attr.desc:
A simple platformer with a powerful editor.*

*Use keyboard and mouse for the editor
attr.inst: Boot Nothing.sh and play

attr.title: Nova Pinball
attr.desc:
A pinball game created with the Love game framework.

Your mission: Make the star go nova. There are in-game hints that point out the next target to achieve your goal.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: NPuzzle
attr.desc: NPuzzle is a 15 puzzle style sliding game where you have to rearrange the tiles in order.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Nubby's Number Factory
attr.desc: A plinko-style roguelike where you work at a number factory. Launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to make bigger and bigger numbers! But beware, if you fail to meet your number quota, the sun will explode.
attr.inst: Ready to run!.

attr.title: Nuclear Throne
attr.desc: Nuclear Throne is a post-apocalyptic roguelike-like top-down shooter. Not 'the final hope of humanity' post-apocalyptic, but 'humanity is extinct and mutants and monsters now roam the world' post-apocalyptic. Fight your way through the wastelands with powerful weaponry, collecting radiation to mutate some new limbs and abilities. All these things and more you could do if only you were good at this game. Can you reach the Nuclear Throne?
attr.inst:
Purchase your game from Steam.
 Use steam console to download_depot 242680 242683 1972149697962479575
 Copy the contents of the assets folder into ports/nuclearthrone/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/242680/Nuclear_Throne/).
 Open [Steam console](steam://open/console)
 Copy and paste command: ```download_depot 242680 242683 1972149697962479575```
 Copy the contents of the assets folder into ports/nuclearthrone/assets

attr.title: Null Drifter
attr.desc:
Null Drifter is a 1BIT LO-FI shooter, a journey into the void inside a computer simulation!
Lose yourself in this frenetic yet chill experience!

A Minimalistic twin-stick shooter!
A Simulation for space-fighter pilots!
Made to train them to defeat the awakened forces of the void!
Secretly part of the “Project Starship” World, used by the poor 4 souls of “Project Starship X”, before embarking for their mission: defeating the army of Cthulhu!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1170050/Null_Drifter/
From your Steam Library, Right-Click Null Drifter > Manage > Browse local files
Copy the data.win into ports/nulldrifter/gamedata

attr.title: OCDA
attr.desc:
OCDA is a precision platformer in which you play as an animated potato who also just happens to somehow be literate.
Run and jump your way through levels, find secrets and master your ability to dash. It's just you, the game and your tenacity to continue.
The game is short and sweet, but offers more content in the form of hunting collectibles and secrets.
Clearing the game unlocks speedrun mode as well. Post your fastest time in the comments!
attr.inst: Download OCDA.zip from https://kirstu.itch.io/ocda and unzip the contents into the /ports/ocda/gamedata folder

attr.title: Ocean's Heart
attr.desc:
When pirates attacked Limestone Island, it fell to Tilia’s father to go after them and rescue the young woman they kidnapped. When he hasn’t returned six months later, Tilia decides it’s up to her to track down her dad and find out what went wrong.

Play as Tilia as she travels across an archipelago full of pirate forts, forgotten magic, abominable beasts, and a diverse cast of people trying to find their place in it all. As Tilia follows her dad’s trail, she becomes entrangled in the pirates’ plot to use an old magic to control the ocean. And maybe along the way, she’ll play in a tick-tack-toe championship, prevent an art heist, or impresonate a piano tuner. It’s a large world full of secrets, dangers, and quirky wierdos for you to explore.
attr.inst: Buy the game from GOG or Steam and place the data.solarus file in the ports/oceansheart folder.

attr.title: Oddworld: Abes Oddysee Exoddus
attr.desc: It is a platformer with puzzle-solving elements.
attr.inst: You need to copy all .lvl and .ddv files (and sound.dat for Exoddus) from the original game(s) to ports/relive/oddysee or ports/relive/exoddus directory.

attr.title: Of Mice and Moggies
attr.desc: A smart puzzle game, where you play a cat that tries to catch various animals. The levels can look simple at first, but require you to constantly find new ways of combining the animals and objects.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at https://bippinbits.itch.io/of-mice-and-moggies -- download the Windows version, extract it, and place the game files in ofmiceandmoggies/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [https://bippinbits.itch.io/of-mice-and-moggies](https://bippinbits.itch.io/of-mice-and-moggies) -- download the Windows version, extract it, and place the game files in `ofmiceandmoggies/gamedata`

attr.inst_md: Claim free on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/781440/OH_MY_GOD_LOOK_AT_THIS_KNIGHT), download, and copy the game files to the `ohmygodlookatthisknight/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Omega Strike
attr.desc: Omega Strike is a metroidvania game with a vast, open ended world and multiple playable characters. Explore the world, learn new abilities, upgrade your weapons and defeat Doctor Omega and his mutant armies!
attr.desc_md: *"Omega Strike is a metroidvania game with a vast, open ended world and multiple playable characters. Explore the world, learn new abilities, upgrade your weapons and defeat Doctor Omega and his mutant armies!"*
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam. Add the assets to the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/680340/Omega_Strike/). Add the assets to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: OmegaBot
attr.desc: A tight action side-scroller with challenging robotic bosses. Dodge metallic dangers, acquire powerful weapons and blast your way through a destroyed world full of deadly machines where running out of energy means defeat.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1620850/OmegaBot) and copy all files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Omelettes
attr.desc: Platforms have height. You can move up or down one level at a time. You can push objects on the same level as you. Eggs will break if they fall two or more levels; eggs will always break if they land in a pan. Make an omelette in each pan to complete a level.
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks Steven Miller (https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks [Steven Miller](https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.

attr.title: Once upon a Möbius strip
attr.desc:
Once upon a Möbius strip is a short point & click adventure in glorious 1-bit pixel art. It serves as a prequel to Uncle Lee strikes again, but it can be enjoyed as a standalone game as well.

You play as Ines, a 10-year-old girl who would really, REALLY, like to go the bathroom this morning—the universe, however, has other plans.
attr.desc_md:
**Once upon a Möbius strip** is a short point & click adventure in glorious 1-bit pixel art. It serves as a prequel to Uncle Lee strikes again, but it can be enjoyed as a standalone game as well.

You play as Ines, a 10-year-old girl who would really, REALLY, like to go the bathroom this morning—the universe, however, has other plans.
attr.inst: This port is Ready To Run!

attr.title: one night, hot springs
attr.desc: haru ( a transwoman) is invited by her old friend manami to spend a night at the hot springs. all haru wants to do is enjoy the hot springs like everyone else, but she doesn't want to cause any trouble...
attr.inst: Download the one-night-hot-springs-win-linux.zip from https://npckc.itch.io/one-night-hot-springs and copy the game/ directory out of the zip into ports/onenighthotsprings/

attr.title: Open Great Giana Sisters
attr.desc: Open Great Giana Sisters is a Free Software/Open Source implementation/remake of The Great Giana Sisters.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Open Hexagon
attr.desc: Open Hexagon is an open-source arcade game developed by Vittorio Romeo, inspired by Terry Cavanagh's Super Hexagon. Players control a triangle, rotating it to avoid incoming walls and survive as long as possible. The game introduces mechanics like a 180° swap move and curving walls, enhancing the original concept. Its powerful Lua scripting system enables players to create and share custom levels, fostering a community of user-generated content.
attr.inst: Download the game on Steam (Paid) or Itch.io (Paid), or the game files on Github (Free) and copy the "Packs" and "Assets" folders into the "openhexagon" directory.

attr.title: Open Tyrian 2000
attr.desc:
OpenTyrian2000 is an open-source port of the DOS game Tyrian. It is a fork of OpenTyrian, with the end goal being to replicate the experience of Tyrian 2000 as closely as possible.

Tyrian is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter.  The story is set in 20,031 where you play as Trent Hawkins, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight MicroSol and save the galaxy.

Tyrian features a story mode, one- and two-player arcade modes, and networked multiplayer.
attr.desc_md:
**OpenTyrian2000** is an *open-source port* of the DOS game Tyrian. It is a fork of OpenTyrian, with the end goal being to replicate the experience of Tyrian 2000 as closely as possible.

**Tyrian** is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter.  The story is set in 20,031 where you play as *Trent Hawkins*, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight *MicroSol* and save the galaxy.

Tyrian features a story mode, one and two-player arcade modes, and networked multiplayer.
attr.inst: OpenTyrian2000 requires the Tyrian 2000 data files, which have been released as freeware (https://www.camanis.net/tyrian/tyrian2000.zip). Alternatively, the game is also available free of charge on GOG (https://www.gog.com/en/game/tyrian_2000). Game data is placed in the 'tyrian2000' subdirectory.
attr.inst_md: **OpenTyrian2000** uses the **Tyrian 2000** data files, which have been [**released as freeware**](https://www.camanis.net/tyrian/tyrian2000.zip). Alternatively, the game is also available *free of charge* on [**GOG**](https://www.gog.com/en/game/tyrian_2000). Game data is placed in the `gamedata` subdirectory.

attr.title: OpenBlok
attr.desc: A customizable, cross platform, open-source falling block game, packed with a bunch of features.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenClaw
attr.desc: A Reimplementation of the 1997 Captain Claw platformer.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: OpenEnroth
attr.desc: Might and Magic VII: For Blood and Honor is a role-playing game for Windows published in 1999 by 3DO and developed by New World Computing as part of the science fantasy series Might and Magic. OpenEnroth is a reimplementation which allows you to play MMVII on modern platforms.
attr.inst: Purchase Might and Magic VII on gog.com, or extract the game files from an original Windows CD-ROM. Place the GoG offline installer (setup...exe) or extracted files (DATA etc) in ports/openenroth/gamedata/. If you use the GoG installer, the patcher will extract the files the first time you run the game.
attr.inst_md: Purchase Might and Magic VII on `gog.com`, or extract the game files from an original Windows CD-ROM. Place the GoG offline installer (`setup...exe`) or extracted files (`DATA` etc) in `ports/openenroth/gamedata/`. If you use the GoG installer, the patcher will extract the files the first time you run the game.

attr.title: OpenFodder

attr.inst: It comes with demo files, you can add the full version files by reading the included README.md

attr.title: OpenJazz
attr.desc: A free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games by Alister Thomson.
attr.inst: Includes the Jazz Jackrabiit shareware files.  You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/openjazz/gamedata folder.

attr.title: OpenMRac
attr.desc: OpenMRac is a split-screen racing game. It is a tweaked source release of MultiRacer.

attr.title: OpenNotrium
attr.desc: You have crash-landed on Notrium. Your food supplies are running low, and a pack of predatory aliens have your scent. You're out of bullets for your pistol, your only weapon a handful of rocks. A freezing night is setting in, and you are desperately looking for firewood. Can you survive?
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: OpenOMF
attr.desc: An Open Source remake of 'One Must Fall 2097' by Diversions Entertainment.

attr.inst: Add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 2 game files to the ports/openrct2/RCT2 directory, and optionally add your Roller Coaster Tycoon 1 files to ports/openrct2/RCT1.

attr.title: OpenSupaplex
attr.desc: OpenSupaplex is a 1:1 reimplementation of the original game in C and SDL, with just a few changes to make it easy to use with game controllers, and also easy to port to any platform.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play. Every levelset requires a there to be a player created. Levelset 1 had a premade PLAYER1 created but all others will require you to create a new one. You can use start + dpad down to enter text input mode.

attr.title: OpenSyobon
attr.desc: An SDL-based cross-platform port of Syobon Action
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: OpenTTD
attr.desc: OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe which was originally released in November of 1994.
attr.inst: Everything is included and ready to run.

attr.title: OpenTyrian
attr.desc: OpenTyrian is an open-source port of the DOS game Tyrian.
attr.inst: OpenTyrian 2.1 files are already included as they were made freeware sometime ago.

attr.title: OpenXcom Extended
