attr.title: Operius
attr.desc: Operius is a game where you shoot and dodge enemies inside a tunnel while going through an infinite amount of levels!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!

attr.title: Oquonie
attr.desc:
A textless isometric puzzle game.

You must make your way through a seemingly endless succession of rooms. You will not be alone. Your incarnations will have the help of bizaroid characters that speak an obscure language.
attr.inst: Place  oquonie.rom from https://hundredrabbits.itch.io/oquonie into the oquonie folder.

attr.title: orbo
attr.desc: Use your orbit to move around. Simple, yet challenging single button game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Orthodon
attr.desc:
Journey throughout the abandoned human earth to get back home! Play as Otto, a magician sent on a challenge under the threat of losing his powers.

Use the power of gravity to affect your surroundings and manipulate the world so you can reach the portal in 30+ stages, but be careful, Otto's powers can be as life saving as they can be dangerous!
attr.inst: Ready To Run!!!

attr.title: Osana's Revenge
attr.desc: Osana's Revenge is a top down shooter filled with memes and private jokes arisen from Yandere Simulator drama and development setbacks, in particular, its first rival (Osana Najimi) being delayed for multiple years. However, you don't have to be familiar with all of this in order to play and enjoy it.
attr.inst: Add the .solarus file from here: https://metaquarius.itch.io/osanas-revenge to the ports/osanasrevenge folder.

attr.title: Osmos
attr.desc: Osmos is a serene, physics‑based puzzle game where you control a tiny “mote” that grows by absorbing smaller ones while avoiding larger predators, all propelled by ejecting your own mass to move. Each level challenges you to balance growth and movement, with 72 stages set across ambient, sentient, antimatter, and gravitational-force environments, accompanied by a hypnotic electronic soundtrack and minimalist visuals.
attr.inst:
This port is compatible with the Demo or Full version from https://osmos-game.com and the Steam version. (Steam version not compatible with TrimUI devices).
Free demo:
- Download the latest linux demo: https://www.hemispheregames.com/latest_osmos_demo_linux_deb
- Place the .deb file in "osmos/installer/webdemo"

Full version from website:
- Purchase the game on https://www.osmos-game.com/
- Download the latest linux deb installer
- Place the .deb file in "osmos/installer/webfull"

Steam version:
- Purchase the game on Steam or activate your steam key from Humble
- Enable the steam console by typing steam://open/console in your web browser
- enter the following "download_depot 29180 29183 1530492746741201567"
- find the folder "depot_29183" and copy the files within it to "osmos/installer/steam"
attr.inst_md:
**This port is compatible with the Demo or Full version from https://osmos-game.com and the Steam version. *(Steam version not compatible with TrimUI devices).***
### Free demo:
- Download the latest linux demo: https://www.hemispheregames.com/latest_osmos_demo_linux_deb
- Place the .deb file in "osmos/installer/webdemo"

### Full version from website:
- Purchase the game on https://www.osmos-game.com/
- Download the latest linux deb installer
- Place the .deb file in "osmos/installer/webfull"

### Steam version:
- Purchase the game on Steam or activate your steam key from Humble
- Enable the steam console by typing steam://open/console in your web browser
- enter the following "download_depot 29180 29183 1530492746741201567"
- find the folder "depot_29183" and copy the files within it to "osmos/installer/steam"

attr.title: Otto Matic
attr.desc: This is Pangea Software’s Otto Matic. Take control of the robot Otto Matic and save earth from aliens from Planet X
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Out of Ammo
attr.desc: A mix of retro shmup (think Judgement Silversword) and breakout, in the style of something like The Lost Shield or Wizorb, with aesthetics hugely inspired by ZeroRanger (because it's brilliant, and green+orange goes well with EVERYTHING).
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: OutlawN
attr.desc: Are you ready for 16 levels of OLD WEST LAWN MOWIN' ACTION!? Are you a bad enough buddeh to fight 4 types of lawmen AND snakes while takin' care of a LAWN?! Well, OutlawN is for you!
attr.inst:
Download free at itch.io https://programancer.itch.io/outlawn-retrogradejam2
Copy data.win into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
Download free at [itch.io](https://programancer.itch.io/outlawn-retrogradejam2)
Copy data.win into gamedata folder.

attr.title: OverGun
attr.desc: OverGun is a shoot'em up 2D platform where your character’s weapon is bigger than he can handle! Take control of the crazy pixeled shooter to help him keep control of his gun and bullets through the dungeon.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Overwrite
attr.desc: Push batteries and open gates. Take pictures and change your surroundings. Restore power.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Owlboy
attr.desc: A story-driven platform adventure game, where you can fly and explore a brand new world in the clouds.  Text is not readable on devices with screens less than 5 inches.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Owlboy for Linux copied to the ports/owlboy/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Oxytone
attr.desc: Oxytone is the ultimate puzzle game, equally easy to learn and challenging to master. Are you ready for a unique adventure like no other? Oxytone invites you to explore the depths of your mind while offering a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life for those seeking relaxation. For more determined players, there are 99 challenges, colorful themes to unlock, and 12 meticulously designed maps.
attr.inst: Purchase on Steam or Itch.io and copy game files into assets folder. You can also use demo versions.

attr.title: Pachi el Marciano
attr.desc: Pachi el marciano is a platform game inspired by games like Manic Miner and Jet Set Willy from the legend Mathew Smith. The goal of the game is to collect all the objects of each level, when this is met, the exit gate to the next stage will appear and you can pass through.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Pachycefalosaurus
attr.desc:
HIT. EVERYTHING.

In this parody of Dinosaur Game (or Chrome Dino), you are a Pachycefalosaurus (one of those dinosaurs with the super-tough skulls) and, instead of dodging the obstacles, you have to hit them all! Headbutt your way through this comical endless runner!
attr.inst: Ready To Run!

attr.title: Pacman
attr.desc: A clone of the original regular ol' Pacman by Namco.  This version is inspired by Paul Neave's Pacman.
attr.inst: Everything is included and ready to run!

attr.title: Painted Heart
attr.desc: Near the village of Appleby, a young and aspiring painter, Corbin, is prodded into the cathedral’s painting to cleanse the vibrant world from cultural extinction by the Pestilence. To this day, nobody knows where the Pestilence had come from, and Corbin is even less sure how he can help restore the infected painting.
attr.inst: go to https://rmn.rmarchiv.de/ or https://archive.org/details/rpgmaker-net-game-archive(first site recommended) and search "Painted Heart" and download Painted Heart.exe. rename .exe to .zip and extract the gamedata. Place these extracted files into the "gamedata" folder.

attr.title: Panic Room
attr.desc: You are a skeleton in a very small dungeon, and more traps keep appearing. You have no choice but to delay your inevitable doom by collecting as many coins as possible... or do you? How long can you last? Where are these spikes coming from? Will you ever be free?
attr.inst:
Download PANIC ROOM v1.1.0.exe from https://ghostomato.itch.io/panic-room and place it in the /ports/panicroom/ folder.
On first startup, the game will patch and put the files in the appropriate places.

attr.title: Panzer Paladin
attr.desc: The sinister Ravenous and his legions of brutal demons are poised for battle. The situation is dire, but humanity has one final ace in the hole: the Panzer Paladin!
attr.inst: Copy all the files from your Steam Windows copy of the game to `/roms/ports/panzerpaladin/gamedata`. PanzerPaladin.exe, a bunch of dll files and the Content folder should be directly inside of gamedata

attr.title: Papers, Please
attr.desc:
Congratulations. The October labor lottery is complete. Your name was pulled. For immediate placement, report to the Ministry of Admission at Grestin Border Checkpoint. An apartment will be provided for you and your family in East Grestin. Expect a Class-8 dwelling. Glory to Arstotzka.

Content warning: "Papers, Please" includes brief pixel-art violence and pixel-art nudity. The narrative reflects mature themes related to crime, smuggling, immigration, and border control.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and use the Steam console to download Linux version 1.2.76 using this command: `download_depot 239030 239033 4681415496149094331`. Other versions are not compatible. Put `PapersPlease` and surrounding files/folders in `ports/papersplease/gamedata/`.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/239030/Papers_Please/) and use the [Steam console](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=873543244) to download Linux version 1.2.76 using this command: `download_depot 239030 239033 4681415496149094331`. Other versions are not compatible. Put `PapersPlease` and surrounding files/folders in `ports/papersplease/gamedata/`.

attr.title: PARSEC47
attr.desc: PARSEC47 is a retromodern hi-speed shoot 'em up where you get to defeat retro enemies modernly. The player must destroy enemies while avoiding their projectiles and collecting green clusters of boxes for points.
attr.inst:
Select the stage by a keyboard or a joystick.
Press a shot key to start the game.
All stages are endless and created randomly each time.
The game continues until you lose all ships.

Control your ship and destroy enemies.
While holding a slow key, the ship becomes slow.

attr.title: Passage
attr.desc:
Passage is a five-minute experimental art game that metaphorically represents an entire human lifetime, allowing players to navigate a pixelated world while exploring themes of love, aging, and mortality.

The game only lasts 5 minutes. If you don't get the point at first, please keep playing.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Path of Achra
attr.desc: Path of Achra is a dark fantasy roguelike of the ancient earth, with a focus on streamlined controls and rapid hero customization. A "broken build sandbox." Fight through the deadly lands of Achra to reach the horrors of the Obelisk, and discover what lies beyond...
attr.inst: Either download the free demo or purchase the game on Steam and place the PathofAchra.pck in the port's Gamedata folder.

attr.title: PAUSED
attr.desc: What do ducks have to do with rabbits? Exactly, adventure and physics stuff are what you're looking for!
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pekka Kana 2
attr.desc: Pekka Kana 2 (Pekka the Rooster 2) is a jump 'n run game made in the spirit of old classic platformers such as Super Mario, Sonic the Hedgehog, Jazz Jackrabbit, Super Frog and so on.
attr.inst: Pekka Kana 2 files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Penguin Command
attr.desc: This is a clone of the classic "Missile Command" Game, but it has better graphics and music. The gameplay has only been slightly modified.
attr.inst: Ready to run! Beware that the Start of the game via R1 can take a second.

attr.title: Pepper Pengui
attr.desc:
It looks like the penguin is having a bad day. Flaming thugs have cut off your nap and now are destroying the silent cave.

Help the penguin to end the party before things get too hot!

 

HOW TO PLAY

Eliminate all invaders using your egg bomb, but beware of hot areas as you will have difficulty moving through them.

You can restore the ice using your snotty sneeze. It will undo the heat and can also block enemies.

In case you end up getting stuck, sneeze over a block to break it. Use the bomb timer to your advantage.. also it is possible to push it forward in order to make a surprise attack!
attr.inst: READY to RUN

attr.title: Perfect Dark
attr.desc: A corporation is planning a conspiracy against mankind. A single woman dares to face the threat. That woman is Joanna Dark!
attr.desc_md:
A corporation is planning a conspiracy against mankind. A single woman dares to face the threat. That woman is Joanna Dark!

This is a build of the decompilation and [port](https://github.com/fgsfdsfgs/perfect_dark) to modern platforms of the Nintendo 64 classic.
attr.inst: Copy your original N64 Perfect Dark ROM to ports/perfectdark. It must be version ntsc-final/US V1.1/US Rev 1, with md5sum e03b088b6ac9e0080440efed07c1e40f. Other versions will not work. You can check the md5sum using online tools.
attr.inst_md: Copy your original N64 Perfect Dark ROM to `ports/perfectdark`. It must be version `ntsc-final/US V1.1/US Rev 1`, with md5sum `e03b088b6ac9e0080440efed07c1e40f`. Other versions will not work. You can check the md5sum using online tools.

attr.title: Permanence
attr.desc: Objects with solid outlines are in your line of sight, objects with dashed outlines are not. Keep things out of your line of sight to leave them the way they were. You can move forwards and backwards or rotate.
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks Steven Miller (https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks [Steven Miller](https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.

attr.title: Phantasy Star RL
attr.desc: A love letter to a classic RPG title from Master System with a roguelike twist! Recruit a party of up to four characters, choosing from a variety of race and class options, and make your way through twenty procedurally generated first person dungeons. Developed by Requinnzious for the Seven Day Roguelike Challenge 2024.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Phasing Puller
attr.desc:
Make your way using a Phasing Puller! By phasing through objects, this tool can pull and fasten physical objects to the bypassed item from the other side.
Despite achieving a remarkable advance in technology, the facility now appears to be forlorn. Enveloped by a desolate atmosphere, an android sets out.
attr.inst:
Download 'Phasing Puller: Casket v1.002 (ZIP)' from:
https://mvln.itch.io/phasing-puller
Unzip the file and copy 'data,win' into the assets folder.

attr.title: Pigeon Ascent
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 640x480 and 5:3 1920x1152*. Take care of your own pigeon as they fight increasingly stronger foes, and then face the legendary Pigeon God at the end... can you keep death far from your bird?
attr.inst: Pigeon Ascent files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Pinball Crush
attr.desc: A cozy GBA inspired pinball game with a dating sim progress system. Hit specific targets to access cutscenes and events with your date. There are 300+ unique events to explore, so you'll always have something new!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pinball Disc Room
attr.desc: How did you end up in this pinball of death? The blades teleport in. Dodge the discs to survive. Knock down the popups to open the passage way but beware you can't control when you exit.
attr.inst: All game files included

attr.title: Pingo
attr.desc:
Pingo is a puzzle game in which your goal is to paint the whole level in as little steps as possible.
Try to earn all 3 stars in 60 hand crafted levels!
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Pingus
attr.desc:
Pingus is a free clone of the popular Lemmings game.
Your goal is to guide a horde of penguins through a world full of obstacles and penguin traps to safety. Although penguins (unlike lemmings) are rather smart, they sometimes lack the necessary overview and now rely on you to save them.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Pinky
attr.desc: This game follows the untold journey of Pinky, the tiny slime from Terraria. Next time you slay Pinky, pause -- if only for a moment -- to reflect on the adventures, hardships, and quiet heroism that led him to that final encounter.
attr.inst: Download the Pinky.zip version for free at itch.io (https://omich.itch.io/pinky). Extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *Pinky.zip* version for free at [itch.io](https://omich.itch.io/pinky). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Pip Flip Paradise
attr.desc:
Flip the floor, roll the dice and be ready to adapt to changing situations as you find your own solution!

Collect bells by flipping floor tiles and dodging hazards. Watch out, however, as flipping six tiles will re-roll them into different forms that may help or hinder your progress!
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Pippu - Bauble Quest
attr.desc: Take Pippu on an epic platforming adventure to defeat the nefarious Obkins and retrieve the stolen Baubles! Run, climb and swim your way through 14 worlds to bash the baddies and save your planet.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game at itch.io (https://ci.itch.io/pippu-bauble-quest). Download the Pippu (Zipped Folder) version and extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the full game at [itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/pippu-bauble-quest). Download the *Pippu (Zipped Folder)* version and extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Pixel Descent
attr.desc: An action rogue-lite in which you navigate a series of complex dungeons packed to the brim with monsters that want you dead. Sign the contract and descend into the deepest depths of the abyss knowing full well that you will definitely die there, it's just a matter of when.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at https://jc-bailey.itch.io/pixel-descent, download and extract it, and copy the game files to the pixeldescent/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [https://jc-bailey.itch.io/pixel-descent](https://jc-bailey.itch.io/pixel-descent), download and extract it, and copy the game files to the `pixeldescent/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Pixel Skater Dude
attr.desc: A simple skateboarding game made with Gameboy spec's. Very much a prototype but playable.
attr.inst:
Go to https://jmation.itch.io/pixel-skater-dude and download Pixel_Skater_Dude_v0.6.zip
un-zip that and put data.win into ports/pixelskaterdude/assets

attr.title: Pizza Tower
attr.desc: Pizza Tower is a fast paced 2D platformer, with an emphasis on movement, exploration and score attack. Featuring highly stylized pixel art inspired by the cartoons from the '90s, and a highly energetic soundtrack.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game data to `pizzatower/assets`.

attr.title: Plague
attr.desc: PLAGUE is heavily inspired on Gargoyle's Quest for the original Gameboy. It's a platformer where you can control a plague doctor, throwing explosive potions and dashing mid-air.
attr.inst: Ready 2 Run

attr.title: Planet D4RK
attr.desc: This game takes heavy inspiration from games like Celeste and Katana Zero. The game creator's speedrun PB is 5:17.399, so see if you can beat that time!
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks to Abhi Sundu (https://abhimonk.itch.io/) for creating this great game and kindly PortMaster granting permission to distribute the game files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks to [Abhi Sundu](https://abhimonk.itch.io/) for creating this great game and kindly PortMaster granting permission to distribute the game files.

attr.title: Planet Merge
attr.desc: Suika game with celestial bodies! Merge planets, moons, and more to create massive cosmic objects and rack up high scores.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Planet Waves
attr.desc: An arcade tower defense about protecting a small planet made for the gotm.io jam #3 by Escada Games
attr.inst: All files already included. Run PlanetWaves.sh

attr.title: Planetarian
attr.desc: Planetarian is a visual novel set in a post-apocalyptic world where a lone survivor encounters a malfunctioning robot attendant named Yumemi Hoshino in an abandoned planetarium. Through their interactions, themes of hope, humanity, and the enduring power of memories are explored.
attr.inst: Add your game assets to `ports/planetarian/gamedata`.

attr.title: Plaque Attack Remake
attr.desc: *Optimized for 4:3 and 16:9 (or similar ex. rg552). Could scale weirdly on gameboy like aspect ratio.* Atari 2600's Plaque Attack game remake made for Highjam #1 by Escada Games.
attr.inst: Plaque attack Remake files are already included and ready to go. To Force a particular version rename the desired one in the installation folder as PlaqueAttackRemake.zip and delete the other one, then boot.

attr.title: Please, Don't Touch Anything
attr.desc:
Please, Don’t Touch Anything is a cryptic, brain-racking button-pushing simulation.
Covering for a colleague who is taking a bathroom break, you find yourself in front of a mysterious panel which only component is a red button. And since you’ve clearly been instructed not to touch anything, the only thing you want to do now is push that damn button.
Push it and expect to be held liable for any unintended aftermath. And there will be many.
attr.inst: 1. Download the latest port version. 2. Download the game from Itch.io. 3. Transfer data.win to the `pleasedonttouchanything/gamedata` folder. 4. Enjoy the game! :)

attr.title: Plug Away
attr.desc: Get to the end of each stage without touching any walls! Reach the outlet and complete the circuit!
attr.inst: Visit the itch.io page 'https://dechro.itch.io/plug-away' and download 'Plug Away! Windows' version of the game. Unzip the folder and COPY the 'plugaway.pck' file into the gamedata folder. Launch The Game.

attr.title: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties
attr.desc: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties is an adult-oriented "romantic comedy" visual novel/dating sim developed by United Pixtures and published by Kirin Entertainment for the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer. Although the game did have a Microsoft Windows version, it had very limited distribution and was published by United Pixtures itself. The game stars Edward J. Foster and Jeanne Basone as John and Jane, respectively; two people who are being pressured by their respective parents to go out and find a spouse. The player's task is to get John and Jane together.
attr.inst: This port requires the pc version. Copy GAME.BIN and folders SC00 - SC32 and SC99 to the DATA folder

attr.title: Plunder Islands
attr.desc: A fast paced 2D platformer, Plunder Islands has you running, jumping and climbing for treasure. Are you ready for the challenges the islands reveal?
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2279370/Plunder_Islands/ and copy the Plunder Islands.pck into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Pocket Tactics
attr.desc:
A GameBoy themed reimplementation of Tiny Tactics

After the collapse of human civilization, rogue warriors fight for scraps on the surface, fighting for what few remnants they can find from the old world, and sheltering in caves from the chemically modified rain that pours like thick soup onto the landscape below.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pocket Wonder Sport
attr.desc: 10 totally not bootleg games in 1 cartridge file! Inspired by weird rom collections on pirate multicarts, but hopefully with a tiny bit more quality.
attr.inst: All game files are included. Thanks to Harley Wilson at https://hwilson.itch.io/pocket-wonder-sport for creating the game and allowing us to distribute.

attr.title: Post Void
attr.desc: Post Void is a hypnotic scramble of early first-person shooter design that values speed above all else. Keep your head full and reach the end; Kill what you can to see it mend; Get the high score or try again.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Download the latest version of the game and place the all game files from /Post Void into ports/postvoid/assets
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285670/Post_Void/). Download the latest version of the game and place the all game files from /Post Void into ports/postvoid/assets

attr.title: Powder
attr.desc: A roguelike is a dungeon crawler where no two games are the same. The maps are different, the items are different, there are no guaranteed win paths.
attr.inst: Powder files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Power Level
attr.desc: You have 5 minutes to explore a randomly generated dungeon and gear up for a tough boss fight. Search for treasure, upgrades, and that glorious EXP in this quick-paced action game!
attr.inst: Download game from https://smithmanc.itch.io/power-level,  copy all files except the .exe to /ports/powerlevel/gamedata

attr.title: PowerPutt Legend
attr.desc: PowerPutt Legend is a unique minigolf game with RPG elements, meant to look and feel like it's straight out of the NES. Slay monsters, level up, and unlock a series of items to improve your strategy.
attr.inst: Ready to run! Thanks to Team Bugulon granting us permission to distribute.

attr.title: Predetermined
attr.desc: Push Boxes. Solve Puzzles. Repeat.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Prehistorik 2
attr.desc: A caveman-era platform game using the Blues Brothers game engine developed by Titus Interactive.
attr.inst: Includes the demo files. You can add your own full game Dos files to the ports/prehistorik2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Prisnhax
attr.desc: A relaxing yet challenging puzzle game where you hack prison locks using beams of light. Place mirrors, prisms, and splitters to redirect and manipulate lasers, unlocking cells across 50 intricately designed levels.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game at itch.io (https://ci.itch.io/prisnhax). Download and extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the full game at [itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/prisnhax). Download and extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Probo Rush
attr.desc: Probo Rush is a classic shoot 'em up bullet hell game with a boss rush twist. Fight against machines, aliens, and nature as you take on 15 challenging boss battles. With adjustable health and an Assist Mode, Probo Rush offers a challenging but accessible gaming experience.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all the game files into the assets folder.

attr.title: Professor Lucifer
attr.desc:
"What lurks behind these walls remains untold...
Wandering through the darkness of night with his lantern in hand,
What does Lucifer desire enough to brave the pitch black?"
attr.inst:
Go to RowanFutures itch page here:
https://rowanfuture.itch.io/gbjam12
Download 'Professor Lucifer Desktop.zip' then extract the folder and COPY 'ProfessorLucifer.pck' into the root of the portfolder. Launch The Game!

attr.title: Project Starship
attr.desc: Project Starship is an arcade bullet-hell with random mechanics. No match will ever be the same. Who will you be? Garret or Gwen? Will you save the world from the mighty cthulhu?
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/454890/Project_Starship/ place project_starship.exe into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/454890/Project_Starship/) place project_starship.exe into assets folder.

attr.title: Project: Starfighter
attr.desc:
Project: Starfighter is a space shoot 'em up game originally developed
by Parallel Realities in 2002, and released in 2003. You assume the role
of Chris Bainfield in his quest to put an end to WEAPCO, the weapons
corporation which has enslaved the galaxy.
attr.inst: ready to run

attr.title: Prototype
attr.desc: This is ProtoType, an RType remake from Dark Castle Software. This version compile on OpenPandora, Linux, ODROID and AmigaOS4, has the FMOD dependancy removed (using SDL_mixer instead, but can be re-activated), and has a few fixes in the code. This game now use stb_image for Image Loading.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Psebay
attr.desc: Psebay is an atmospheric adventure in moto trial genre. Features exciting gameplay with dynamic gravity, special atmosphere and unique sound, stunning scenery in silhouette style, and comfortable and easy controls.
attr.inst: Download apk version 4.0.21 from https://d.apkpure.com/b/APK/com.butakov.psebay?versionCode=4000021 , rename to psebay.apk, place in /ports/psebay

attr.title: Pullywog
attr.desc: Sling yourself through the air by catching flies with your tongue. Eating several things without touching the ground will score you a combo, so try to stay in the air for as long as you can! The timer constantly ticks down; you can eat anything to keep it going a little longer, but watch out for ghosts which are lethal to the touch! You can stop bombs from exploding by eating them before they hit the water.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Pulstario
attr.desc:
Pulstario is a small game in which you pilot a ship through the void and collect missing souls. It has challenging moments and hopefully the gameplay is a rewarding experience. From the creator of LOVE and kuso.

Pulstario is a short game that will likely take a player 30 minutes to complete the main game. There are also achievements, secret levels, and unlockable ship skins for the player to earn and collect.

The gameplay for Pulstario has been described as:

"Wobbly Free Range Pac-Man"
"Lunar Lander - Without the landing"
"Asteroids with gravity"
"Luftrausers for Pacifists"
attr.inst:
Purchase and download Pulstario_Linux_DRMFree_V001.zip OR Pulstario_Windows_DRMFree_V001.zip from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/pulstario.
Copy all the files (game.unx/data.win, options.ini) from /assets or the zip into the pulstario/gamedata folder

attr.title: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe
attr.desc:
PuPaiPo Space is a colorful space shoot-em-up in which you travel from Stage to Stage in search of the legendary space pizza. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you will have to battle waves of opponents, dodge hundreds of bullets, pick sweet power ups and face powerful bosses!

Travel through 7 different stages. Jumping from one stage to another requires your space jumping engine to recharge for roughly 90 seconds. During that time you will have to defend yourself from all the opponents in the area and defeat its boss.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/pupaipo-space-deluxe or from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148500/PuPaiPo_Space_Deluxe/

Itch:
Download PuPaiPo Space DX - Linux and copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1148500 1148502 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

attr.title: Pure Metal: Feature 1
attr.desc: Base has been attacked and you are the last hope of saving Pure Metal. Shoot down hoards of enemies and unforgiving bosses in classic shooter style. Touch controls feature smooth analog from the onscreen D-pad. Use the arrow keys and the z and x buttons to shoot the enemy with the keyboard. You have one life to make it through each level, but don't worry your ship can take 3 consecutive hits before being destroyed. Also your ship will regenerate to full power if you can manage to avoid enemy fire long enough. Bob and weave your way through the enemy fire and kill every thing in site. This game is designed to brutally come after you but pay attention and look for the patterns and avoid the onslaught of bullets.
attr.inst: Just copy the game.win or data.win inside the gamedata folder. Windows store version works too.

attr.title: Push!
attr.desc: A simple game in which you control a rabbit and eat carrots. Push rocks to fill holes and create traversable paths.
attr.inst: Download the game free at https://yyuta342.itch.io/push, and place the push.pyxapp file in the push/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game free at [https://yyuta342.itch.io/push](https://yyuta342.itch.io/push), and place the *push.pyxapp* file in the `push/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Putrid Shot Ultra
attr.desc: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.
attr.inst: Download the game (demo or full version) https://store.steampowered.com/app/2053360/PUTRID_SHOT_ULTRA/ and copy the exe file into the port folder.

attr.title: Puztrix Playdate
attr.desc: Puztrix Playdate is the Playdate version of a remake of the Gravnic game from inside the NES Puzznic game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Pyk
attr.desc: A quick arcade game of reflexes, precision, and occasional patience. Control a nimble round creature and dodge the relentless Bad Red Shapes -- out to cut, crush, burn, and blast you. Collect keys to unlock blockades and reach the teleporter to escape each level.
attr.inst: You can download Pyk for free at: https://rafalkowalski.itch.io/pyk. Download the *Pyk_1.0.zip* (Windows) version and extract it, and place the *pyk.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: PyroMind
attr.desc:
The most unforgiving little puzzler you will ever play, PyroMind is a simultaneously turn-based and real-time game full of bombs, explosions and narrow escapes!  
Play alone, blow up your friend or challenge a bot in a unique dimension, where everything explodes and one small mistake can blast you to smithereens.  
Note: Slowdowns on rk3326 devices!
attr.desc_md:
The most unforgiving little puzzler you will ever play, PyroMind is a simultaneously turn-based and real-time game full of bombs, explosions and narrow escapes!  
Play alone, blow up your friend or challenge a bot in a unique dimension, where everything explodes and one small mistake can blast you to smithereens.

**Note: Slowdowns on rk3326 devices!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Steam.  
Download the game using the steam console by typing `download_depot 695570 695571 2901679312042701621` and place the game files in ports/pyromind/assets.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/695570/PyroMind/).  
Download the game using the steam console by typing `download_depot 695570 695571 2901679312042701621` and place the game files in ports/pyromind/assets.

attr.title: PyxelJACK
attr.desc: PyxelJack is a card game where the goal is to get a hand value as close to 21 as possible without going over, beating the dealer’s hand to win. It’s all about smart decisions, like when to hit or stand, to outplay the dealer! So its Blackjack but made in Pyxel
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Q-YO Blaster
attr.desc: A shooting game with peculiar characters, strange enemies, weapons, and many explosions. Enter the miniature world and stop the threat.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io: https://teamblackhatrobot.itch.io/q-yo-blastergame -- download the Q-YO BLASTER 1.6.1.1.exe version, install/extract it and copy the game files to the qyoblaster/gamedata folder
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on itch.io: [https://teamblackhatrobot.itch.io/q-yo-blastergame](https://teamblackhatrobot.itch.io/q-yo-blastergame) -- download the *Q-YO BLASTER 1.6.1.1.exe* version, install/extract it and copy the game files to the `qyoblaster/gamedata` folder

attr.title: Q2Pro
attr.desc: Enhanced Quake 2 engine with work-in-progress support for the Nightdive remaster.  Includes support for mods/mission packs The Reckoning, Ground Zero, Zaero, and the Nightdive remaster.
attr.inst: Copy the files from your Quake 2 installation to the matching folders in ports/q2pro.  For example, copy the contents of Quake 2/baseq2 into ports/q2pro/baseq2.  If you have the Nightdive remaster, copy the contents of its baseq2 folder (Quake 2/rerelease/baseq2) into ports/q2pro/rerelease, and copy Q2Game.kpf to ports/q2pro.

attr.title: Quadrupleback
attr.desc: A video game where intruders must be circled. It is a clone of the 1982 Doubleback game by Dale Lear for the Tandy Color Computer.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Quake 1
attr.desc: Quake 1 is one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: Includes shareware pak file.  You can add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake/quakepaks/id1 folder.

attr.title: Quake 2
attr.desc: Quake 2 is the sequel to Quake 1, one of the first fully 3D First-person shooter games released by id software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files to the ports/quake2/baseq2 folder and for the expansion packs - ports/quake2/rogue and ports/quake2/xatrix.

attr.title: Quake 3
attr.desc: Quake III Arena is a 1999 multiplayer-focused first-person shooter developed by id Software.
attr.inst: You need to add your own full game pak files and product key to the ports/quake3/baseq3 folder.

attr.title: Quakespasm
attr.desc:
QuakeSpasm is a modern, cross-platform Quake game engine by sezero based on FitzQuake. This source port of quake supports many mods and Dimension of the Machine.

Quakespasm-for-GL4ES (https://github.com/Slayer366/quakespasm-for-GL4ES) based on (https://github.com/jfgomez21/quakespasm) who began modifying Quakespasm to work with GL4ES.
attr.inst: You will need to populate the id1, hipnotic, rogue, dopa, ad, and mg1 directories with your pak files and music tracks.  Some JelOS users may need to use flac instead of ogg or mp3.  It is recommended to use an RK3566 or faster CPU to run Arcane Dimensions or Dimension of the Machine.

attr.title: Quester
attr.desc: Assume control of a courageous adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes. Dance with death as you balance fighting with scavenging for loot and power in this classic-arcade inspired roguelike.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy game files into the assets folder.

attr.title: R&Watch-Dobtopus
attr.desc: A tight boss rush that's a challenge without being too brutal. The graphics have a sleek minimalist style with loads of visual flairs.
attr.inst: -Download at (https//:nizakashii.itch.io/R&Watch)-Extract and place data.win into gamedata folder

attr.title: RagingBlasters
attr.desc: Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from steam. Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1464550/RagingBlasters/ 

Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/ragingblasters/assets

attr.title: Rakuen
attr.desc: Rakuen is an adventure game about a little Boy who lives in the hospital. One day, the Boy asks his Mom to escort him to the fantasy world from his favorite storybook, so that he can ask the Guardian of the Forest to grant him one wish. In order to receive his wish, the Boy must complete a set of challenges that revolve around helping his neighbors in the hospital by interacting with their alter-egos in the fantasy world...
attr.inst: Add the contents of your rakuen copy into the rakuen/gamedata/ folder.

attr.title: Ramble Planet
attr.desc: Play as a creature stranded on the hostile planet Badmark, a hostile frontier planet and tourist hotspot. To escape, you must scour the wilderness, ruins, and settlements of this alien world to find replacement parts for your spaceship.
attr.inst: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet -- extract, and copy the rambleplanet11.rpg file to the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet) -- extract, and copy the *rambleplanet11.rpg* file to the port folder.

attr.title: Randungeon
attr.desc: a simple roguelike make for a gamejam
attr.inst: locate and move pck file to gamedata.

attr.title: Raptor
attr.desc: Reversed-engineered source port from Raptor Call Of The Shadows
attr.inst: Shareware files are included and game is ready to run. See readme for detailed instructions for full version game files and other configuration options. In the name and callsign section, make sure the crosshair is not on input fields, press start + down to enable text entry. Press start once done to complete entry.

attr.title: Raven's Hike
attr.desc: Help Raven reach the top of the tower, restoring equilibrium and saving the world from oblivion. Trust on your reflexes or find the safest way through every room, collect all the gems and get out. Who knows what to expect in the next trial? 60+ handcrafted open-ended levels spread through 4 stages filled with puzzles, combat with a dynamic soundtrack by Vincent Colavita.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1689270/Ravens_Hike and copy the game files into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: RAWGL
attr.desc: A re-implementation of the engine used in the game Another World aka Out of this World in the US.
attr.inst: Includes the Out of this World demo files.  You can add your own full game files to the ports/rawgl/gamedata/ folder.  See https://github.com/cyxx/rawgl#supported-versions for more supported files info.

attr.title: Rebound
attr.desc: Rebound is a side scrolling rpg inspired by Lisa the Painful, BBQ Quest, and Paper Mario.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://rebound.itch.io/rebound tested with Windows version. Extract fishing update contents to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.

attr.title: Recursive Run
attr.desc: A fast-paced platformer with a speed-run timer, where every level is the previous level + a twist or something new. Made for IcoJam 2024 with the theme of Patterns. Share your scores at https://bump-dev.itch.io
attr.desc_md: A fast-paced platformer with a speed-run timer, where every level is the previous level + a twist or something new. Made for IcoJam 2024 with the theme of *Patterns*. Share your scores at [itch.io](https://bump-dev.itch.io)
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Red Handsome Hood
attr.desc:
Join Red Handsome Hood on his journey, having only his hood, thong and knuckles, there is nothing that can stop this strong man! Or is there? The path is full of dangerous opponents, but he is just as dangerous!

The charming run of an untold tale, but we are not going to tell it, YOU can tell us what you think the story is about!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run.
Special thanks to BolHut games and and Jaime Gifte(@GIFTEador) for allowing the distribution of the game via PortMaster 
Source: https://bolhut.itch.io/red-handsome-hood

attr.title: Red Ronin
attr.desc: Red Ronin is a Turn-based but fast paced dash 'n slash game where a bloodthirsty ronin and her companion bot search for revenge.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam. Download the game. 
Place all the game files into ports/redronin/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222570/Red_Ronin/). Download the game. 
Place all the game files into ports/redronin/assets

attr.title: Red Trees
attr.desc: In a small town encircled by trees, mysterious events are unfolding. Pet rabbits are going missing, people have been injured, and the townsfolk are whispering about something lurking in the woods... Since none of the adults want to do anything about this, it's going to be up to you to get to the bottom of it. Before you can do that, however, simply getting into the woods might be a problem.
attr.inst:
Download the game from Itch, https://caramel.itch.io/redtrees tested with Windows version. Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays.

attr.title: Red Triangle Super Collection
attr.desc: Red Triangle Games' collection of short OHRRPGCE games all in one place! With nine great games, there's something for everyone in this collection!
attr.inst: Ready to run! Thanks to Red Triangle Games (https://www.redtrianglegames.com) for granting permission to distribute the game files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run! Thanks to [Red Triangle Games](https://www.redtrianglegames.com) for granting permission to distribute the game files.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 1
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 1 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck1/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Redneck Rampage 2
attr.desc: Redneck Rampage 2 using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version REDNECK.GRP and REDNECK.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-redneck2/gamedata folder.

attr.title: REDO!
attr.desc: REDO! - Dark Sci-Fi Metroidvania inspired by the works of Tsutomu Nihei, Lovecraft and others. REDO! is a game about a girl trying to find another human in a dystopian world overrun by biomachines. It's a lonely and evocative game about exploring the unknown and overcoming obstacles to see what is left.
attr.inst: Copy and paste the game assets from your purchased copy of REDO! to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Relic Hunters
attr.desc: Relic Hunters Zero: Remix is a remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns. It's fast, it's tactical, and feels deliciously smooth to play. Unlock new weapons, characters and relics to defeat the Ducan Commander!
attr.inst: Download game from https://www.gog.com/en/game/relic_hunters_zero_remix, install, copy data.win and .dat files to /ports/relichunters/gamedata

attr.title: Reminiscence
attr.desc: A reimplementation of the Flashback game using the reminiscence engine by Alex Chermenin.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the PC/DOS/Amiga version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
You will need the original files of the PC/DOS/Amiga version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.

- Steam or GOG data files can be found in `Flashback_Data/StreamingAssets/data`, copy these files into the `ports/reminiscence/gamedata` folder.
- Amiga audio files (optional) can be copied into the `ports/reminiscence/music` folder, but the files must be named `filename.mod` format. Some sources come with files named `mod.flashback-filename`, which will need to be renamed. e.g. `mod.flashback-chute -> chute.mod`
- voice.vce file (optional) for voice acting in cutscenes should be placed in `ports/reminiscence/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Residentvania
attr.desc: "Residentvania" is a fan-made demake of "Resident Evil 8" that reimagines the game in the style of the classic "Castlevania" series. Players control Ethan Winters as he navigates through the castle, battling monsters with gameplay mechanics reminiscent of the NES "Castlevania" games
attr.inst: Download the game of Itch.io https://oco.itch.io/residentvania . After that extract it and put the data.win into the re8/gamedata folder

attr.title: Restore PortMaster
attr.desc: Restore PortMaster is a script designed to restore a broken PortMaster installation.
attr.inst: Download this "Port" then run the "Restore PortMaster.sh" from within your Ports Directory. This will restore PortMaster to the latest stable version with default settings.

attr.title: Retro Time
attr.desc: RetroTime is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
attr.desc: Return to Castle Wolfenstein using the iortcw project.  With porting work done by JohnnyonFlame.  Packaged by Romadu.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own pak0.pk3, sp_pak1.pk3, sp_pak2.pk3, and sp_pak3.pk3 to the ports/iortcw/main folder.

attr.title: Revenge of the Titans
attr.desc: Revenge of the Titans is a game by Puppygames that blends tower defense with real-time strategy elements. You defend Earth’s bases from waves of alien “Titans” by building and upgrading turrets, mining resources, and researching new technologies. The game features a lengthy campaign, extensive tech trees, and retro-inspired visuals.
attr.inst: Download the Linux version of Revenge of the Titans from Humble Bundle and copy the tar to the install directory (unpacking takes a few minutes on first launch).

attr.title: Reverse Bros
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Ri-li
attr.desc: A simple and fun arcade-style game in which you control a wooden toy train and collect wooden letters while avoiding obstacles.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Rick Dangerous
attr.desc: An open source implementation of the legendary game "Rick Dangerous" using the xrick libretro retroarch core.
attr.inst: All necessary files are already included.

attr.title: Riddled Corpses
attr.desc: Frenetic arcade style twin-stick shooter. Fight your way through hordes of enemies alone or with a friend!
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/369890/Riddled_Corpses/ place the data.win and all .ogg files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/369890/Riddled_Corpses/) place the data.win and all .ogg files into the assets folder.

attr.title: Rigel Engine
attr.desc: A modern re-implementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full game files to the ports/RigelEngine/ folder.

attr.title: Riptale
attr.desc: Riptale is a challenging 2D roguelike action game aiming to make sword combat be as bloody and impactful as possible. The player collects gems that allow them to execute different attacks in the order of their choosing. All this results in a symphony of combos that fill the screen with blood and guts.
attr.inst: Purchase from Steam Using only the latest Steam or Windows version, locate game.unx/data.win, audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat, and all 8 folders. Place each of those files and folders inside the gamedata folder. Note: no need to rename game.unx
attr.inst_md: Purchase from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/616000/Riptale/) Using only the latest Steam or Windows version, locate game.unx/data.win, audiogroup1.dat & audiogroup2.dat, plus all 8 folders. Place each of those files and folders inside the gamedata folder. Note: no need to rename game.unx

rott.zip.name: rott.zip
items: Rise of the Triad - The Hunt Begins.sh
Rise of the Triad - Dark War.sh

attr.title: Rise of the Triad
attr.desc: An open source port of Rise of the Triad by icculus.  The shareware files for the first episode are included.  The registered game files will be required to play Dark War.
attr.inst: The demo files are already included for the first episode.  To play Dark War you will need to provide your DARKWAR.WAD, DARKWAR.RTC, and DARKWAR.RTL game files in the /ports/rott/ directory.

attr.title: Risk of Rain (2013)
attr.desc: Risk of Rain is an action platformer with roguelike elements. With permanent death as a primary feature, players will have to play their best to get as far as possible. Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses.
attr.inst: Buy the game on Steam and place all windows assets in "riskofrain/gamedata" folder.

attr.title: RITE
attr.desc: RITE is a high-speed precision platformer where you must conquer a series of demanding trials, a rite of passage for every Nim. Find the key and reach the exit to move on to the next trial, and maybe collect some gold along the way. Who knows, they could prove valuable to those who like a brutal challenge..
attr.inst: Locate the data.win file from the windows version of RITE. Copy this file to the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Rlone: A Rogue Clone
attr.desc:
Rlone is a real-time rogue clone. The result of a 2 week, friendly competition to create a roguelike using whatever tools we desired. 

This game features procedural map generation, random weapon and enemy stats, and difficulty and complexity scaling as you descent further into lower floors. It also supports modifications to the graphics, audio, and other things through the config files in "res/cfg/".
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: Rlvm (deprecated)
attr.desc: Rlvm is a Free Software reimplementation of the Key RealLive interpreter for Visual Novels. Notable games include CLANNAD, AIR, & KANON. (Superseeded by dedicated ports for each VN).
attr.inst: Add your game files to the ports/rlvm/games/GAME_NAME directory, multiple games can be installed and you will get a choice of which game you want to play at launch. HD Releases do not currently work properly.

attr.title: Road Invaders
attr.desc: An action game that's part vertical-scrolling racer, part match-2 game. Move your car and punch cubes, matching cubes to shift gear on your way to achieving the highest score!
attr.inst: Game files are already included and ready to go.

attr.title: Road Warriors 2
attr.desc: Road Warriors 2 is a vertical, arcade-style shmup inspired by titles like Giga Wing and Ikaruga, with tight, fast-paced gameplay with a focus on getting the highest possible score through a limited number of stages
attr.inst: Download the Compressed application ZIP from the itch.io https://yaru.itch.io/road-warriors-2 and place it in port's gamedata folder.

attr.title: Rockbot
attr.desc: A game freely inspired by old classic 8-bit jump-and-shoot games style, with some modern here and there.  Rockbot and RockDroid were created by Upperlands and were inspired by the old NES MegaMan games.
attr.inst: Everything is included and ready to run!

attr.title: Rockdodger
attr.desc: Rock Dodger is a horizontal scrolling action game where you have to navigate your spaceship through a stream of rocks flying in from the right. Your only help is a laser to destroy rocks and a limited amount of shield. This game had once upon in time the 4th place in NoStarch game contest.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: ROCKHEADS
attr.desc: Stop the pesky Dwarves from mining your town. Take advantage of their own bombs and winch in order to blast them to bits in this Arkanoid styled gameplay.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Rocks N Diamonds
attr.desc: A Boulderdash type game by Holger Schemel with many unique features, such as the ability to play remade levels from Boulderdash, Emerald Mine and Supaplex and many more levels.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Rogue Sentry
attr.desc: Rogue Sentry is a difficult twin-stick adventure shoot-em-up about a sentry droid who turns rogue to save humanity.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from itch.io or steam.
Download the game. Place all the game files into ports/roguesentry/assets

attr.title: Roguelight
attr.desc: The deeper you travel the darker it gets, and you only have your arrows to light the way.
attr.inst: Download Roguelight (windows) from https://managore.itch.io/roguelight. Place Roguelight.exe into ports/roguelight.

attr.title: RomM App
attr.desc: An app for custom firmwares that connects to your RomM instance and allows you to fetch games wirelessly from your handheld device.
attr.inst: Ready to run with demo server. Follow the readme and edit the `.env` file to use your own server instance.

attr.title: Roswyn & The Dragons
attr.desc:
Roswyn and The Dragons is an exciting Action-RPG game (with direct combat). As Roswyn, your goal (you don't know exactly why, but it's not important :) ) will be to defeat the 9 dragons to save the world (once again...).

In your quest, you'll travel through 500 levels(screens) including plains, marshes, dungeons, caves, mountains and much more. You'll get more and more powerful by finding new heart-pieces, or by upgrading your sword to crush pots and rocks or even throw fireballs !!
attr.inst: 1-2-3 are mapped to Y-X-A and attack on B!

attr.title: ROTA
attr.desc:
Rotate gravity as you walk over the edge!
Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles.
Collect all 50 gems to unlock doors and explore 8 vibrant worlds!
Listen to an original ambient soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while solving challenging puzzles. (:
Watch out for spikes! 0:
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Rotational Shift
attr.desc: A team of workers are tasked with processing boxes and have to meet the quota in the time limit. The catch? Every time the wheel spins, a worker is selected at random to work the next shift. With such short margins, all workers must play a part in helping each other be as effective as possible, so that no second is wasted.
attr.inst: Download game from https://gleeson.itch.io/rotational-shift. Place data.win in /ports/rotationalshift/gamedata

attr.title: rRootage
attr.desc: rRootage is an arcade-style vertical shooting game, with music to match. Avoid the barrage of bullets and destroy the enemy's battle ship with your laser. rRootage has 40 levels, each playable in four different modes.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Russian Subway Dogs
attr.desc: A fast-paced arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow metro. Juggle vodka, bark fire, cook bears, and more! Can you steal enough food to survive?
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/762610/Russian_Subway_Dogs/ copy data.win and all .ini files to /ports/russiansubwaydogs/gamedata

attr.title: RVGL
attr.desc: An open source port of Re-Volt by the RV Team.
attr.inst: Necessary files will be downloaded and installed upon initial launch while connected to the internet.

attr.title: Salvagette
attr.desc:
Turn-based bullet-hell class warfare!
Swipe to move in each of the four directions. Ram into things to destroy them, but avoid the dangerous projectiles.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Samurai Brothers
attr.desc: Samurai Brothers is a fast paced shared-screen multiplayer game. In addition to the solo mode, two modes are available for multiplayer games. Do you want to fight against your friends ? Or work as a team against the multitude of enemies ?
attr.inst:
Download for FREE and install "Samurai Brothers" from STEAM.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3403860/Samurai_Brothers/

Once installed, in your library, right click "Manage-Browse Local Files" COPY the Samurai-Brothers-v1-2.pck into the GameData Folder.

attr.title: Santa's Surprise
attr.desc: 'Twas the morning of Christmas Eve. The whole North Pole was preparing for the big night of present delivering and joy giving. Only Santa was nowhere to be seen... He was out in the forest on a very important mission - to get a present for Mrs. Claus. She had always wanted a cute little puppy, but there was only one problem - the workshop didn't make any puppies! So this year Santa ventured deep into the woods to meet with a local sled owner and adopt one of his adorable little huskies. It won't be easy, but it will be worth it to make the one he loves happy.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: SATAN LOVES CAKE
attr.desc: SATAN wields a trident that shoots electric beams, that are able to tramsform his enemies into cake. Meet a host of enemies and bosses - and eat them all!
attr.inst: Download from itch.io https://Baku.itch.io/satan-loves-cake and place data.win into the satlovecake folder.
attr.inst_md: Download from [itch.io](https://Baku.itch.io/satan-loves-cake) and place data.win into the satlovecake folder.

attr.title: Satryn
attr.desc: A chaotic, infinite twin stick shooty! 12 fearsome baddies (not cuddly), 9 power-ups that will make you smile and say “i’m having fun”, 5 hazards that add to the chaotic nature of this strange place, a manual that reveals helpful hints and useless lore as you discover things, and the love of your friends makes you stronger
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Savant Ascent
attr.desc:
A malicious orb has cast Savant out of his tower and transformed his surroundings into dangerous enemies!

Dodge and shoot your way back up the tower, and blast down waves of enemies as you make your way towards the top! As you progress, you unlock CDs that not only give you new tracks to play to, but also grant you powerful new abilities!

Can you make it to the top?
attr.inst:
Make sure to buy the original version of Savant Ascent: https://store.steampowered.com/app/259530/Savant__Ascent/

Note: dual analog sticks are required for this game!

Go to your steam directory and copy all files from Savant Ascent into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Saving Princess
attr.desc:
You are Portia Crane, Asset Recovery Specialist.
All you know about your mission is:
"IF THEY GET PRINCESS, THE WAR IS LOST.
IT'S UP TO YOU."
Explore a space station crawling with rogue machines and even rival bounty hunters with the same objective as you - but with far, far different intentions!
Expand your arsenal as you collect upgrades to your trusty arm cannon and armor!
Test your might against several bosses - including a FREAKING SPACE NINJA!
Can you SAVE PRINCESS?
attr.inst:
Head to https://brainos.itch.io/savingprincess.
Purchase the game and download Saving Princess.exe and place it into ports/
Works with Saving Princess - DEMO - Windows.exe too!
attr.inst_md:
Head to https://brainos.itch.io/savingprincess.
Purchase the game and download Saving Princess.exe and place it into ports/
Works with Saving Princess - DEMO - Windows.exe too.

attr.title: Scale the Skull Tower
attr.desc: Can you climb the tower and defeat the evil necromancer? Jump from ledge to ledge and throw your sword into walls to make MORE LEDGES! Also, bounce on some slimes.
attr.inst: You can download Scale the Skull Tower for free at: https://cortok.itch.io/scaletheskulltower. Download the *Scale the Skull Tower JAM VERSION (LINUX).zip* version and extract it, and place the *Game.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: SDL Bomber
attr.desc: Dave Ashley's Atomic Bomberman clone
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: SDL Sopwith
attr.desc: SDL Sopwith is a port of the game Sopwith, which was originally by BMB CompuScience Canada.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: SDLPoP
attr.desc: An open-source port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version, extended with new features by NagyD
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: SDLZombies
attr.desc: Linux clone of zombie game. You are penguin and zombies want to catch you. There is only one way how to survive - they must fall into a pit.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Secret Tea Garden
attr.desc: A cozy looking Tea Party where you must serve townspeople their tea while dodging hurdles and maneuvering around obstacles.
attr.inst: Download from https://angusbeer.itch.io/Secret-Tea-Garden then extract and place data.win into gamedata folder
attr.inst_md: Download from [Angus Beer](https://angusbeer.itch.io/secret-tea-garden) then extract and place data.win inside gamedata folder

attr.title: Septuple
attr.desc: A precision platformer about the septuple jump paper! Created by NNB.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Serious Sam - The First Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstfe directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The First Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The First Encounter works, too

attr.title: Serious Sam - The Second Encounter
attr.desc: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic arcade-style single player action. Sam travels through the beautiful world of ancient Egypt and several diverse planets, confronting countless Mental’s minions on his way to the Mental’s base. This source port of Serious Sam was originally modded to work on the Dragonbox Pyra handheld. GL video accelerated with GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64)!
attr.inst: You will need to populate the sstse directory with your game data.  Copy all contents except the 'Bin' folder from your Serious Sam - The Second Encounter Classic GOG, Steam, or CD install and DO NOT overwrite existing files.  The Serious Sam Classics: Revolution copy of The Second Encounter works, too

attr.title: Seven Kingdoms - Ancient Adversaries
attr.desc: A long, long time ago, when people lived among gods and monsters, seven kingdoms struggled for rule over the land. Lead one of those civilizations to glory through sophisticated trade, diplomacy, espionage and conquest. Choose from one of seven cultures: Greek, Persian, Viking, Norman, Mayan, Chinese and Japanese and compete for domination. Each Race in Seven Kingdoms has its own distinct advantages and disadvantages, its own unique God unit, a different military skill, its own strengths and weaknesses. Learn how to use them! Use military means, economy or subterfuge to bring down your enemies. And don't forget about brute force, cunning and intelligence.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Shack-o'-Lantern
attr.desc: The sun has set and darkness dwells in every corner. A light source, connected by chain, acts as shelter from the night. Keep it close and stay out of the dark.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Shackle
attr.desc: A ball and chain obstructs your movement, but do not let it weigh you down. Conquer over 45 levels and learn to use your restraint as your strength.
attr.inst: Ready to run. Thanks Steven Miller (https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.
attr.inst_md: Ready to run. Thanks [Steven Miller](https://steven-miller.itch.io) for creating this game and permitting PortMaster to distribute the files.

attr.title: Shadow Warrior
attr.desc: Shadow Warrior open source port by Jonathan Fowler.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version SW.GRP and SW.RTS Shadow Warrior files to the ports/shadow-warrior folder.

attr.title: Shadow Wrangler
attr.desc: Your shadows have split from you and you must guide them to the exit. You can move at will, but the shadows require commands. Pick up command boxes (turn, jump, explode) and drop them where you want the shadows to act.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/shadow-wrangler). Extract the .zip, and copy the ShadowWrangler.exe file to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/shadow-wrangler). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the *ShadowWrangler.exe* file to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.title: Shards of God
attr.desc: On a distant desert planet, a crime has been committed. As Mother Tiabata and Sister Ava set out to solve the mystery, they soon find themselves facing an impossible conundrum: how does one murder a god?
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Shattered Pixel Dungeon
attr.desc: ​Shattered Pixel Dungeon is a traditional roguelike dungeon crawler featuring six unique heroes, procedurally generated levels, and hundreds of items. Each playthrough offers a distinct challenge, emphasizing strategic gameplay and replayability.
attr.inst: Ready to run, version 3.02! Replace the jar file if you want to update the game.

attr.title: Sheepo
attr.desc: Sheepo is a quirky metroidvania platformer featuring a shape-shifting sheep-thing, who must traverse an uncharted planet in order to collect samples of each living species for an intergalactic species database.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam. Use the depot downloader to download the correct version of the game.
Copy all the game files to /ports/sheepo/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1281790/SHEEPO/). 
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the 5 September 2020 version of the game by typing: `download_depot 1281790 1281791 2354247233124576146`. 
When the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder.
Copy all files from /depot\_1281791 to /ports/sheepo/gamedata

attr.title: Shippy
attr.desc: The Earth is under attack. The only trained pilots, Sora and Fumiko, race to defeat the invaders. The experimental ships are Earth only hope.
attr.inst: Can play in one or two player mode

attr.title: Shipwreck
attr.desc: Shipwreck is a top down adventure game in which you must travel the land, explore dungeons, and defeat monsters to earn safe passage off the island on which you are stranded.  Note there are several games called Shipwreck, this is the one by Brushfire Games.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shipwreck for Linux copied to the ports/shipwreck/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shirobi: Metal Ninja
attr.desc: Old school, 8-bit, Metroidvania. A Robotic Ninja searches an uncharted planet for his long lost father, made in 5 days as part of Global Game Jam 2021
attr.inst: Download the game from gamejolt https://gamejolt.com/games/shirobimetalninja/582435 and extract the data.win and ogg files into the port folder.

attr.title: Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon
attr.desc: Delve with Shovel Knight into the depths of the Pocket Dungeon in an action-packed puzzle adventure mashup like none other! Join your mysterious guide Puzzle Knight as you shovel through scads of foes, procure new equipment, and battle bosses both familiar and new. Explore a tale with endless twists and turns, quest as your favorite heroes, and even challenge a friend for fast-paced head-to-head competition in Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon!
attr.desc_md:
Delve with Shovel Knight into the depths of the Pocket Dungeon in an action-packed puzzle adventure mashup like none other! Join your mysterious guide Puzzle Knight as you shovel through scads of foes, procure new equipment, and battle bosses both familiar and new. Explore a tale with endless twists and turns, quest as your favorite heroes, and even challenge a friend for fast-paced head-to-head competition in Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon!

**Note:** This is version 1.13 which does not come with the free DLCs/expansions
attr.inst: Purchase the game from steam. Use `download_depot 1184760 1184761 5529913677570552716` with Steam Console to download the game and add the game data to shovelknightpocketdungeon/assets

attr.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Shovel Knight Treasure Trove for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Shrubnaut
attr.desc:
A small metroidvania made in 6 days for a self-imposed GAME-A-WEEK challenge by gleeson.
Use your hookshot to explore a space garden and find all the secrets!

Note: This is a short game, intended to be played in one sitting. Note that there is no save function and the game resets to the beginning after idling for 30 seconds
attr.inst:
Download SHRUBNAUT - Windows.zip from https://gleeson.itch.io/shrubnaut and place the data.win from the zip into /ports/shrubnaut/gamedata.
On first startup, the game will patch the data.win

attr.title: Siege of Osaka
attr.desc: A retro hybrid of beat-em-up and brick-breaker. Send enemy ninjas rolling into walls and fortifications to bring down castles. Localized/parodied for American audiences.
attr.inst: All game files are included

attr.title: Signus - The Artefact Wars
attr.desc: Classic turn-based strategy war game similar to the old Battle Isle series. Commercially released in 1998, open-sourced by the original authors in 2002.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Simple Sokoban
attr.desc: Simple Sokoban is a simple Sokoban game that supports animated movements,unlimited level solutions, unlimited undos and more. It does not have any sound
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Simulation Theory
attr.desc: Simulation Theory is a game by NimbleBeasts for Github's GameOff 2021 Game Jam. Our interpretation of the theme 'bug' is that the level is not completely cleared due to a bug and you meet your old records again in the form of ghosts.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Simutrans
attr.desc: Simutrans is a freeware and open-source transportation simulator. Your goal is to establish a successful transport company. Transport passengers, mail and goods by rail, road, ship, and even air. Interconnect districts, cities, public buildings, industries and tourist attractions by building a transport network you always dreamed of.
attr.inst: This port is Ready To Run!

attr.title: Skeleton Boomerang
attr.desc:
Skeleton Boomerang is a platformer where the hero, Hunter, must use an enchanted boomerang to put an end to an army of bony soldiers led by the voodoo master Mr. Saturday. Get high scores, collect upgrades, find secrets, and overcome many skeletal challenges!

As you progress through the game, your total score can unlock new boomerangs, new abilities, and health boosts. Your score is tied to performing combos by defeating multiple enemies in a single throw of your boomerang. The world is also full of secrets. Finding hidden items can unlock new stages and bosses.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Steam. Download the game and place the game files in ports/skeletonboomerang/gamedata
Works with the prevamped version as well(better performance)!
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [**Steam**](https://store.steampowered.com/app/658150/Skeleton_Boomerang/)

**Latest version (NOT compatible with expansion):**
Download the game from your Steam library. Right-click on Skeleton Boomerang > Manage > Browse local files. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/skeletonboomerang/gamedata

**Prevamped version (better performance):**
From your Steam library, right-click Skeleton Boomerang and select Properties. Go to Betas and select "prevamped - The pre-reVamped build of the game." Download and install the prevamped version. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/skeletonboomerang/gamedata.

**Note:** This package is not compatible with the expansion. :(

attr.title: Skeleton Punchers
attr.desc:
Explosive 2D Pixel Art Action!
Help the Skeleton Punchers defeat the Zerpian army of the night and recover the Patrician's Hoard before it's too late!

Collect and upgrade power ups, cycle trough the Day/Night phases, complete Stages and Bonus Mini games to unlock new Characters and Equipment!
attr.inst: Install port. Purchase the game on Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/2163930/Skeleton_Punchers/). Copy all game files into the ports/skelepunch/assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Install port. Download game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2163930/Skeleton_Punchers/). Copy all game files into the `ports/skelepunch/assets` folder.

attr.title: SkiFree
attr.desc: SkiFree is a single-player skiing computer game created by Chris Pirih and released with Microsoft Entertainment Pack 3 for Windows 3.0 in October 1991.  The SkiFree official site is https://ski.ihoc.net/
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: SkiJump3
attr.desc: Ski Jump International v3
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Slime 3k Demake
attr.desc: A blob of goo, initially used to nourish artificial humans, has become sentient and risen up against its creator—the Despot, an evil AI and the unfortunate ruler of the world in the year 3000! The future is bleak, and humanity is beyond redemption, but at least you have the power to save yourself. This demake is a mini-version of our game, Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot which will be dropping on October 31, 2024.
attr.inst: Ready To Run!!!

attr.title: Smoothie Galaxy
attr.desc: Smoothie Galaxy is an adventure game inspired a lot by Zelda 2D games, you play a spacenaut crashed on an unknown planet and you need to find fours pieces of ship scattered in the world, for repair your ship and escape the planet..
attr.desc_md: *"Smoothie Galaxy is an adventure game inspired a lot by Zelda 2D games, you play a spacenaut crashed on an unknown planet and you need to find fours pieces of ship scattered in the world, for repair your ship and escape the planet.."*

attr.inst_md: This port is ready to run.
