attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://nizakashii.itch.io/snail-world) copy data.win and .ogg files to assets folder.

attr.title: Snaklipse
attr.desc: Snake game, with the addition of jumping, traps, and the need for speed. Features: Wormholes and jumping, many colors to unlock, and many many stars to eat
attr.inst: All game files are included.

attr.title: Snapdragon
attr.desc:
In this dragon-stretching minimalist roguelike you can stretch your body, shrink it and swap the positions of your head and tail to attack enemies or avoid damage.
The game features grid-locked turn-based movement, procedural stages, randomized items, and classic bump-combat.
attr.inst: Ready to Run! Thanks to sarn (one of the programmers from Team Bugulon) for giving us permissions to distribute game files!

attr.title: SneakR
attr.desc: A short stealth game. Avoid sentries and learn their movements to complete your objective.
attr.inst: Download game from https://josephgribbin.itch.io/sneakr, rename SneakR.exe to SneakR.zip, extract. Copy data.win to /ports/sneakr/gamedata

attr.title: Sneggpit
attr.desc:
Oh no, your friend Cursy has fallen into a pit full of dangerous snakes! Help Cursy to evade the hungry reptiles, steal the snakes' eggs and prevent them from spawning. 
Sneggpit is a charming little arcade game that could have rocked the early eighties - but is brand-new from 2024! While taking some inspiration from all-time classics such as Pacman or Nibbler/Snake, Sneggpit stands out with its unique and highly addictive gameplay and instantly runs on almost any modern device.
attr.inst: Cursy's movements can be controlled using the cursor keys (of course!), by any game controller, or via swipe gestures on mobile touch devices.

attr.title: SNKRX
attr.desc: SNKRX is an arcade shooter roguelite where you control a snake of heroes that automatically attack nearby enemies. Combine different heroes to unlock class bonuses and create unique builds, and steer your unstoppable party as they ravage through endless waves of enemies.
attr.inst: Download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/915310/SNKRX/ and place SNKRX.exe file to the port folder

attr.title: SnOut
attr.desc:
Compete for the top score in this combination of two classic arcade games!
The idea Is Simple:
-You control the snake
-Gain length (and points) for the ball hitting your body
-Body hits power up the ball to destroy blocks and create space
-Just go for as long as you can!
You lose if your head hits the ball, the wall, or your own body!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run!
If your D-pad on your device is poor, go to Menu->Options->Control Scheme: L/R to switch controls to triggers.

attr.title: Snowyland
attr.desc: Snowyland is a pixel art platformer where the player must eat to survive on an empty, barren island. You should freeze family members to create ice platforms that help you reach your dinner. Choose where these ice platforms are placed, and create solutions that even the developers have not seen yet!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731730/Snowyland/ and copy the Snowyland.pck into the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Sokobos

attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy the Sokobos.pck into the gamedata folder. The DLC folder (AphroditeDLC) needs to be placed directly into the sokobos folder.

attr.title: Sokobrawn
attr.desc: It's like Sokoban but you're really strong.

attr.inst_md:

attr.title: SOKOPLAN

Sokoban but you plan your moves ahead of time! The goal is to end up with all of the boxes on a circle. Each level has criteria for getting crowns (maximum number of wall bonks, moves and time). Perfect every level for a bonus!
Developed as an entry to the LÖVE Jam 2025.

attr.title: Somnokid
attr.desc:
Somnokid is a unique shmup/platformer hybrid in which you must construct the stage before platforming and battling on it.  Stave off your nightmares by slaying monsters, then survive on whatever ground you could build in time!

Features:
25 Levels of precarious combat
18 monsters haunting your dreams
An original soundtrack
Controller Support
High quality pixel art graphics

Somnokid was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the Inevitable".
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Spearmint Mountain
attr.desc:
Spearmint Mountain is a short but sweet action platformer, where you take control of a sentient piece of mint that's fallen off the big, sacred Mint. Pick up spear plants, and poke them at enemies or they'll crush you! Throw the spears at walls to create platforms, and bounce off of them to reach new heights!

There are also collectible mint coins hidden in difficult-to-reach locations. How many can you find?
attr.inst: Download game (Spearmint Mountain 1.1.1 Ubuntu) from https://baku.itch.io/spearmint-mountain, copy all the files from /assets to /ports/spearmintmountain/gamedata

attr.title: Spectral Slash
attr.desc: A combat-focused deckbuilder where your weapon deals no damage. Slash enemies to gain energy, use energy to play powerful cards. Add creative modifiers to your cards! Build a  powerful deck! Each loadout has unique playstyle. Try out all 6 loadouts and see which one you like most!

attr.title: Spinch

attr.desc_md:
Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.

attr.title: Splinter Zone

attr.title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com

attr.inst: Copy the file SpookyGhostsDotCom inside the game folder, if you have the steam version rename the file "SpookyGhostsDotCom-Steam".

attr.title: Spookynakki
attr.desc: Spookynakki is the bone-chilling continuation of Grabanakki, featuring 3 new worlds, a variety of new and returning mechanics, and a completely new OST. Clear level after level of monsters, using the very blocks you stand on as your only weapon. Can you defeat every foe without falling through the shrinking foundation? Don't wait anymore and go clear the 24 spooky stages of block-throwing combat!
attr.inst: Ready to run !

attr.title: Spotify Connect
attr.desc: Spotify Connect uses Librespot which allows you to stream music to your handheld via Spotify Premium. It even works in the background, allowing you to play music, no matter what your doing on your handheld!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run:
- Install "Spotify Connect" port.
- Open the port and toggle it on.
- Select your handheld in Spotify devices on your Desktop or phone.
- Close app if you want to play games. (L1 + R1)
- The app dynamically registers if Spotify is running, so if you want to turn it off,  just open the port again and use the toggle switch.
attr.inst_md:
This port is ready to run:
- Install "Spotify Connect" port.
- Open the port and toggle it on.
- Select your handheld in Spotify devices on your Desktop or phone.
- Close app if you want to play games. (L1 + R1)
- The app dynamically registers if Spotify is running, so if you want to turn it off,  just open the port again and use the toggle switch.

attr.title: Spring Hell
attr.desc: Just Press Spacebar at the right time! It’s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.

attr.desc: SteamLink is a hardware and software product developed by Valve Corporation for streaming Steam content from a personal computer or Steam Machine wirelessly to a mobile device or other monitor.
attr.inst:
This SteamLink wrapper automatically checks for a SteamLink binary and, if one is found, it checks a `version.txt` file and compares the contents to the latest available. If there is no `version.txt` file or there is a new version, SteamLink is downloaded automatically with wget.

Don't have wget or curl? See the README.md file for manual installation steps.

attr.title: Steamworld Dig
attr.desc: SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure with strong Metroidvanian influences. Take the role of Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives at an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below.
attr.desc_md:
SteamWorld Dig is a platform mining adventure with strong Metroidvanian influences. Take the role of Rusty, a lone mining steambot, as he arrives at an old mining town in great need. Dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while uncovering the ancient threat that lurks below.
*  A rich world of steam-driven robots, inspired by Steampunk and Western themes.
* Explore an underground world full of secrets, treasure, and terrors.
* Uncover the remnants of human civilization, a degenerate race of dynamite-wielding troglodytes.
* Randomized worlds with emergent gameplay.
attr.inst:
Westonpack runtime is required to run this port. 
Place the Linux Version of the GOG installer within /steamworlddig/installer/, then just run the game. This will take longer on first startup.
attr.inst_md:
Westonpack Runtime is required to run this port! 
* Take the Linux Installer from GOG and place it within /steamworlddig/installer/
* Run the game via your device
(First startup will take longer, wait for 1-2 Minutes)

attr.title: Strange Adventures in Infinite Space
attr.desc:
Digital Eel's Strange Adventures in Infinite Space is an incredibly addictive space exploration game that plays like a cross between a board game and Star Control.

The game is best described as the condensed version of Star Control: imagine the same sense of humour you have come to know and love in Accolade's classic, minus the grand plot, mix with more intergalactic business savvy, and you'll have a good idea of what SAIS is all about.

-Highly replayable! Uncover all the map, collect gems, unlock secret areas and extra levels, and complete the bestiary!

-Catchy synth-fantasy soundtrack.
-Cheesy 90's game voice acting!

Purchase the game either from https://dyagames.itch.io/strikey-sisters OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/643880/Strikey_Sisters/

Download Strikey Sisters (Linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS) [updated on Apr 05, 2018],  copy all files from /assets to /ports/strikeysisters/assets

Steam

As you journey through the world, the relentless *Muncher** will chase you in real time. Every second counts: **act fast** and **think quickly**, or risk being caught by the **Muncher**. TATE mode is supported as of game version 1.4.

attr.title: Super Hexagon
attr.desc: Super Hexagon is a fast-paced, minimalistic arcade game where you control a tiny triangle orbiting a central hexagon, dodging an onslaught of spinning walls. With intense music, rapid movement, and a constantly shifting geometric world, it’s a game of pure reflexes and precision.
attr.inst:
This port is compatible with the Linux Itch, GOG and Steam release of the game.

Installing Itch: 
- Download the Linux version, put the "superhexagon-xxxxx-bin" file into the folder superhexagon/gamefiles/itch/
Installing GOG:
- Download the Linux version, put the "gog_super_hexagon_xxxxx.sh" file into the folder superhexagon/gamefiles/gog/
Installing Steam:
 - Open the Steam console and type in the following command to download the Linux version: 
download_depot 221640 221643 7186315654381968499
 - Put the gamefiles (without any surrounding folders) into superhexagon/gamefiles/steam/

attr.title: Super Meat Boy
attr.desc: Get ready for a wild ride with Super Meat Boy! This tough as nails platform game is the brainchild of the dynamic duo, Edmund McMillen and Tommy Refenes, also known as 'Team Meat'. Born from the success of their 2008 Flash game, 'Meat Boy', this game promises thrills, spills, and maybe a few broken controllers. Are you up for the challenge?
attr.inst:
Let's get Super Meat Boy up and running! First, you'll need to copy the Steam version of Super Meat Boy (for Linux) game files to the ports/supermeatboy/gamedata directory. Easy peasy, right?

If you're a Windows user, don't worry, we've got you covered! Open your Steam console, and run this:

download_depot 40800 40802 6556596646716197166 .

Got the Humble version? No problemo! Just place your supermeatboy-linux-11112013-bin file in the ports/supermeatboy/gamedata directory and watch as it extracts the needed files on its first run. Now, let's get gaming!

Super Mega Zero is a tight precision and puzzle platformer with shoot 'em up elements. Simply touch an upgrade and switch forms to go from classic, straight-forward platforming to the more puzzle-like action number system or Shoot' Em Up gameplay.

attr.title: The Binding Of Isaac: Rebirth
attr.desc: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a 2D roguelike action-adventure where a boy named Isaac flees into a monster-filled basement after his mother, convinced by a divine message, attempts to sacrifice him. He fights using his tears while collecting power-ups in procedurally generated dungeons, offering high replayability and dark, absurd humor.
attr.inst:
NOTE: This port is not compatible with the GOG version or any DLCs

1. Purchase the game on steam.
2. Open up the steam console by typing 'steam://open/console' into a web browser
3. enter the following command: 'download_depot 250900 250903 5148620425580684010'
4. Find the folder 'depot_250903' in your steam library.
5. Copy the files within the folder to 'tboirebirth/gamefiles/' in your ports directory.
6. Launch the port and adjust the options. For most devices the default options are recommended. If your firing directions are incorrect, try one of the alternate control schemes from the launcher. If your game is not full screen, select fullscreen from the in-game options.

attr.title: The Brainvore
attr.desc: The year is 2240, you and your crew are currently on the way home from a survey mission to the Proxima Centauri system. Your science officers found some organic material on one of the planets and you are now tasked with returning those samples to Sol. Something seems to have gone wrong. attr.inst_md:
Demo Game is included. But once you see how fun this game is and decide to buy it, get it off STEAM from here [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810530/The_Dead_Prince)

attr.title: The Happyhills Homicide
attr.desc: Welcome to Happyhills, the town where you can indulge your deepest desires, make your wildest dreams come true, and slaughter anyone in your path. In this case, all three of these are the same. Play as a stylish 80's style slasher and kill your way through different levels. The game offers 20 completely varied levels, each with an entirely different playstyle and way of killing. Do you like a challenge? Don't worry. The game will increase in difficulty with every level, not every victim is as easy as the other. From a simple sleeping man in his armchair to fighting off a gang of bikers in a bar. And don't think for a minute you can carry out these heinous acts without an ambitious detective on your back.
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3278760/The_Happyhills_Homicide/ or Game Jolt https://gamejolt.com/games/thehappyhillshomicide/570127 and place the game files into the gamedata folder.

sdlpal.zip.name: sdlpal.zip
items: The Legend of Sword and Fairy.sh

attr.title: The Legend of Sword and Fairy
attr.desc: The Legend of Sword and Fairy, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian.​
attr.desc_md: The Legend of Sword and Fairy (Chinese: 仙劍奇俠傳; pinyin: Xiānjiàn Qíxiá Zhuàn), also known as Sword and Fairy (仙劍) or Chinese Paladin, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian. The eponymous first game in the series is released for MS-DOS CLI in 1995 by the 'Crazy Boyz' team (狂徒創作群) of the Taiwanese game developing and publishing company Softstar Entertainment (大宇資訊). It is one of the so-called 'Twin Swords of Softstar' (大宇雙劍) along with the sister Xuan-Yuan Sword series, and has been widely regarded as one of the (if not the) most iconic Chinese RPG series ever made.​
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546570/Sword_and_Fairy/ and put all files into the sdlpal/gamedata folder. Add the english translation into the sdlpal/gamedata from: https://www.romhacking.net/translations/2441/. If you want to play in other language, modify the variable 'MessageFileName' at the file sdlpal/sdlpal.cfg with the one you want or empty for original language.

attr.title: The Sun and Moon
attr.desc:
The Sun and Moon, the winner of Ludum Dare 29, is a platformer with a unique mechanic: you can dive into the ground. Momentum is conserved but gravity is reversed, letting you fling yourself high into the air or deep beneath the surface. The goal is always straightforward - collect the three orbs in the level and jump into the wormhole - but spikes, endless drops and impossible heights make this more and more difficult.

Note: This is the paid version from Steam
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/321560/The_Sun_and_Moon/

Download and install the game and place The Sun and Moon.exe into ports/thesunandmoon/
On first startup, the game will patch and put the files in the appropriate places.

attr.title: The Treehouse Man
attr.desc:
A horrible corruption has forced the children of the forest into hiding. They confide in the Treehouse Man, but their prayers remain unanswered. Baptized into the group, you must take the hallowed boat on an odyssey to save your brothers and sisters before the silence kills them.  
The Treehouse Man offers a seamless combination of real-time and turn-based combat, requiring equal amounts of execution and strategy to overcome. Configure the hallowed boat to your liking with different weapons, upgrades and travel companions. Explore the winding rivers of the corrupt forest, meeting all of its quirky inhabitants, friends and foes alike.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/841660/The_Treehouse_Man/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: TINAMP
attr.desc:
TINAMP - This Is Not A Music player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible. It comes with a free English and German audiobook from LibriVox.
attr.desc_md:
TINAMP - **T**his **I**s **N**ot **A** **M**usic player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible. It comes with a free English and German audiobook from [LibriVox](https://librivox.org/).
attr.inst: Install the application and place your audio books inside the existing ports application audiobooks folder. For more folder options see notes section.
attr.inst_md: Install the application and place your audio books inside the existing ports application audiobooks folder. For more folder options see notes section.

attr.title: TUKIYONO
attr.desc: This is a fairly high difficulty bullet hell shooter. It is a total of 4 stages + a last boss. Let's go for it...
attr.inst: Download free at itch.io https://nizakashii.itch.io/tukiyono and copy the data.win into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download free at [itch.io](https://nizakashii.itch.io/tukiyono) and copy the data.win into assets folder.

attr.title: Tumbledown Drive
attr.desc: Drive, jump, and honk your way to the top of this exceedingly punishing platformer. Be careful, it's a long, long way down if you fall. Includes controller support, a speedrun timer, regular secrets, and secret secrets.
attr.inst: Download from https://managore.itch.io/tumbledown-drive and copy data.win into port folder.

attr.title: TUMIKI Fighters
attr.desc: Tumiki Fighters brings a different twist to the side-scrolling shooter genre. With simple 3D graphics, the player has to control a ship and shoot down the enemies. The player can swoop in and attach the wreckage to its own hull for bonus points and protection from enemy attacks. .
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: TurboTableTennis
attr.desc: Ping pong return challenge.
attr.inst: All game files are included.

attr.title: Tutoretta's Easy Quest
attr.desc: Short First Person Dungeon Crawler with PixelArt and Paper-like graphics.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Tux Football
attr.desc: Tux Football is a great 2D soccer (sometimes called football) game. It's bringing old style gameplay from DOS times back to your handheld with up to date graphics! It's gameplay is similar to old classics such as Amco's Kick Off and Sensible Software's Sensible Soccer.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: TuxPuck
attr.desc: TuxPuck is an air hockey game and clone of the Amiga/Atari ST game Shufflepuck Café. The player moves a bat around a table and tries to knock the puck past the opponent's defense. After either party has reached 15 points, the match is over.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Two Die
attr.desc: Two Die is a turn-based, tactical, roguelike RPG where every action is determined by the roll of two six sided dice and every action requires to spend points. You choose a character out of 3 standard classes (warrior, rogue and mage) and embark on a quest where all encounters will be played through dice rolls.  Battle enemies to upgrade your character and discover what hides in your lost memories.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/1466260/Two_Die/ and place exe file to the port folder

attr.title: Ubermosh Collection
attr.desc:
Collection of all the 8 games of the saga.
Omega and Vol7 suggested only with device with 2 gb or more of ram, but works also on lower specs devices, often with very long boot time (up to 3 min for these two for the first boot). Jelos could have weird visualization of some menu sometimes but the interaction works and the gameplay works as espected.
attr.inst: Inside the game folders you will find 8 folders each with the name of a Ubermosh game. Place the data.win you have inside in the correct gamedata "ie. Ubermosh black data.win in "BLACK/gamedata"

attr.title: UDLR_Modify
attr.desc:
Aberration: A temporary change from the typical or usual way of behaving. To reach your goal, you must change yourself.

This game can be difficult, but the difficulty curve dips down every time a new mechanic is introduced. If you get stuck, don't be afraid to skip ahead - there is no penalty for doing so!
attr.inst: This port is ready to run!

attr.title: Udongein X
attr.desc: Mega Man X inspired Touhou fan game starring Reisen Udongein Inaba!
attr.inst: Ready to run

attr.title: UFO 50
attr.desc: From the developer, Mossmouth: "UFO 50 is a collection of 50 single and multiplayer games that span a variety of genres, from platformers and shoot 'em ups to puzzle games, roguelites, and RPGs. Our goal is to combine a familiar 8-bit aesthetic with new ideas and modern game design."
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and add the game data to `ports/ufo50/assets`.

attr.title: Ultima VI (Nuvie Engine)
attr.desc: A game engine for running Origin's 'Ultima 6' and 'Ultima Worlds of Adventure' games on modern operating systems.
attr.inst: Add your Ultima VI Gamedata to the /nuvie/ultima6/ folder

attr.title: Ultimate Stunts
attr.desc: Ultimate Stunts is a remake of the famous DOS-game stunts. Racing in Ultimate Stunts involves some really spectacular stunts, like loopings, corkscrews, bridges to jump over.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Ultimate Tapan Kaikki
attr.desc: A simple top-down shooter.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Unciv
attr.desc: Unciv is a free, open-source remake of Civilization V with a simple, lightweight design. It focuses on strategy, exploration, and building your empire
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Undergrave
attr.desc: Undergrave is a tactical roguelike in which every try will challenge you with a new adventure, where moving, jumping, managing your stamina, dashing and throwing your sword away strategically is vital for success.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776930/Undergrave/ and place all game files into the gamedata folder. You can also use the demo version from Itch, download the Undergrave.apk from https://wired-dreams-studio.itch.io/undergrave and place it in the gamedata folder.

attr.title: Undertale
attr.desc: UNDERTALE! The RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone.
attr.inst: Copy the contents of your Steam or GOG installation to ports/undertale/assets.

attr.title: Undertale Red & Yellow
attr.desc: Undertale Red & Yellow is a mod for the game Undertale that incorporates elements from Undertale Yellow. It features Frisk, accompanied by two ghosts Chara and Clover, as they navigate through the Underground. The mod includes additional content such as new interactions, minigames, and mini-bosses, which significantly extend the gameplay experience.
attr.inst: Copy the contents of your Steam or GOG Windows Undertale install and the ut-red-and-yellow.zip file to ports/undertale/assets.

attr.title: Undertale Yellow
attr.desc: When a child named Clover sets out on a mission, they find themself deep within the Underground. In this foreign land, monsters lurk around every corner, but are they friend or foe?
attr.inst: Download the game from Gamejolt and add the contents to ports/utyellow/assets. Game is ready to play after a brief first-time setup.

attr.title: Unfathomable!
attr.desc: Unfathomable! is a first person dungeon crawler featuring 13 randomly generated levels. Delve into ancient and forgotten labyrinths. Explore and collect gear while facing unearthly monsters inspired by Lovecraftian fiction.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Ungrateful Birds: No Good Deed
attr.desc: Late one night, you walk through a forest and hear the distressed cries of caged birds echoing around you. Someone must set them free, and you're the only one there. But be warned: when freed, these confused and angry birds will turn on you. Journey through five environments, rescuing ten types of birds across dozens of stages.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/ungrateful-birds-no-good-deed), download the Windows version, extract it and copy the game files to the ungratefulbirdsngd/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://jdmgames.itch.io/ungrateful-birds-no-good-deed), download the Windows version, extract it and copy the game files to the `ungratefulbirdsngd/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Unlikely
attr.desc: Unlikely is a dice game with a hungry clown. Roll the dice to score points; reach 10 points to advance. If you exceed 10 points, you get an extra roll. You can also roll the big die for a bonus card, but there’s only a 66.6% chance of success.
attr.inst: Download the unlikely.rar from the Itch.io Page https://nachogames.itch.io/unlikely and extract it, Copy the Unlikely.pck in the unlikely/gamedata folder

attr.title: Upo
attr.desc:
Upo is a procedurally generated music game.
Your goal is to avoid collision with flying objects in rhytm to the music.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Ur-Quan Masters
attr.desc:
The Ur-Quan Masters is a 2002 open source fangame modification, based on the action-adventure science fiction game Star Control II.

!!!Warning!!! This is a 369MB package and will take a while to download and install.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
attr.desc: VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is a booze em' up about waifus, technology, and post-dystopia life. In this world, corporations reign supreme, all human life is infected with nanomachines designed to oppress them, and the terrifying White Knights ensure that everyone obeys the laws..
attr.inst: To boot copy the data.win/game.unx files and all the folder inside the gamedata folder and then boot the game from Valhalla.sh.

attr.title: Vampire Garden
attr.desc: You are a vampire tending to your garden. Be wary of the sun; the light that gives your plants life will take yours away. Grow your garden across 83 levels.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: VanillaRA
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Red Alert.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VanillaTD
attr.desc: Vanilla Conquer is a fully portable version Command and Conquer Tiberium Dawn.
attr.inst: The game comes with the demo files, read the README for detailed information on installing the full game.

attr.title: VCMI - Heroes of Might and Magic III
attr.desc: VCMI is a fully portable version of Heroes of Might and Magic III.
attr.inst: Copy the GoG installer files to ports/vcmi and it will install the game files as required, see the README for more information.

attr.title: Verminian Trap
attr.desc: SOS! Your space pod has made an emergency landing on a planet infested with giant insects from Verminest. Fight with your companions and survive while the hope of being evacuated by a rescue unit lasts.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
attr.desc: Vertical Drop Heroes is a procedural platformer RPG hybrid with roguelike elements, where your hero adventures through randomly generated stages. Armed with a variety of skills and traits, you must use your cunning and reflexes to survive the dangers of each stage.
attr.inst: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Place game files on the ports/verticaldropheroeshd/gamedata/ directory.

attr.title: Victory Heat Rally
attr.desc: Welcome to VHR! Unlock the secrets of speed in this turbocharged neo super scaler arcade racing experience. Dominate the track & drift your way to the finish line on the road to becoming the VHRC champion.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and add the game data to `ports/vhr/assets`.

attr.title: Vikings of Midgard
attr.desc: After the Aesir Gods defeated the Jotun and reshaped the world, a hidden evil crept in through the cracks of their victory. Now chaos spreads once more -- will you rise to face it? A retro-inspired RPG built with the OHRRPGCE engine, blending modern mechanics with Super Nintendo-era style.
attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to Fenrir-Lunaris for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.
attr.inst_md: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Fenrir-Lunaris](https://fenrir-lunaris.itch.io/vikings-of-midgard) for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.

attr.title: Viral Reload
attr.desc: An infinite wave-based shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic. Blast away at deadly viruses, mechanical hybrids, and two unique bosses. Dash through bullets, lasers, and enemies to stay alive and score!
attr.inst:
You can purchase Viral Reload at: https://retrocademedia.itch.io/viral-reload 

Download the Linux version and extract it, and place the Viral Reload.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the Viral Reload Linux.zip, Jan 26 2022 release.

attr.title: vitaSnake
attr.desc: A snake game with smooth rotation made for the PS Vita with LibVita2D. Turn left and right to collect as many apples as you can, but avoid biting your tail, or you will lose the game.
attr.inst: Ready to run !

attr.title: VNDS Novel Reader
attr.desc: VNDS-LOVE allows you to play such famous games as Tsukihime, Fate \ Stay night, Ever 17, Saya no Uta and many others.
attr.inst:
Check VNDS Wiki "https://github.com/BASLQC/vnds/wiki" to find VNDS ready novels. Place your novel folder into ./vnds-love/conf/love/VNDS-LOVE/novels/  
More info in README.

attr.title: Vodovod
attr.desc: Vodovod is a game similar to Pipe Mania and Pipe Dream, in which you have to lead the water from the house to the storage tank. You get a limited number of pipes on each level and need to combine them to lead the water from the house at the top of the screen to the storage tank at the bottom.
attr.inst: Ready to run!

attr.title: Void Breach
attr.desc: A low-res, retro point-and-click adventure where a failed experiment hurls your daughter into a cosmic rift. Embrace the void and follow -- journey through eerie forests, haunted mansions, and sunken ruins to bring her back.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/void-breach), grab the Windows version (Void Breach.rar), extract and and copy the game files into voidbreach/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/void-breach), grab the Windows version (*Void Breach.rar*), extract and and copy the game files into `voidbreach/gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Void Pyramid
attr.desc: A post-apocalyptic RPG set in the space-faring Egyptian empire. In this far future, a maniacal Prime Pharaoh rules the wastelands of Earth; any who oppose him are exiled to the Void Pyramid -- an outer space prison populated by criminals, beasts, and mutants.
attr.inst: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid -- extract it, and copy the voidpyramid.rpg file to the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid) -- extract it, and copy the *voidpyramid.rpg* file to the port folder.

attr.title: Void Stranger
attr.desc: A sokoban-style puzzle adventure. Traverse a forgotten labyrinth in search of...Do you remember why you are here?
attr.desc_md:
*Void Stranger* is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts. Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right? Or have you lost something?
Something very important to you.
attr.inst: Place game .png, .dat, .csv, and .win files in the "assets" folder. Game must be v1.1.3, Steam or Itch supported. The game will take 20-30 minutes to boot for the first time only.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game via [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121980/Void_Stranger/) or [Itch](https://system-erasure.itch.io/void-stranger).
Currently supporting v1.1.3 off Steam and Itch.
Place all `.png`, `.dat`, `.csv`, and `.win` files in the `assets` folder.
The game will take 20-30 minutes to boot for the first time only.

attr.title: Vortexion
attr.desc: Vortexion is a MSX/SG-1000 inspired shoot-em-up written in Python and uses the Pyxel game engine.
attr.desc_md: Vortexion is a MSX/SG-1000 inspired shoot-em-up written in Python and uses the Pyxel game engine.
attr.inst: Ready to run !
attr.inst_md: Ready to run !

attr.title: VVVVVV
attr.desc: VVVVVV is a 2010 puzzle-platform game created by Terry Cavanagh.
attr.inst: This port is Ready to Run, and includes all retail levels.

attr.title: Vylan
attr.desc: Help Vylan on his journey to regain lost memories, in this Tile-Based platformer. Take on the 100 levels in this game that takes the platformer genre and flips it on its head.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io, you can also use the free demo. Copy the Vylan.pck (or VylanDemo.pck) into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1445650/Vylan/) or [Itch.io](https://mostlymadproductions.itch.io/vylan), you can also use the free demo. Copy the `Vylan.pck` (or `VylanDemo.pck`) into the `gamedata` folder.

attr.title: Waking Mars
attr.desc: Waking Mars is a one-of-a-kind adventure in which you jetpack through subterranean Mars encountering a host of extraordinary alien lifeforms that operate as a living, breathing ecosystem.

Add your Linux (humble) game files to the gamedata folder

File structure:
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars_files
/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars.png

attr.title: Walthros: Renewal
attr.desc: A turn-based RPG about a kind-hearted doofus trying to make tough times a little easier. Set in Walthros -- a world of floating fish, chill cats, and long-buried secrets -- Bob's routine excavation job spirals into something much bigger when he uncovers a discovery that could reshape history.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros_Renewal and download using the following download_depot/DepotDownload details: -app 1317270 -depot 1317271 -manifest 6884196317892834424. Copy the game files walthrosrenewal.rpg and BurpinBros.rpg to the port directory.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros\_Renewal](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros_Renewal) and download using the following download\_depot/DepotDownload details: `-app 1317270 -depot 1317271 -manifest 6884196317892834424`. Copy the game files `walthrosrenewal.rpg` and `BurpinBros.rpg` to the port directory.

attr.title: Warzone 2100
attr.desc: Warzone 2100 is an open source, 3D real-time strategy game with a story-driven single player campaign, online multi-player, offline skirmish, and more. Command the forces of The Project in a battle to rebuild the world after mankind has been nearly destroyed by nuclear missiles.
attr.inst: The installer automatically takes care of setting up the game.

attr.title: Waternet
attr.desc: Waternet is a puzzle game where you to connect pipes to each other so that water flows through it.
attr.inst: All files included!

attr.title: Wetspot 2
attr.desc: A port of QuickBasic 4.5 game Wetspot 2 by Angelo Mottola.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Widelands
attr.desc:
A real-time build-up strategy game
You are the regent of a small clan. Your task is to build an ever growing settlement. Every member of your clan will do his or her part to produce more resources to further this growth.

Widelands offers a single-player mode with campaigns that tell stories of the tribes and their struggle in the Widelands universe. However, settling really starts when you unite with friends over the Internet or LAN to build up new empires together – or to crush each other in the dusts of war. Widelands also offers an artificial intelligence to challenge you.
attr.inst:
All game files included, optional Mods can be installed at will.
Main Menu Windows can be dragged if screen is too small.

attr.title: Will You Snail
attr.desc:
A unique platformer where an evil AI predicts your movement. Dodge AI-spawned traps, solve optional puzzles and uncover the dark secrets of the simulation. 
A lot of levels in Will You Snail are relatively empty by default. The challenge comes from the interactions with the evil AI. You will jump, run, dodge and die. This game is precise, fast-paced and challenging. (Stay cool, you can change the difficulty at any time.)
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Use the Steam console to download the right version of the game: download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729. Place all the files from /depot_1115051 into ports/willyousnail/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115050/Will_You_Snail/).
Use download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729 with Steam Console to download the game and add the data to willyousnail/assets.

attr.title: Windmills
attr.desc: Master your combat techniques and explore a magic world in this combat-focused metroidvania. Help the unreliable narrator complete his story which changes depending on the player's actions.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo from Steam. Linux and Mac users check the notes for correct download depots.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803760/Windmills/) and copy all files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo from Steam. Linux and Mac users check the notes for correct download depots.

attr.title: Wizard Orb
attr.desc: A challenging little puzzle-platformer game where platforms appear and disappear each time you leap.
attr.inst: You can download Wizard Orb for free at: https://slimewitch.itch.io/wizard-orb. Download the *windows.zip* version and extract it, and place the *index.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Wizardchase
attr.desc:
2D retro pacman like arcade game

Collect all the treasure in the dungeon!  Can you make it to the second level? 
Leave your highest score in the comments.  Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: WizardWizard
attr.desc: WizardWizard is a challenging and addicting platformer with tight controls and simple mechanics. The game play is complimented by beautiful pixel graphics and awesome beats by the talented producer _TWC. WizardWizard is easy to pick up and play making for a fun social experience at school or on at a lunch break. WizardWizard is a game with a lot of love and character that will kick your butt and drive you to tears... I hope anyway.
attr.inst: Download wizardwizard.exe from itch.io or gamejolt and place it in ports/wizardwizard
attr.inst_md: Download wizardwizard.exe from [itch.io](https://crateboy.itch.io/wizardwizard) or [gamejolt](https://gamejolt.com/games/wizardwizard/40702) and place it in ports/wizardwizard

attr.title: Wizznic
attr.desc: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play

attr.title: Wolfenstein 3D
attr.desc:
LZ Wolf and EZ Wolf come to PortMaster! A Love2D launcher makes selecting games and mods easy. See the readme for instructions and details.

Includes shareware demo files.
attr.inst: Comes with shareware files for Wolfenstein 3D and Spear of Destiny. Add your full game files to their respective folders to play.

attr.title: Wordle SDL
attr.desc:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
attr.inst: All files are included and ready.

attr.title: Words With Freds
attr.desc: Guess the five letter word within six attempts! Thousands of words to guess! Features 24 different color palettes and 8 background options.
attr.inst: This game is ready to run. Special thanks to Fred Wood for allowing PortMaster to distribute the game!

attr.title: World of Goo
attr.desc: World of Goo is a multiple award winning physics based puzzle / construction game made entirely by two guys. Drag and drop living, squirming, talking, globs of goo to build structures, bridges, cannonballs, zeppelins, and giant tongues. The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore - but they don't know that they are in a game, or that they are extremely delicious.
attr.inst: Copy your GOG World of Goo .sh into the Port folder or copy your Linux Game files (WorldOfGoo.bin.x86_64 renamed to WorldOfGoo.bin and GameFolder) to the worldofgoo gamedata folder.

attr.title: World War II GI
attr.desc: World War 2 GI using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version WW2GI.GRP and WW2DI.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-WWII/gamedata folder.

attr.title: Worship Vector
attr.desc: Worship Vector is a Tower Defense type game. The game is based upon a unique map, which extends automatically.
attr.inst: Just download and play.

attr.title: Wrestle Jump 2
attr.desc: Push the button to extend your wrestler's leg, smash your opponent's head to the ground to score, first to five wins!
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Wuppo
attr.desc: Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam. Open the Steam console and enter 'download_depot 400630 400631 7979843440656313703'. Once the download completes, navigate to the downloaded files. Copy everything except the Funpack and Soundtrack folders. Go to your ROMs SD card, locate the 'ports/wuppo/assets' folder, and paste it there.
attr.inst_md:
1. Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam.
2. Open the Steam console and enter `download_depot 400630 400631 7979843440656313703`.
3. Once the download completes, navigate to the downloaded files.
4. Copy everything except for the **Funpack** and **Soundtrack** folders.
5. Go to your **ROMs SD card**, locate the `ports/wuppo/assets` folder, and paste the files there.

attr.title: Xanthiom Zero
attr.desc: Take control of Captain Grisham as you investigate the uncharted Planet 4-514. Collect items to help you progress deeper into the planet's depths, and power up your weapons to fight off powerful enemies and bosses! Explore multiple biomes, each with its own hazards to navigate, and uncover the mysteries that lie underneath the surface!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2324610/Xanthiom_Zero/) and copy all files into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: Xeno Fighters R
attr.desc: Xeno Fighters R is an in-development shmup fangame inspired by the Raiden Fighters series by Seibu Kaihatsu. The game has four original fighters: the Amada Vipros, the Phyxius, the Zaiva, and the Xelcor. It also features guest fighters from other shoot 'em up games by Psikyo, Capcom, Konami, and others. There are 20 stages to play in the game with four different game modes to select from.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: Xenon Valkyrie
attr.desc: Xenon Valkyrie is a rogue-like with many RPG elements in which you will have to get to the deepest part of a moon and finish the plans of a wicked witch. You will be able to get many weapons randomly as you fight in a world that is created every time you play.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/573780/Xenon_Valkyrie/,
copy copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/xenonvalkyrie/gamedata

attr.title: Xess
attr.desc: Do you like the idea of Chess, but want it to be a bit more and wilder? Like so much it's maybe too much even? XESS features 16 characters/factions to choose from, with unique units and setups. There's online multiplayer, puzzle levels, a short story mode, an endless challenge mode and a mediocre-at-best AI for versus."
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.title: XGA
attr.desc: This is a Metroidvania aiming to continue Metroid Fusion's focus on horror and the SA-X. Explore a huge, interconnected space station, fighting various monsters, upgrades and boss battles. Avoid XGA as getting caught means certain death....
attr.inst:
Download 'XGA'(102MB) from: https://dinar87.itch.io/xga
Extract the contents from the zip you downloaded and copy all game files to the ports/xga/assets folder.

attr.title: xkcd Hoverboard
attr.desc: Standalone version of xkcd 1608 Hoverboard game
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: Xmoto
attr.desc:
Xmoto is a challenging 2D motocross platform game, where physics play an all important role in the gameplay. You need to control your bike to its limit, if you want to have a chance finishing the more difficult of the challenges.

First you'll try just to complete the levels, while later you'll compete with yourself and others, racing against the clock.
attr.desc_md:
[Xmoto](https://xmoto.tuxfamily.org) is a challenging 2D motocross platform game, where physics play an all important role in the gameplay. You need to control your bike to its limit, if you want to have a chance finishing the more difficult of the challenges.

First you'll try just to complete the levels, while later you'll compete with yourself and others, racing against the clock.
attr.inst: Ready to run! When creating a new profile, either accept the default name, or see README.md for how to enter your own name.

attr.title: Xoo: Xeno Xafari
attr.desc: It's your summer vacation on Xoo Island -- a beautiful, deserted place filled with a surreal menagerie of alien creatures. Can you find them all in this new-style collecting RPG? While you're at it, scoop up fossils, gems, eggs, merit badges, video games, and anything else not nailed down.
attr.inst:
Paid (new/sequel) version

1.Purchase and download from: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/xoo-xeno-xafari
2. Extract, and copy xoo.rpg to the xooxenoxafari port folder

Free (old) version

1. Download from: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium
2. Extract, and copy megadata/xeno.rpg to the xooxenoxafari port folder
attr.inst_md:
**Paid (new/sequel) version**

1.Purchase and download from: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/xoo-xeno-xafari](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/xoo-xeno-xafari)
2. Extract, and copy `xoo.rpg` to the `xooxenoxafari` port folder

**Free (old) version**

1. Download from: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium)
2. Extract, and copy `megadata/xeno.rpg` to the `xooxenoxafari` port folder

attr.title: XRoar
attr.desc: XRoar emulates the Dragon 32/64; Tandy Colour Computers 1, 2 and 3; the Tandy MC-10; and some other similar machines or clones.  Put coco bios .rom files in bios folder and rom .cas file in gamedata folder.
attr.inst: The compatible ROM files need to be included in the ports/xroar/bios folder. For example: place the bas13.rom in ports/xroar/bios, then your Color Computer game files in the appropriate ports/xroar/roms subfolder.

attr.title: Xye
attr.desc: Xye is a puzzle game in which the objective is to help a character that looks like a green circle to get all the gems in the room. This is, of course, not as easy as it sounds; Xye must solve all sorts of puzzles while at the same time avoiding all sorts of traps and beasts. Xye is similar to other puzzle games like Sokoban or Boulder Dash, yet it also includes some arcade elements. Xye is a derivative of a classic Windows game called Kye, which is the base of the gameplay experience and visual elements. Xye is able to play level files that were made for Kye and Sokoban.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.title: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T
attr.desc: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T (or just yellow jacket) is a vaporwave arcade shoot-em-up about a motorcyclist running from the government in this classic 80s style arcade shmup! Can you get the highest score?
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io page and retrieve the file data.win from the Y E L L O W - J A C K E T.zip. After, data.win needs to be place on to the folder ports/yellowjacket/gamedata.

attr.title: Yarntown
attr.desc: You’ve come on the night of the hunt. The streets of this cursed, gothic town are overrun with beasts, and what has become of the men who tried to hunt them before. Explore the twisting roads, go toe to toe with powerful foes, and uncover Yarntown’s dark secrets.
attr.inst: Download game from https://solarus-games.org/games/yarntown/ and put the .solarus file in ports/yarntown.

attr.title: Yatka
attr.desc:
YATKA is one of many Tetris implementations available. Motivation behind this one was, on the one hand, to create a game that would conform to modern rules of the game, while, on the other, to make possible running it on resource-limited platforms (e.g. Bittboy or JZ4760-based handheld consoles).
Two Classic themes by Tekkenfede included.
attr.inst: All file included, boot the game and play

attr.title: Yolk Heroes: A Long Tamago
attr.desc: A cute Tamagotchi idle game from 14 Hours Productions.
attr.inst: Purchase game from Steam, rename the main .pck to "yolkheroes.pck" and add to the yolkheroes/gamedata/ directory. See https://portmaster.games/gptokeyb-documentation.html for details about Keyboard Text Entry.

youdiedbanry.zip.name: youdiedbanry.zip
items: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh

attr.title: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You
attr.desc:
You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free...
Can you stop this madness?
Or will you give up?
Reaching the top is no easy feat!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/you-died-but-a-necromancer-revived-you OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037100/You_Died_but_a_Necromancer_revived_you/

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1037100 1037102 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

Itch:
Download YouDied_BaNRY_linux.zip an copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

attr.title: You Have 10 Seconds (2023)
attr.desc:
A fast paced platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given 10 seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying. 25 areas with unique level design mechanics to learn.

Note: Motion Blur, Vsync and Details can be disabled/lowered under options to improve game performance!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!

attr.title: Z-Warp
attr.desc: Z-Warp is an intense vertical shoot’em up presented in retro pixel art style, featuring frenetic arcade-inspired action where blasters, bombs and KILLER specials are your only allies.
attr.inst:
Purchase from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990820/ZWarp/
Locate data.win and place it inside the corresponding gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990820/ZWarp/) 
Locate data.win and place it inside the corresponding gamedata folder.

attr.title: Zeroptian Invasion
attr.desc: The Zeroptians have invaded the planetary system of F1. Eliminate the threat and proclaim yourself the defender of the galaxy in this miniature pixelated game featuring chiptune melodies and gameplay inspired by classics such as Space Invaders, Phoenix, Galaxian, and Centipede.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://josyan.itch.io/zeroptian-invasion) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/974110/Zeroptian_Invasion). For itch.io, download the ZeroptianInvasion_itchio.zip version, extract it and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder. For Steam, there's no need to extract any files, just copy them across.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://josyan.itch.io/zeroptian-invasion) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/974110/Zeroptian_Invasion). For itch.io, download the *ZeroptianInvasion\_itchio.zip* version, extract it and copy the game files to the port's *gamedata* folder. For Steam, there's no need to extract any files, just copy them across.

attr.title: ZeroRanger
attr.desc: ZeroRanger is a vertically scrolling 2D shoot'em up with heavy emphasis on shooting, dodging and... mystery?
attr.inst: Copy the contents of your Steam or Itch.io install into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Copy the contents of your [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/809020/ZeroRanger/) or [Itch.io](https://system-erasure.itch.io/zeroranger) install into the `assets` folder.

attr.title: ZGloom
attr.desc: ZGloom is a re-implementation of Amiga FPS Gloom, including support for Gloom 3, Gloom Deluxe and Zombie Massacre.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to run.

attr.title: Ziggurat
attr.desc: A short adventure game featuring a dreamy atmosphere and strange characters.
attr.inst: You can download Ziggurat for free at: https://nethead.itch.io/ziggurat. Download the *Ziggurat-Linux.zip* version and extract it, and place the *Ziggurat.pck* file in the gamedata directory.

attr.title: Znax
attr.desc: Znax is a remake of a game by Nick Kouvaris. It is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.

attr.title: ZZT
attr.desc: ZZT is a 1991 action-adventure puzzle video game and game creation system developed and published by Potomac Computer Systems for MS-DOS
attr.inst: Game files are already included.
